title: FarmVille 2: Country Escape

comments: I've love playing this game since I began. The main issue I have is that when you buy a new device to play on, none of your progress is saved and you have to starts back at the very beginning. I had more than 80% of the venues open, over 1.2M coins,  and nearly 100 gems. I bought a new phone and nothing was saved. That sucks! Can someone respond, find a way to save your progress so if you switch devices to play on,  you won't lose what you've gained and maybe return my earnings!

This game is good and addicting it just sucks with the fact you need to use gems from everything. I wish it was more things to use just money for. I have all this money and run through gems quick and it takes too long to obtain so I end up not playing for a while. A good way of doing this is through earnings that you collect from your restaurant. You can receive 1 gem

The game is awesome, as for the loyal players like myself your game isn't fair with the diamonds on the casino spin 😢 I play everyday at least 8hr or more and only receive 15 gems every two days or so. Please try to rectify the situation I have never received double or triple diamonds on a spin and I've been playing for a year or so. Why?????

UPDATE 4 the NEW BUILDINGS PLSSSsss? TY... Cant Wait. Hope its coming real real soon and REALLY hope theres MORE to come after. U HAVE A WINNER GAME HERE. i bought ALOT of games, & this one is on the top 5 list. Keep up the great work guys/gals. Awaiting the new buildings. lol.    :-)   TY

Game is very fun and addictive. But you shouldn't have to spend few hundred dollars to play through the game and play all of the restaurants. Yes you can earn gems for free but would take an insane amount of time with each restaurant requiring more and more for each upgrade as you go on.

Please improve the casino...it's kinda a bit unfair because no matter what I've spent, I don't seem to get a lot of diamonds... considering that the places require diamonds to upgrade...so in order for the game not to be so stressful, you should really improve the casino.
description: Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!IMPORTANT NOTE:Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant! Features:* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients* 19 unique locations* More than 400 levels to complete* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interiorCooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:* Access location – to provide region specific in-game offers* Access external storage – to correctly save your progress
descriptionHTML:
Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant!

Features:
* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients
* 19 unique locations
* More than 400 levels to complete
* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interior

Cooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:
* Access location – to provide region specific in-game offers
* Access external storage – to correctly save your progress

recentChanges: Asian food aromas are wafting around Paradise Island. The new Thai Food Stall has popped up on one of the islands! New authentic dishes, exciting mechanics and addictive gameplay is waiting for you in the new restaurant! Serve crispy duck noodles, beef slices with rice, bags of soda, mango sticky rice and many other authentic Thai foods! Don't wait any longer, get your very own Thai Food Stall right now!
summary: Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world!
title: Cooking Fever

comments: This is not another Clash of Clans clone, but definitely pushes the boundaries of the clan genre. Good graphics, fun gameplay, and balanced in terms of units vs. defences for your island. While diamonds can be purchased by real-world money, the game doesn't trap you into needing them. The weekly mini-game missions help keep things fresh and assist in moving your base up the tech tree if you're patient. SuperCell is continually expanding the game to keep it interesting. Definitely worth a download!

Like ot a lot. Taskforces need to be improved drasticly. Focus on playing with others makes it a lot more fun. EDIT: still no real task force improvements, why it doesn't open straight onto you TF or why I have to go through several buttons to see people starts is stupid. sorting this out make my review 5*

Very addictive and always checking on my base, upgrades etc. Strategic game play, however too much pressure to buy diamonds as it takes FOREVER! !! for some things to upgrade. Seriously. ..2 days for an upgrade??? Only other issue is the limited time "special abilities"...they're fun but it makes it far too easy for someone to raid your base and take all resources needed to get the upgrades. Lots of fun and love the graphics

The graphics are amazing for this type of game. And I think that's why so many people love it. The only thing I wish that their could be is offline play. Just block the chats and player raids and only allow campaign attacks and their would be many more players able to play... Bcs sometimes I don't have data or wifi where I am and it's a pain bcs I love Supercell games. And ik why there isn't offline play, bcs the other players that attack you. But their must be some way around that like maybe a whole offline mode. Well if u read this ty and it's a great game keep up the amazing work you do providing us with amazing games...  ~Bladez

I have played this game since it has come out and I have seen all of the changes and they have shaped that game for better over the years the game has been out it has improved and is one of my best games I have ever played. But the down side is that it is really hard to get resources at first but then before you know it you are full and you have nothing to do about it. Also when getting the heros they should make that base a bit easier because the lower level people can't attack till the have a lot better troops.

Great game, but too slow. While I love the lack of pay to win, I'd wish for a way to speed up resource gathering: I've cleared out every similar level player in my area, and spend days waiting for RSS to build up so I can upgrade. Which is necessary before I can access a larger zone. No point buying speedup gems, as I've never anything to use them on!
description: Welcome to Boom Beach: come with a plan or leave in defeat!Fight the evil Blackguard with brains and brawn in this epic combat strategy game. Attack enemy bases to free enslaved islanders and unlock the secrets of this tropical paradise. Create a Task Force with players around the world to take on the enemy together. Scout, plan, then BOOM THE BEACH!PLEASE NOTE! Boom Beach is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.FEATURES- Play with millions of other players, raid hundreds of enemy bases for loot- Battle for control of precious resources to upgrade your base against enemy attacks- Explore a huge tropical archipelago and discover the mysterious power of the Life Crystals- Face fearsome Blackguard Bosses and uncover their evil plans- Join other players to form an unstoppable Task Force to take on co-op missionsUnder our Terms of Services and Privacy Policy, Boom Beach is allowed for download and play only for persons 13 years or over of age without parental consent.Note: A network connection is required to playParent's guide:http://www.supercell.net/parentsPrivacy Policy:http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/Terms of Service:http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Boom Beach: come with a plan or leave in defeat!

Fight the evil Blackguard with brains and brawn in this epic combat strategy game. Attack enemy bases to free enslaved islanders and unlock the secrets of this tropical paradise. Create a Task Force with players around the world to take on the enemy together. Scout, plan, then BOOM THE BEACH!

PLEASE NOTE! Boom Beach is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.

FEATURES
- Play with millions of other players, raid hundreds of enemy bases for loot
- Battle for control of precious resources to upgrade your base against enemy attacks
- Explore a huge tropical archipelago and discover the mysterious power of the Life Crystals
- Face fearsome Blackguard Bosses and uncover their evil plans
- Join other players to form an unstoppable Task Force to take on co-op missions

Under our Terms of Services and Privacy Policy, Boom Beach is allowed for download and play only for persons 13 years or over of age without parental consent.

Note: A network connection is required to play

Parent's guide:
http://www.supercell.net/parents

Privacy Policy:
http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/

summary: Storm the beach and win the day!

comments: New Review because of update: ° I really love this game. I'm hooked. Relaxing yet stimulating. Some levels are easy as cutting through soft butter with lots of delightful bombs and others take several tries to master and need that one devise a strategy and some others are much up to luck. I love that variation: relaxing and stimulating and sometimes a bit frustrating. ° I had finished all the levels of version 2 and then waited for an update which came with new levels and I finished them also about 4 weeks ago. I've opened the game every day since to see if yet an other update came, and yes, yesterday it did and have already finished all levels (that says more about my fanaticism than it says about the difficulty of the game). ° I appreciate the tournament (I topped the monthly yesterday but had dropped 3 steps while I was sleeping and have clawed my way back to the top this evening, but I guess I'll be back down tomorrow. But it's fun! And I got generous daily prizes. ° And I love the new version that even though I again have finished all levels, I can just go on playing thanks to the Level Tower (even if it at 46 repeated a previous level). ° Lovely graphics, good game sound.
Annoying and boring. Got headaches playing this. You can spend 5 sets of 5 lives each without passing the task. It's rather a "Push to pay or wait forever" game. Uninstalled. Sorry.

description: Build a zoo, play with cute animals and solve match 3 puzzles - all in one game!Switch between the challenge of the match 3 levels, and the joy of welcoming a new furry friend to the zoo you built with your hands.The Family Zoo was once the gem of the neighborhood. Now, the city wants to build a huge supermarket instead. It’s time to burst their bubble!Solve casual match three puzzles to earn tickets and materials. Then, restore the zoo and decorate the animal habitats and surrounding gardens.Meet new and old friends, and work together to make sure all the animals have a place to live. They are counting on you - can you save their home?Game Features✿ Swap between match 3 levels and building your own zoo!✿ Hundreds of delicious and challenging match 3 puzzles✿ Choose from thousands of decorations to make your family zoo unique!✿ Interact with exotic and cute animals✿ Develop your business with stands, cafes and other attractions to draw visitors and earn coins!✿ Complete quests for more rewards and advancing the story✿ Make friends with characters that will help you save the zoo✿ Enhance your fun with exploding watermelons and other wacky boosters
descriptionHTML:
Build a zoo, play with cute animals and solve match 3 puzzles - all in one game!

Switch between the challenge of the match 3 levels, and the joy of welcoming a new furry friend to the zoo you built with your hands.

The Family Zoo was once the gem of the neighborhood. Now, the city wants to build a huge supermarket instead. It’s time to burst their bubble!

Solve casual match three puzzles to earn tickets and materials. Then, restore the zoo and decorate the animal habitats and surrounding gardens.

Meet new and old friends, and work together to make sure all the animals have a place to live. They are counting on you - can you save their home?

Game Features
✿ Swap between match 3 levels and building your own zoo!
✿ Hundreds of delicious and challenging match 3 puzzles
✿ Choose from thousands of decorations to make your family zoo unique!
✿ Interact with exotic and cute animals
✿ Develop your business with stands, cafes and other attractions to draw visitors and earn coins!
✿ Complete quests for more rewards and advancing the story
✿ Make friends with characters that will help you save the zoo
✿ Enhance your fun with exploding watermelons and other wacky boosters

075 Creekside Drive, Suite 100

summary: Crush Match 3 Puzzles, Complete Fun Quests and Save the Animals!
title: Family Zoo: The Story

Why do you have to spend money on special scenes they should be unlocked if you picked the right choices not pay for them. Apart from that love the story and the graphics are great if these issues could be sorted that would be great

I downloaded this due to the narrative and the reviews, but I am not a fan of this game. 300 energies (30 sentences) is very short I get through it in about 3 minutes and then you wait an entire 24hours for another. I love the storyline and the graphics so therefore this would be good for someone who is a slower reader. It's a shame but I will be uninstalling.

Wish there was more energy or like an easier way to get more energy. I get 450 energy for the day with the initial 300 and playing the mini game which gives 100 and watching the adds which is 50. But it's not enough I feel like I only get about a couple sentences in and then I run out. Maybe if you could play the mini game every hour or two to get the 100 energy and watch the ads around the same time to get 150 instead of waiting 24 hrs it would be better. The story progresses too slowly with that little amount.

This game really addictive!! The only problem is they don't give you enough energy.😒you either have to buy energy or play a mini game to get more energy. The highest energy points that you can get is 100. Plus the 30 points if you watch a video. Other than that the game is AMAZING. The graphics are realistic. It has a lot of romance too. You should definitely download this game if you're not bothered about the energy points.

The game has me hooked. I'm big on reading so I fly through the 300 energies. I've spent $10 repeatedly, even $20 for energy and it feels like it was gone in the same amount of time as the 300 energies. If you allowed maybe 4 refills a day, it would be amazing, or some other way, maybe to just keep playing the minigame. There has to be something more other than 20 energies for a video once a day. But despite the lack of energy, this game has me so disgustingly hooked. I love it so much.

I think this game is really good. I just have one problem. Even though it says my energy is full, it feels like I have nothing. And also the mini game 100 energy seems to last longer than the initial 300 you receive. If you could fix this taht would be great. And if it's designed like this can you make energy spending more efficient?

descriptionHTML:
SCHNOPSN like in Austria!

Download the Schnopsn app and play “Schnapsen” against thousands of active players or the computer.

--------- ♠♣♥♦ ---------

Schnapsen is a card game well-known in taverns of Austria and other German-speaking regions.
The game is also named "Sixty Six","66", "Santase", "Bummerl", "Sechsundsechzig", "Snapszer", "Šnaps", "Soixante-six", "gra karciana" or "Šnops" throughout many countries of central and eastern Europe.

♦ Play Schnapsen with your friends – online or via Bluetooth
♠ Improve your Schnapsen-Skills and get on the top of the Schnopsn highscore lists
♣ Play against the computer in multiple difficulty levels or chat with other players
♥ Enjoy the realistic display of the cards on the table and get the feeling of playing in an Austrian Tavern!

--------- ♠♣♥♦ ---------

In contrast to card games like Solitaire, you can play Schnopsn alone or with yours friends. It's as easy to learn but you will have to develop good strategies and tactics to beat your opponent.

--------- ♠♣♥♦ ---------

Privacy Policy URL: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/7976877

Schnopsn App is also available for iOS and Facebook! Check it out on our website: http://www.schnopsn.com/

My suggestion is that if you can include an option to cancel ongoing breeding by giving gold or gems or without anything, it would have been better. The game has events that comes very frequently, it helps so much in getting new monsters and or progressing in the game.

The game is awesome! The game play, the monsters, and also the actual fighting and graphics. This is one of my most rated games and my most played; I couldn't go a day without it. It's competition is so good online with people and in dungeons and the map, also team wars are fun with your friends. Get this game you'll never regret it.

description: Celebrate Spring with our limited-time updates! Battle with the ultimate monster fighting force to lead them to victory in Monster Legends! Breed, feed, raise and train Legendary monsters and turn them into beasts!Collect mighty monsters to uncover unique skills and boost your strategy in action packed battles. Build a world for your monsters to live, fill it with habitats and breed new species! Take your monsters on exciting quests and fighting games full of strategy. Only then will you be able to prove yourself a Monster Master!If you’re all about multiplayer games, you’ll love Team Wars, where you’ll be able to duel other Monster Masters and win magnificent rewards and War Coins you can use to collect the exclusive monsters in the Team Shop. Join your friends and connect with a Monster Community of over 60 million players. Start building, collecting and battling today! Monster Legends is a beast of an action game! MONSTER LEGENDS FEATURESBREED & COLLECT – UNIQUE MONSTERS AWAIT- Collect over 400 monsters: New monsters are added to the game every week! - Breed monsters of different elements and rarities to create cool new species!BATTLE LEGENDARY MONSTERS- Collect incredible monsters of all types in limited-time events!- Fight in special events made of wonders and dangers packed with role playing action and unknown monster adversaries.- Collect treasures and rewards in your quest to glory.STRATEGY-BASED RPG FIGHTING GAME- RPG progression to level up your monsters and power them up for the battles ahead.- Your monsters will become stronger as you rank them up in the Monster Lab and equip them with runes!- Set your monster teams strategically, combining  the attackers, tanks and effect monsters that work best together- Battle games will require strategy and tactics if you want to rise to the top of the rankings!MULTIPLAYER BATTLES!- Duel other Monster Masters in the PvP Mode, earn trophies and climb up the leaderboards. The higher you are at the end of the season, the better your rewards!- Fight in the Multiplayer Mode each season for trophies, rewards, and a chance to reach the Legendary Leagues and become the Legendary Leader! - The monsters in your Defense Team will need to be strong to protect your trophies from being stolen by other Monster Masters.- Team Wars are the ultimate Multiplayer Games: Join or start a team, build a strategy with other players and obtain exclusive monsters from the Team Shop!- Team up with your friends, fight and measure your battle strategy and strength against other players.BUILD A MONSTER PARADISE!- Build a Monster Paradise and fill it with everything you need: A Breeding Mountain, Habitats, Temples, and more!- Unlock special spots in the islands, like the Library, the Temples of the Guardians, and the Monster Lab!Are you brave and skillful enough to fight for your chance to become the #1 Monster Master in the world? Find out with Monster Legends, the action RPG that will put you in charge of a monster empire! Download today and start training your monsters!Check Monster Legends out on:Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MonsterLegendsTwitter: https://twitter.com/Monster_LegendsYoutube: https://www.youtube.com/MonsterLegendsGameOther great titles by Social Point: Dragon City, World Chef and Dragon Land. descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time updates!

Battle with the ultimate monster fighting force to lead them to victory in Monster Legends! Breed, feed, raise and train Legendary monsters and turn them into beasts!

Collect mighty monsters to uncover unique skills and boost your strategy in action packed battles. Build a world for your monsters to live, fill it with habitats and breed new species! Take your monsters on exciting quests and fighting games full of strategy. Only then will you be able to prove yourself a Monster Master!

If you’re all about multiplayer games, you’ll love Team Wars, where you’ll be able to duel other Monster Masters and win magnificent rewards and War Coins you can use to collect the exclusive monsters in the Team Shop.

Join your friends and connect with a Monster Community of over 60 million players. Start building, collecting and battling today! Monster Legends is a beast of an action game!

MONSTER LEGENDS FEATURES

BREED & COLLECT – UNIQUE MONSTERS AWAIT
- Collect over 400 monsters: New monsters are added to the game every week!
- Breed monsters of different elements and rarities to create cool new species!

BATTLE LEGENDARY MONSTERS
- Collect incredible monsters of all types in limited-time events!
- Fight in special events made of wonders and dangers packed with role playing action and unknown monster adversaries.
- Collect treasures and rewards in your quest to glory.

STRATEGY-BASED RPG FIGHTING GAME
- RPG progression to level up your monsters and power them up for the battles ahead.
- Your monsters will become stronger as you rank them up in the Monster Lab and equip them with runes!
- Set your monster teams strategically, combining the attackers, tanks and effect monsters that work best together
- Battle games will require strategy and tactics if you want to rise to the top of the rankings!

MULTIPLAYER BATTLES!
- Duel other Monster Masters in the PvP Mode, earn trophies and climb up the leaderboards. The higher you are at the end of the season, the better your rewards!
- Fight in the Multiplayer Mode each season for trophies, rewards, and a chance to reach the Legendary Leagues and become the Legendary Leader!
- The monsters in your Defense Team will need to be strong to protect your trophies from being stolen by other Monster Masters.
- Team Wars are the ultimate Multiplayer Games: Join or start a team, build a strategy with other players and obtain exclusive monsters from the Team Shop!
- Team up with your friends, fight and measure your battle strategy and strength against other players.

BUILD A MONSTER PARADISE!
- Build a Monster Paradise and fill it with everything you need: A Breeding Mountain, Habitats, Temples, and more!
- Unlock special spots in the islands, like the Library, the Temples of the Guardians, and the Monster Lab!

Are you brave and skillful enough to fight for your chance to become the #1 Monster Master in the world? Find out with Monster Legends, the action RPG that will put you in charge of a monster empire!

Download today and start training your monsters!

Check Monster Legends out on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MonsterLegends
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Monster_Legends
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/MonsterLegendsGame

Other great titles by Social Point: Dragon City, World Chef and Dragon Land. Check them out!

Monster Legends is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

If you love your monsters, make them smile. Drop us a nice review here!

comments: Used to be r5 of a top alliance  have witnessed  members  spending over 10k dollars . The most pay to play platform I've encountered. If you can spare 100 €£$ per month  minimum.  It can be the best fun ever. But it exponentially grows so you'll never hit the top without continual spending .  Miss all the wonderful peeps but refuse to be a whale or a cash cow .

Money grab. Unless you have $300 a week to spend on this never ending money pit, you will never go anywhere in this game. You can only get so far, then you a required to spend actual cash to continue playing. If you want to max out your base you better have DEEP pockets. This is not a joke, if you want to be a serious player, it will cost you around $300 a week just to keep up. Only the rich get anywhere in this game.

Mobile Strike has reset game.   Nothing below cyber troops are being supported , no RSS .   Also.  One cyber Titan can zero anything that has highest normal T52 troops and best bio titans...... without sending a commander Once u reach building level 1100 offered for less than 19.99 USDyou will have no access to packs less than $100 USD and no access to RSS for older troops

I use to have one of the strongest bases in MKST.. Mistress Vixen..nickname Vix.  Anyhow i have spent easily around $3,000 us dollar on this game. And one day my shield lapsed and I got zeroed after about 40 plus hits. I quit playing. I started back and spent  littke money cause I missed my alliance people I started to consider family after almost a year of play.  Anyhow now they came out with cybernetics and the packs for that are $99.00 everytime. I'm sorry this has went to far. This is a pay to play game 100%.

Lots to do to increase your power, tons of new buildings giving massive power boosts, just wait a little bit & you may get lucky with a $99 pack being reduced to $19. Make sure you have plenty of money for this game. If you don't have the money, then starting out new, you'll be at a stand still around HQ level 20 & commander level 50, with only increasing power by researching, training more troops, & building traps for your wall. This game has been slowing down a lot lately though, not sure if it's the game or my phone causing it.

U spend money to get ready for war.I think I am ready too go to cp and look at the other players base and think I am going to die. Their lvl and power are bigger than mine, so I spend more money an that still don't help for the event this game is starting to suck. My res base I have never spent no then on it and I have it Hq lvl 350 what is up with that. Helping a base who has not spent no money. Help the people who has spent money
description: Become an action hero like Arnold Schwarzenegger in the new game of modern war -  Mobile Strike! Build a base, control the action, and test your elite troops against enemies on the battlefield! With cutting-edge assault vehicles in your arsenal this worldwide MMO game tests your ability to wage a tactical and intelligent war. It's not whose arsenal is bigger, it's whose arsenal is best! Design a customized base to reflect the kind of hero you want to be. Amass defenses to protect your base, or manufacture an arsenal unrivaled on the battlefield! comments: Game is amazing Love it. Customer service well you have none. All you get is automated message and no way to speak to someone about any issues. You give them what they need and no one fallows up on it. All you get back is the same automated response. Then they remove your ticket. So if you have problems with the game don't bother contacting them it's a waist of your time. THERE'S NO ONE THERE FOR YOU. Can't get my account back. That's all I want. It's simple NO???????

Another month, another violent smash and cash grab. Putting an entire LT behind a character requirement that 99.9% of the player base has next to no chance of getting with obfuscated "odds" that require one to spend 1000s of dollars for a "chance"(not even guaranteed) to get a character. At this point, I'm only updating the game to keep my reviews more relevant and higher weight.

It's a good game. Awesome graphics, great gameplay,amazing superstar etc. But not good for free player because you don't get good superstar and rate of getting better superstar is very very low. Even some time in 4 pulls. I didn't get any 2 star silver card. Please make rare superstar drop rate more or I can't go any further in this game and make this game more free player friendly.

Basically I have been playing this game over the past year... It is a totally addictive and 100% entertaining game... Only downside which has forced me to stop playing is that I have just acquired a new phone and attempted to load the game with my login details (for both Facebook & Google) but have found that I now have to start from the beginning again... I've now become mildly disappointed unless this can be fixed I don't think I will be playing again as I put too much time into this for me to start from the beginning again!!!

It is my favrt game ever when i play this i stuck with this game I want to say something  now it's giving  too many ads and a problem  when I log out it says only one thing again and again that this account using on another device  but it's not real and what I do I am help less and I can't get new powerful superstars 😭😭😭😭😭when I open with cash he always give me duplicates.. Give some new cool events like wrestlemaina T-shirts..

Love playing this game until google services crashed my phone and when I came back on to the game after having to reset everything, I lost access to my account. I have contacted customer services and all they do is send a pregenerated message that answers and resolves nothing!!  5 days and still receiving the same message back.. Even my faction leader has provided information to determine that my account is indeed my account and that I am active in his faction. But still SCOPELY send the same annoying generated message. WORST CUSTOMER SERVICES EVER!!!

comments: Awesome game.  Biggest downside I don't like is, unlike similar games, once the small packs are bought you are only offered the largest ($50/$100). I'd honestly like to see all packs back or at least if you're going to tier up buying options, at least offer a $25 as lowest.

Once you loose the shield, you will get farmed by higher level players, forcing you to use whatever resources you have left over to repair. Once you finished repair, you not surprisingly get attacked again. This results you in being frustrated and uninstalling or you foolishly spend your hard earned cash for resources that you will soon enough loose from being attacked.

Why do you need a commander to be sent to gather resources? This is absurd! I need troops to gather but then again I want my commanders to attack renegades and stuff! Please make gathering without th e need to send a commander with troops!!

Don't waste your time unless you are going to spend large amounts of money. Free to play players get attacked daily by credit card players and you dont get a chance to progress. Good idea for a game but sadly very imbalanced.

Overall an excellent game IF you have an alliance to back you up.  Otherwise you are a sitting duck. I recommend this game anytime to anyone because you do a lot in half an hour.   Only option I request is warlords events diring the weekend.  Poly and Thor are critcal resources and there never seems to be enough unless you pay for it.

Again the only way to move forward is to pay large amounts of money.!!! every rss is so scarce to retrieve and trying to obtain VIP is I don't even know how without paying money.... the chat is just plain messed up also...
description: When the entire world is at war, bold generals rise to the challenge and lead their armies toward Global Conquest. The time has come for you to strike! Do you have what it takes? Build your base, dominate regions of an actual real-world map, and lead your faction to conquer every nation of the globe! You are a single modern military order, cut from the same cloth as a sultan or the Vikings of old, destined to forge a mighty empire. But you are not free from rivals. Many generals share your ambition and have their own loyal armies to back them. Some will join you and your clan. Some will clash with you as rivals. But friend or foe, only one can reign supreme. Go boom or go bust as you recruit skilled commanders into your army, build a massive war machine, forge brilliant strategies, and order strikes on enemy bases in the most massive free MMO warfare game on mobile! **GAME FEATURES** REAL-WORLD ACTION• Play with thousands of real mobile players as they clash around the world.• Talk to your war friends and foes alike in the global chat as you plot every strike to grow your empire.• Build and order ultra-realistic units based on actual modern war machines like mobile artillery, battle tanks and big boom-dropping bombers! • Wage total warfare as you clash across a faithfully recreated World Map. REAL-TIME CONQUEST• Clash with the ferocity of modern Vikings in live, real-time PvP warfare.• Become the Sultan of Boom by issuing split-second orders in-game that determine which army will emerge victorious in battle.• Call on your clan for reinforcements when the clash is most intense. REAL MILITARY STRATEGY• Feel free to build your war base however you want in a customizable mobile experience.• Order your commander to strike, then power them up to bring the boom!• Forge a clan, lead it with the strategy of a sultan, and plan your strike together._____________________________________________Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/centralDon't forget to follow us on social media:Facebook: http://gmlft.co/SNS_FB_ENTwitter: http://gmlft.co/SNS_TW_ENInstagram: http://gmlft.co/GL_SNS_IGYouTube: http://gmlft.co/GL_SNS_YTThis app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en/conditions-of-usePrivacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en/privacy-noticeEnd-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en/eula

comments: For a free game? I can't complain too much especially if i don't pay for it. The containers are actually a good addition to this game since you get containers for free. If you're lucky enough you can win a premium tank and those things are not cheap! But wargaming actually give them away for free. The event is impossible to finish if you don't pay with gold and to win a tank you must pay a huge amount of $$$. But for casual and f2p players? I think you'll enjoy it. It's a game guys, play for fun!

The game is good compared to the game i often play online. I could have rated this game all five stars. The controls for driving must have other options to choose from. And its not suitable for android phones that has 5 inches sreen display. My thumb keeps slipping off whenever i try to maneauver the  vehicle. On Pc's much more easier to handle using a keyboard and a mouse.

Hello. I love WOT and trying to play together witg my son. But we've chosen different servers (Europe & Russia) and now i cant find him in the players list to be able to join one platoon. I also cant connect to his server and he cant connect to mine cause system doesnt allow it. can you please suggest how we can join one platoon in this case? Thank you.

Best mobile game I've played, more fun than the PC world of tanks for sure. Only real complaint is that it takes up a lot of space on my phone... It's worth the investment in memory though. Make sure you're in a good wifi spot and have a portable battery and happy tanking

Not a bad game.  I'm a little sick of the unrealistic tanks.  Also the unrealistic play in some ways.  I wish there was a mode that limited you to real tanks of the same time period and had more realistic damage based on the weapons.  For example, I don't want to see the Dracula tank and the 88mm on my Tiger should blow a Sherman away in 1 shot at point blink range, not 6 shots...

Why is 6 of my team on one area while I am in the other. Because of this spawning system I died literally 5 seconds after the battle started. Great game though. Why is there so much lag. And why are my controls frozen. I move forward a  little and then I move 50 feet away from my spot. Fix this and then you get a big fat 5 stars.

comments: It's the most engaging game I play but I have two main problems. One is like every one else is the continuous loading every now and then to the point that I try to avoid getting back to the main page so I won't have to wait for it to start loading. Bandai Namco can do better than this. The other issue is the short period of the gashas and not acquiring gold god cloth characters like what was promised. By the time I acquire the required amount of holy stones the gasha event is already gone.

Good graphics, lots to do. Only bad thing is the non stop loading wheel in the bottom left of the screen that causes the game to constantly freeze when going back to the main page of the game.  Seems like the developers don't care about the infinite loop, they just won't fix it, just sad because it's a good game.

When the game works, it's great. But the same problem like everyone with the main menu screen crashes and no icon pressing works.  Update 1.39 and the loading issue persists in the main menu.... Really dev.!?! The only new thing is their app icon. All the problems stay.... Unbelievable.

New 1.38 version still does not fix the spinning wheel bug that is caused by the chat functionality.  Since the issue does not happen in Asia, the developers don't even acknowledge the bug that happens in the rest of the world. Sad!   Solution: Just REMOVE the CHAT functionality from the Home Screen. It's useless anyway.

Love saint seiya since I was a child  this game has alot to offer which i thank you for it. The only issue I have with it. Its that it crashes too often loading forever having to restart the whole app again simple issue but get a little annoying after a while.  But other then that love this game

Worst game ever! Spend 25 min between install..update...more update ...more update..the game start and can't play as wheel spin on the corner all the time ! If you can't make a game that actually work please found a different job!
description: ■IntroductionSee your favorite characters from the series, such as The Dark Lord, Hades, Odin Seiya, and all 12 God Cloths! You can also encounter warriors from the all-new series "The God Libra and the 12 Weapons"! Enjoy epic battles with the over 100 characters available![System]■The greatest scenes from the animated TV series come to life once more in the palm of your hand. Enjoy the opening theme song "Pegasus Fantasy," as well as the legendary voice acting talents of Morita Masakazu (Pegasus Seiya) and Yuji Mitsuya (Virgo Shaka) any time you please!■Enjoy heated battles with the simplest of controls!All it takes is a tap of your finger and you can unleash the Saints' devastating special moves, like Pegasus Meteor Fist and Lightning Plasma! With the new "Awaken Seventh Sense" feature, you can enhance your favorite Saints to untold realms of power!■Play the story from Poseidon through to the Hades arc!Relive the tale as it progresses from the battle with the Gold Saints in the 12 Gold Palaces to the conflict against Poseidon and the Marina Generals. But it doesn't end there— the Hades arc has finally been released! As the story plays out in Inferno, crush the powerful foes that stand before you with the Goddess, Athena by your side!■Play to your heart's content with a range of varied game modes!How you play is completely up to you! descriptionHTML:
■Introduction
See your favorite characters from the series, such as The Dark Lord, Hades, Odin Seiya, and all 12 God Cloths! You can also encounter warriors from the all-new series "The God Libra and the 12 Weapons"! Enjoy epic battles with the over 100 characters available!

[System]
■The greatest scenes from the animated TV series come to life once more in the palm of your hand. Enjoy the opening theme song "Pegasus Fantasy," as well as the legendary voice acting talents of Morita Masakazu (Pegasus Seiya) and Yuji Mitsuya (Virgo Shaka) any time you please!

■Enjoy heated battles with the simplest of controls!
All it takes is a tap of your finger and you can unleash the Saints' devastating special moves, like Pegasus Meteor Fist and Lightning Plasma! With the new "Awaken Seventh Sense" feature, you can enhance your favorite Saints to untold realms of power!

■Play the story from Poseidon through to the Hades arc!
Relive the tale as it progresses from the battle with the Gold Saints in the 12 Gold Palaces to the conflict against Poseidon and the Marina Generals. But it doesn't end there— the Hades arc has finally been released! As the story plays out in Inferno, crush the powerful foes that stand before you with the Goddess, Athena by your side!

■Play to your heart's content with a range of varied game modes!
How you play is completely up to you! Will you train your Saints with the aim of becoming an Arena champion, or attempt to win all 15 battles in the Cosmo Challenge? Will you form a party of 15 warriors and battle in the Graad Colosseo, or go for all out war in a grand Holy War against another Guild? The choice is yours!

Play on your smartphone and set your Cosmo ablaze!

■SUPPORT:
http://bnfaq.channel.or.jp/contact/faq_list/1735

BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment Inc. Website:
http://bandainamcoent.co.jp/english/

By downloading or installing this app, you agree to the BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment Terms of Service.

Terms of Service:
http://legal.bandainamcoent.co.jp/terms
Privacy Policy:
http://legal.bandainamcoent.co.jp/privacy

Note:This game contains some items available for in-app purchase that can enhance gameplay and speed up your progress. In-app purchases can be disabled in your device settings, see
https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/1626831?hl=en for more details.

●COPYRIGHT
©Masami Kurumada,Toei Animation
©2016 BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment Inc.

comments: Pls end up with Brunooooo!! Dont fail me pls!! 😍😍
Gr8 game but we have to wait for 3 hours for just 2 tickets..
Can't stop playing

Excellent storyline, graphics, and doesn't waste your time with ads. This is how the e type of games should be done. The only thing that would make it better is if they actually gave out gems. This is their 1 downfall - not receiving any gems at all. Therefore, you are forced to either buy them or select the choice you didn't really want in order to get the free choice. This, of course, changes your storyline. However, you can see at the end of each episode the percentage of your choices compared with other users and its normally in the 90 percentile. Still this is a wonderful game that I would highly recommend.
Awesome game but it take 4hrs to give only 2 tickets and u play for almost 10min and u dnt get extra diamonds.. Thats the only part putting me off the game. Also waaay to many ads!
I like this game but i thought we are supposeto choose  hos come its not to what we choose i think its base in shat you guys choose on the end right so disappointed

comments: I absolutely loved it compared to the other games because it's absolutely free with literally thousands of levels and different menus (so you don't get bored)... It's a great balanced of easy and challenging (but still achieveable without spending a single cent)... My only complaint is that every now and then it hangs (but that's quite rare)... Great job!

The only problem I have with this game is that, if you have brought everything out of each of your stores and still have coins available WHY CAN'T WE USE OUR LEFT OVER COINS AND BUYS SPOONS? Cause you can't do nothing with left over coins in each state. Other than that, it keeps me ready for any challenge.

The game is fun when it works. Every time I unlock a new restaurant or a new region or bonus level or ANYTHING it won't download. I get a "connection error", and the only way to get past it is to delete the game, re-download EVERYTHING (which clocks in at over 100mb) and try again. Update 3/15: I emailed the devs over a month ago and have yet to get even an automated response.

After all changes in Dublin its n impossible to win levels without purchasing spoons and boosts. It was a great game but it slowly got ruined by the greedy developres i guess. Well..guess what! I am not spending a dime on it and I will just stop play it.

This game is fun, but it would be much better if they make it so that you can watch video ads so that you can get more spoons, boots, and lives. You can only watch a video once or twice for a life. I definitely won't spend my actual money to play this game. It's not a home counsel game.  Also, this game gets difficult quickly. I'm in the Paris level and barely making it through. I like to play this game for fun and to pass time. But the difficulty increases makes it not as fun.

I love this game but the fact that you can't use coins to buy spoons really annoys me. I wish they at least had an option to convert coins to different currency so that you can buy stuff in the next locations. What are you meant to do with your coins after you've finished the city?? It's such a waste.

comments: The more I play the more this game is broken ... the AI for the troupes constantly suicide even if you keep rallying them , I am lvl 169 and I am constantly getting attacked by lvl 220 and up no lies , I can give screenshots because that is fair ... this is 1-5 times at least per hour ... this game from very fun became very frustrating. The game creators could give 2 sh/ts about what is going on .

My phone is not rooted or jail broken, I do not have any hacks installed. I get a message saying illegal program detected by XIGNCODE3. Even after multiple uninstalls/installs, reboots, cache clears. All that time and energy wasted!!!

This is the game I have been searching for. But can't give 5 star because of 2 main reasons. Consume too many data while playing that required fast network and too many bugs... Problems free=5 stars.. What happen? I cannot even play the game now.. I once install and play and later uninstall because of game problem. Now I install and try to play again. I cannot play.. What is the problem? I also want to recover my account too..

Gameplay and graphics is great BUT as you progress you spend more time upgrading units and buildings. Some upgrades take up to a week of upgrading rendering those villagers useless aswell as the rate at which resources comes in as you collect doesnt compensate enough for the costs of upgrades. Its unnecessarily STRETCHED OUT. because of this its a 3 star rating...DONT DOWNLOAD IF YOU HAVE NO PATIENCE. Been playing a year and i dont feel my progress is a representation of the time i have put in. Been playing almost daily!

If you are going to do updates on this game, at least MAKE SURE it isn't lagging! My game since the update has been freezing up and lagging to the point that I select something (a wall for example) and the whole  game freezes and takes a million years just to LOAD. If this game isn't fixed, I'm demanding all my money spent on the game refunded and uninstallment. Not happy.

This is the exact definition of a strategy game, the controls are great and its free. You get to choose your own nation which just adds to the strategy, plus whatever you do in a battle can affect the entire battle. I would recommend it to people who want something with strategy and a bit of hardcoreness. The learning curve is quite steep sometimes.
description: Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!BUILD a unique village of your own design. LEAD loyal citizens from the dawn of antiquity to the modern era. BATTLE cooperatively and competitively with players from across the world. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.DOMINATIONS FEATURES:GREAT LEADERS!• At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.• Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!BRAND NEW EVENTS!• Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.• Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE• Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.• Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.• Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY• Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.• Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.• Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!• Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.• Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES• Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!• Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.• Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.• Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger. FORM AN ALLIANCE AND WAGE WORLD WAR• Put your powerful Nation to the ultimate test in PvP combat and raid your enemies’ cities for huge bunches of loot!• Battle for crucial resources, untold wealth, and total world domination.• Team up with other skilled rulers and forge an unstoppable Alliance.• Unleash the full force of your armies with a unique battle strategy to outwit and outlast your opponents in 50-on-50 Alliance warfare.• Conquer the globe in World War and take home the spoils of war!Build one of history’s greatest civilizations and develop a battle strategy to conquer opponents. Join an alliance and achieve world domination in DomiNations!Download now to start building your civilizationNOTES:A network connection and iOS 7 or above are required. DomiNations is optimized for iPads and iPhones generation 4S and newer. Playing on an iPhone 4 may result in slower performance and increased load times. The game is free to play, with additional purchases available in-game. If you do not want to make purchases in-game, please disable in-app purchases from your device settings.Privacy Policy:https://www.nexonm.com/privacy-policy/Terms of Service:https://www.nexonm.com/terms-of-use/
descriptionHTML:
Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!

BUILD a unique village of your own design. LEAD loyal citizens from the dawn of antiquity to the modern era. BATTLE cooperatively and competitively with players from across the world. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!

Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.

DOMINATIONS FEATURES:

GREAT LEADERS!
• At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.
• Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!

BRAND NEW EVENTS!
• Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.
• Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!

FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE
• Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.
• Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.
• Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.

CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY
• Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.
• Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.
• Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!
• Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.
• Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!

DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES
• Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!
• Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.
• Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.
• Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger.

FORM AN ALLIANCE AND WAGE WORLD WAR
• Put your powerful Nation to the ultimate test in PvP combat and raid your enemies’ cities for huge bunches of loot!
• Battle for crucial resources, untold wealth, and total world domination.
• Team up with other skilled rulers and forge an unstoppable Alliance.
• Unleash the full force of your armies with a unique battle strategy to outwit and outlast your opponents in 50-on-50 Alliance warfare.
• Conquer the globe in World War and take home the spoils of war!

Build one of history’s greatest civilizations and develop a battle strategy to conquer opponents. Join an alliance and achieve world domination in DomiNations!

Download now to start building your civilization

NOTES:

A network connection and iOS 7 or above are required. DomiNations is optimized for iPads and iPhones generation 4S and newer. Playing on an iPhone 4 may result in slower performance and increased load times. The game is free to play, with additional purchases available in-game. If you do not want to make purchases in-game, please disable in-app purchases from your device settings.

Privacy Policy:
https://www.nexonm.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
https://www.nexonm.com/terms-of-use/
developerAddress:
6121 Hollis Street
Emeryville CA 94608
United States
recentChanges: v6.2 Update Notes
- Expand your civilization with 15 new spaces to explore!
- Upgrade your University to level 7!
- Research Haile Selassie’s skill tree at the University to improve your late-game combat defenses.
- Harness the power of his Capstone, Lion of Judah, unlocking the ability to build a Rocket Arsenal to defend your base!
- Town Center now has increased white radius where defenders are triggered.
- Japanese Town Centers features an additional yellow ring to show its firing range.
summary: Battle strategy game: Build an empire, wage war & conquer nations across history
title: DomiNations

comments: I love this game and spent money on it but i just came back and one of the updates has completely erased what i spent many hours and dollars on

I really enjoy this game has been the only game that has kept my attention for more than a week. Working on week 3 now, most of the game is free but if you want to grow your port quickly than you will need to play into the game. The game really starts to slow down after level 50, I'm up in the high 60 levels now. I do really enjoy all the quests and they do add bonus quests from time to time to help build up your port.

A fun, easy-going game. No crazy-pace required and easy to advance.  The amount of unique ships is crazy, I think only fan of nautical history would really enjoy this aspect. The list of active ships should be available from your town, instead of only from map view. Other than that, it's quite enj9yable and not a complete time-sucker like many 9ther games. Well done.

I just started the game a couple of days ago, but I'm already hooked.  Like most games, you kind of learn as you move along, but a little more guiding would be very helpful. Thanks for making a fun game! I am having a problem getting past the loading screen though. I tried clearing cache, forced stop, delete files, even uninstalling and reinstalling again.

Easy to learn with loads of variables to keep it interesting. Graphics are stellar. As with most 'free' games, there are lots of incentives for you to get out your wallet; if you're as unwilling to do so as I am, you'll have to be patient. Can't fault the developers. Fish gotta swim, birds gotta eat.

If you want a game you can tap on a few things then come back a few hours later, this is it. Not any real goals though so after a while you do feel what's the point but the graphics are good and the events are good too but it needs better goals to help you achieve something. I just do what I want for now. Still play it though

descriptionHTML:
Behold, sailors! No time for relaxing on the beach! YOUR SHIP FLEET AWAITS!

Do you have what it takes to develop the biggest sea transport business, manage the most powerful ship fleet and become a wealthy tycoon? Try it now! Get ready for an exciting journey through the history of ships! Expand your ship collection from very basic boats to the enormous warships. Build your own port and enter the world of sea & cargo trade!

NAVY FEATURES:
⚓ New content every week
⚓ Build up your port
⚓ Themed events every month
⚓ Buy real historic ships
⚓ Finish contracts from famous sailors and explorers
⚓ Trade with your friends
⚓ Explore unknown lands
⚓ Expand and manage your fleet
⚓ Sail uncharted waters and explore new lands

Start as a little fishing village, grow it into town and continue building until you become the most prosperous port city in the whole world! Embark on a sea journey through the history of ships from the age of discovery to the modern days.

COLLECT SHIPS
Relive the history of sailing by collecting real historical ships. Join the famous explorers in their adventures and finish the contracts to obtain special rewards.

DEVELOP YOUR PORT
Raise new buildings and manage the production of materials. Build a home port of the largest fleet among your friends!

EXPLORE NEW LANDS
Attracted by the unknown? Discover new destinations that expand your world. Sail the seas and trade with materials and exotic commodities.

THEMED EVENTS
Vikings, Pirates, Romans and many more. You will have chance to show the power of your fleet in the new events, starting every month. Enjoy obtaining and trading with a few special commodities, sailing to shipwrecks for amazing rewards and much more!

Do not hesitate and prepare your fleet!
developerAddress: Einsteinova 19, 851 01 Bratislava, Slovakia

comments: I'd really like to give this game a 5 star rating. Their customer service is fantastic. The graphics are great. Lots of missions to go on. And they have events every week. Exactly what I'd be looking for in a star trek game. But the thing I just can't get past is the gambling aspect for role playing. All I want to do is role play as a captain of a galaxy class starship. But after a month of almost daily spins at the Dabo table (including spending real money on the vip pass and dilithium, and rolling multiple times a day) I haven't gotten a single galaxy class schematic. I don't want to play borg, or klingon, or older enterprise (hell, I'd trade all of those for just a generic galaxy class). It doesn't seem fair the game doesn't give you a more direct way to role play as your favorite ship. Isn't that the whole point of a game like this?

Great collections of star trek universe, but the game screams micro transactions and gambling around every corner. The game gives you a great concept that gets hindered by currency gates. Only play if you want a nostalgic taste of star trek themed free to play game

I absolutely love this game! It's concept is (though not entirely unique to Star Trek) cool. I just love the voices for characters and would love more characters to have voices.  For the longest time I was a F2P player, and when Events first started I was constantly in the Top 1000 so don't buy into that "You have to pay to win" nonsense. If you do put money into this game make it the $4 Monthly Dilithium Card it is worth it $4 for 3000 Dilithium if you can afford it.

Progress stalls unless you spend insulting amounts of money (dilithium prices are absurd) to get better characters. In the early days of the game you could progress easily, but now I feel as more high-paying players have joined they want you to spend money to progress, and their prices really are absurd. The game is fun, but they're greedy. In the events especially, those who pay more get significantly better awards. A bit disappointing for those of us that have supported the game with occasional purchases from the beginning.

Don't listen to the haters who say it's Pay for Play and DB is a greedy company. It's bull, no amount of money will get you where time invested into the game will. Oh, and if the game even loads slow for a second DB is likely to send free stuff. If people complain about somthing...free stuff. So I say keep up the great work! One thing though, I'd be awesome if we could name our starbases. Just a thought.

Love everythinggg tho id like to like i want to controle the ship my self manuver it myself open world like eh thats my piont this might change the game and other peoples view/perspective pionts but it would complete my dream of getting the one thing i always love and always will love star trek.😁

comments: This game is amazing a full on batlle with strategic ways to beat your opponent. The only thing im concern with is not seeing much to do in an alliance than donating troops. I would like to see a way were you can team battle and get awards but other than that its a five star game

This game is amazing! But enemy units keep getting stuck behind walls Also there are a few enemy lands that are not responding when you tap on them. This didnt happen before.  I think updating attack list would be good. So you could see who you have attacked, not just who attck you. Just  a thought

Very bad customer support!!! I was lost my phone and they can't help me to back to my account where I was spend lots money and time . I get access to my email ( i was ask for authorization code on email... refused )I can show my transaction from bank account...refused. only I don't have transaction on my Google play I don't know why.  Very poor help!

It's a great game but I think it be better if you created workers and mined,  lumbered, and gather favors or technology like warcraft use to be like.  The commands are also touchy and the battle displays for viewing if kinda difficult to  keep up with. But it's fun and a little bit addictive.

Amazing graphic but really poor gameplay... Even lowest level, it's hard to complete easy campaign. Every win need to paid. Useless to raid... Uninteresting how the mission needed to complete... Disliked this game bcoz of the poor gameplay and the way of how to complete the mission.

Awesome graphics. Awesome concept. You actually choose your tactic. Not just...."I'm going to send a march at a castle and hope for the best" like so many other games do now. In my opinion, its a very nice single player game. Only things that would make it more intriguing would be the addition of defensive towers or being able to attack at same time with an ally. Other than that, great game. And you don't NEED to spend money!

comments: Love playing but have 2 suggestions. We need another mill.  When we have large orders to fill it takes forever to complete those orders because the mull is tied up all the time. Maybe every 40 levels add a mill purchase option. When selling on the market, we need an option for a blind add or a neighborhood only sell or trade.. make these upgrades and so far game would be perfect!

It's great to be able to buy from other farms in theory. But there are WAY too many times that you click on something and it's either sold or not even in the roadside stand at all. The for sale paper needs to update quicker.  Also, it's very hard to accumulate any 'west bucks' in this game and you need them to do almost anything, so the game is a big money suck too. I'm deleting it.

I love these type of games just like hayday. I have noticed it freezes and takes ages to load the newspaper. Also would be helpful if it could tell you who needs help in the newspaper would help filling orders quicker. Also I have noticed alot of people selling the same parts and harder to get others and it's extremely rare to get the land parts without paying

The game doesnt give enough case vs things to buy or fix.  Also have issues with getting product into the alloted spaces.  I thought it was my screen but had it cleaned thoroughly and it still happens.  It takes several attempts!!!  The story is cute.  The graphics are cute as well.  Ive noticed it has a couple of choices from other games Ive played on older phones. I would suggest the game to others but get the issues fixed and itll be a 5star game.

I love playing these games. I'm not sure why we are rating gameplay they offer apps not a game. It's crazy how they ask us to rate game at the beginning of game. We haven't learned the bad points. This game makes us pay for treasure chest instead of giving us to them free like most games. Which means we have to pay for everything. Totally not fair. Takes the fun out of game.

The game itself is fabulous. Cute farm. Good graphics. Good work on that front. Yet being a bit more generous with westbucks in game or making some things more payable with your coins. I get that games don't create themself. But I personally am more likely to pay for games you can actually play for a bit after doing a purchase. And I don't really get that feeling here. But none the less the game itself is a work of art 😊

comments: Really enjoy this game but its very hard to do well unless you pay real money to buy extras! There should be more benefits without paying for them and each comoleted challenge should provide more money and diamonds than it currently does! And it should be easier to move up levels- I've played for months now and still only at level 5! People will just get bored of playing

So this game Is fun and addicting BUT it favors those with money to spend. I understand that the creators of the app want money from it but at least make it fair for the players when it comes to voting on outfits and such l. The hair accessories in this game cost $10 which is 1 accessory for 3 -5 hairstyles. That's a rip off.

A very addicting, interesting game. The graphics are very real and there are hundreds of styles and brands to choose from. One problem is, it is very hard to budget your money. You get diamonds and tickets every day, which helps, but it is still hard to keep a good income. Otherwise, Covet Fashion is a great game, and I would definitely recommend it.

So the new GM for Covet has blatantly admitted that they are pandering to LCV/new players now. I have spent THOUSANDS on this game to get myself to hcv in 11mos and now I'm being screwed over for it? What kind of business favors new customers over established ones that spend the most money? These are the same players that have openly admitted to voting against us!

Love this game. Only thing I don't like is that when you buy something it only gives you one item. In the Design game it gives you several when you purchase an item. I find it hard to play this game bc I run out of money and diamonds too quick. If that aspect changed I would give it 5☆

I love this game, but some of the glitches are very annoying. For example I just bought a shirt for a challenge and it will not let me use it. This has happened before. I've probably lost a few thousand dollars of in game money because of this glitch. There are other glitches but that's the worst one. Overall the game is fun though.
description: Show off your great style with Covet Fashion, the game for the shopping obsessed! Join millions of other fashionistas, discover clothing and brands you love, and get recognized for your style! Feed your shopping addiction and create outfits in this fashion game designed to hone your style skills. Express your unique style by shopping for fabulous items to fill your closet, putting together looks for different Style Challenges and voting on other players’ looks. Plus, win exclusive in-game prizes for looks that earn 4 stars or more!SHOP THE BEST STYLES. We’ve partnered with brands like Calvin Klein, Rachel Zoe and Vince Camuto to bring you the latest fashions to obsess over. With over 175 brands to shop from you’re sure to discover styles you love.STYLE THE PERFECT OUTFIT. Choose from thousands of glamorous clothing and accessory items in addition to chic hair and makeup styles on our new diverse array of models to create looks for various styling challenges such as photo shoots, cocktails and red carpet fittings.VOTE ON WHO WORE IT BEST. descriptionHTML:
Show off your great style with Covet Fashion, the game for the shopping obsessed! Join millions of other fashionistas, discover clothing and brands you love, and get recognized for your style! Feed your shopping addiction and create outfits in this fashion game designed to hone your style skills. Express your unique style by shopping for fabulous items to fill your closet, putting together looks for different Style Challenges and voting on other players’ looks. Plus, win exclusive in-game prizes for looks that earn 4 stars or more!

SHOP THE BEST STYLES. We’ve partnered with brands like Calvin Klein, Rachel Zoe and Vince Camuto to bring you the latest fashions to obsess over. With over 175 brands to shop from you’re sure to discover styles you love.

STYLE THE PERFECT OUTFIT. Choose from thousands of glamorous clothing and accessory items in addition to chic hair and makeup styles on our new diverse array of models to create looks for various styling challenges such as photo shoots, cocktails and red carpet fittings.

VOTE ON WHO WORE IT BEST. Cast your vote and decide what’s hot on the Covet Fashion scene! Over hundreds of thousands of entries per styling challenge! Are other players’ looks 5-star worthy or did they miss the mark?

PLAY WITH FRIENDS. Want to get advice on your outfits or celebrate your wins? Join a Fashion House to make friends or connect to Facebook and chat about any and all things Covet Fashion.

Did you know you can shop your favorite Covet Fashion items in real life? All of the clothing and accessory items featured in the game link to places where you can buy them for your real-life closet. Not only can you discover new brands and trends, you can own them, too!

Download Covet Fashion now and start styling!

description: The Tribez is not just a game where you build a farm! The Tribez is an adventure where you travel to a distant past full of secrets, mysteries, and many hours of addictive exploration of an unknown, but beautiful world!  You are invited to visit a primitive world inhabited by a peace-loving people, who have been hidden beyond a miles-deep portal from time immemorial. Build your own stone-age village, explore territorieshidden by mountains and seas, farm fertile lands, and lead your tribe, which considers you sent by the gods, to prosperity.  The Tribez is a world in which you feel alive!REVIEWS:‘The Tribez’ is the insanely popular empire-building game that’s revolutionizing the idea of social gaming.’ (http://www.thedailybeast.com/) ‘The design is so beautiful and there is so much detail that it's a real pleasure to navigate through the scenes and help the villagers.’ (http://www.appszoom.com) ‘What makes The Tribez genuinely pleasant to play is the attention paid to the graphics.’ (http://www.gamezebo.com)KEY FEATURES:✔ This game works when you’re offline too – play it on a plane, in the subway or in the car. Enjoy! ✔ Simple, intuitive controls. ✔ Adorable characters you’ll love! Meet the farmer, the builder, the tax collector, and many others!✔ A beautiful vibrant world you'll be immersed into instantly.✔ Lively animations make the prehistoric world come to life. You’ll be mesmerized by how the crops growon the farm and how the builders work on construction sites.✔ Tons of items, characters, buildings, and decorations.✔ Truly inexhaustible possibilities to develop your own stone-age empire by producing goods, increasingyour population, expanding your borders and attempting to farm the best lands.✔ Hundreds of captivating quests: search for treasure and artifacts, discover distant islands, explore mysterious caves, grow unusual crops on your farm, and much, much more!The game uses in-app purchases. In-app purchases can speed up gameplay. descriptionHTML:
The Tribez is not just a game where you build a farm! The Tribez is an adventure where you travel to a distant past full of secrets, mysteries, and many hours of addictive exploration of an unknown, but beautiful world! You are invited to visit a primitive world inhabited by a peace-loving people, who have been hidden beyond a miles-deep portal from time immemorial. Build your own stone-age village, explore territorieshidden by mountains and seas, farm fertile lands, and lead your tribe, which considers you sent by the gods, to prosperity. The Tribez is a world in which you feel alive!

REVIEWS:
‘The Tribez’ is the insanely popular empire-building game that’s revolutionizing the idea of social gaming.’ (http://www.thedailybeast.com/)
‘The design is so beautiful and there is so much detail that it's a real pleasure to navigate through the scenes and help the villagers.’ (http://www.appszoom.com)
‘What makes The Tribez genuinely pleasant to play is the attention paid to the graphics.’ (http://www.gamezebo.com)

KEY FEATURES:
✔ This game works when you’re offline too – play it on a plane, in the subway or in the car. Enjoy!
✔ Simple, intuitive controls.
✔ Adorable characters you’ll love! Meet the farmer, the builder, the tax collector, and many others!
✔ A beautiful vibrant world you'll be immersed into instantly.
✔ Lively animations make the prehistoric world come to life. You’ll be mesmerized by how the crops growon the farm and how the builders work on construction sites.
✔ Tons of items, characters, buildings, and decorations.
✔ Truly inexhaustible possibilities to develop your own stone-age empire by producing goods, increasingyour population, expanding your borders and attempting to farm the best lands.
✔ Hundreds of captivating quests: search for treasure and artifacts, discover distant islands, explore mysterious caves, grow unusual crops on your farm, and much, much more!

The game uses in-app purchases. In-app purchases can speed up gameplay.
