comments: I absolutely love the story line and I've spent more on the game than I'd like to admit. But spending money doesn't really get you much farther because the energy goes so quickly. I think you would get far better reviews and more happy customers if you got rid of the energy system and upped the ads for more revenue from that standpoint. Then you could keep the micro transactions for the secret scenes. This way you'd still be making money,  but your customer retention would go up. I have so many ideas that would help this app out and I'd love to share them as I love this story. If you are interested in what I have to say please reply

I love the game. Wish we didnt have to pay for every secret scene and had a little bit more energies before having to wait for more or buy some. Would be great if we had more options for free energy. Love the story and characters. Hurry with season two already!!!  Im anxious to see further stories on ryan and the character Lol ❤.

It's really a good game. It's awesome! But that energies are my main problem! Don't you think that...... only 300 energies that means only 30 lines are not enough and too little for a day..!?..!???!.. and 10 energies per line isn't too much!!??! Please make it down to 5 energies for each lines...and only for dialogues.. And if you give 500 or 100 energies (if 1 line cost 5 energies then there will be only 100 or 200 lines. Not much for a whole day!!!!!) and take 10 hours to get free energies again then the game will be perfect!! Everyone can't buy energies (including me)! You know! Please consider this case sympathetically.!.!..  I beg you.....!....

Lovely story line... love story that keeps you coming back everyday.... at times we are urged to buy energies.. however the energy provided gives sufficient dosage of the story each day... sad that it's going to get to the end...  And i wish I could go back and re read certain moments which is not possible.... apart from it.. this is amazing...

Great storylines!!! Great graphics!  However the energy to even do one chapter is way too low!!!  There should be more choices in filling up the energy.  Let your veiwers choose to watch more ad's or something similar to games where each day you can have one chapter and keep the secret moments as a paid option.  I myself would  have more of my friends play,share and even buy if the cost wasn't $100+ for ten chapters!  Oh and FYI check your editing just a few hiccups in a few clips.   Huge fan on the writer/authors...  Very steamy!! Sincerely JR

This game is misleading. You can only play the "secret scenes" if you pay, but the wording makes it sound like your choice so you keep playing in hopes you can see one. And the secret scenes I assume are the ones which actually push the relationship forward. The game staggers and is deeply misleading.
description: Is-It Love? Ryan invites you to join our community of virtual romance novels enthusiasts! In this epic & stunning visual novel game, your choices affect the progress of your love story in this CYOA (choose your own adventure) style Otome game. Install now, choose your story and start your flirting game today!Choose Your Own AdventureStart your adventure-filled romantic game with incredible features unlike any other role games, including original anime style illustrations and multiple episodes waiting to be unlocked in this sensational visual novel!  Will you find true love? Or will you pass up on meaningful relationships? The choice is in your hands in this one-of-a-kind love story game.Your Romance Story Comes to LifeYour dazzling love story begins at the heart of the bustling metropolis of NYC, where you’ve got it made! You’ve got a great apartment in the city and your good friends, Matt and Lisa, to keep you company. But the best part of your exciting single life is your job as a marketing assistant at the influential Carter Corp. An unexpected occurrence has you questioning everything that is familiar as you encounter Ryan, the enterprise’s mysterious CEO. Your new connection can change everything, not only in your professional life, but in your romantic life as well! With Ryan Carter at your side, you may have just found your true love! You will be unstoppable and soar up the ladder of your professional life but beware of the consequences. The flirting games & love games you are playing may come at a cost…Stunning FeaturesUnlock secret love stories and dating games as your love story progresses to a passionate and stunning romance in this beautifully written free story game. Enjoy exquisite features to help you create your story:Superb Anime style illustrations to go along with the romance novel you createUnlock exciting secret scenes that will get your heart racing Real story telling from the creative work of a real author in this beautiful love story Replay a completed episode for alternative outcomes and previously undiscovered visuals based on the new choices you makeThese role-playing romance games for girls are available in 6 languages (English, French, German, Portuguese, Spanish and Italian) Whatever CYOA-style adventure you’re after, Is It Love? Ryan, has got it. Install today and be the writer of your love story and choose your own path.Follow us on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/Is.it.Love.Games.world and stay informed of all our updating news. Any queries? Any questions? Contact our client support : http://1492studio.freshdesk.com “Is it Love” is a free game. You do, however, have the possibility of buying bonus points. You can deactivate your purchase possibilities through your device set-up. Internet connection required some additional fees may be applied.

comments: I love this game. Just like other reviews say, it is addicting and because there are constant tasks to complete. Plus!..unlike other games, there is no way you ruin out of coins/money. The cities bring in alot. I can't agree with one reviewer that megabucks are hard not come by.  I began with 25 I believe (now at 32) and some of the tasks to complete give megabucks without spending actual money to even purchase some.  All in all, try this game and you won't run bored of it.

Best game!! Very addictive, Been playing this game for over a year.. although, there are still alot to improve!  I hope the developers will include edit mode in the next update so that the players can rearrange their city..Also, I hope they will also include a 360 rotation of the city and add factories that can also create materials needed in the game like the railroad materials and steels. I am looking forward with this updates!!

Great, but really needs "sell all" function for dealing with store house and "pecial buildings" components.This is a really quality game, looks amazing, works well and has good timed construction projects. However, as others mention it takes SOOOOOOO long to accrue the assets for construction and the mega bucks for expansion. You have to be VERY patient if you are not willing to part with actual cash. An idea might be to offer a conversion of coins to megabuck, maybe get 1 buck in excahge for eg 5,000,000 coins?

Good game but......after a day into it you make no coin. After every level upgrade it pushes the (buy) equipment option. Not to mention every time you level up. You got to.exit out 15 boxes.before you can continue. Good game but, it's a failure on the free to play aspect.  My rating is fair and final. It's a (ok)  game but many better ones out thwre

The new update is great! Really appreciate the chat system. But it could be better... maybe add some functionality to the capital buildings and states.... maybe bonuses to taxes nd pop, loans, and coop science and military missions. The prices of capital building materials is ridiculous. Fixing these will make the state system look more complete.

Been playing for more than 3 years, i lost count. But this is a wonderful game which encourages teamwork and neighbor support. There are barely any paywalls in this game and  if you have hundreds of facebook friends who have this game you can easily get the materials you need to expand your city. No limits so far. I give ★★★★★s

comments: Great game. But can you pls change the user interface? Bcs it never change for years! It might be a lil think but it means everything so im not getting bored. And also, pls add some advance tactics like 'Tiki-taka', 'gegenpress', 'false nine', etc just like what you guys did in PC/PS PES 2018

I want to make comments what happened with my team if i compared with other team: 1. The passing is worst, my opponent is batter then mind 2. My players seem not to jump to challenge the opponent if the ball on the air 3. The development of the players are taking time..until 30 of age they only reach 90..its to late
Are you kidding? I am so mad right now because the apps crash in the middle of the third round of classic masters. Not once but twice!! Please fix this issue right away.. please, please

A great game now ruined. Constantly closing after or during a match and sometimes not even starting again. My Asus Z500m should handle it with ease yet I find myself frustrated with problematic behaviour from the game. Fix this. I've been sending feedback for months and nothing has been fixed.

Who made that script, for mobile games it has been the most exciting sports game. I must say it is very complicated specially in the starting but you get addicted to it just for its complications but love to be a manager.. Well done not easy to create such a difficult so deep kind of script.

Let me start by saying awesome game, great graphics playing on and off for years but what's is going on with this game play. Defenders literally running by ball carrier, ridiculous passes by my team and missing clear scoring opportunities. Slowness of my team, no attacking effort, no tackling effort, keeper not even stopping a single shot. Guess I need to just stop playing again. Overall good game just work on the gameplay and AI decision. Uninstalling.
description: This soccer simulation game for the Pro Evolution Soccer series has racked up a total of 28 million downloads from all over the globe.Major update with the 2017/18 roster included.New elements such as My Hometown area expansions with new facilities, an online live match mode against members in the same Association, and a ""Limit Break"" feature, which extends the players' potential maximum abilities, have been added in the new version.This world standard of soccer simulation games will continue to evolve.Test your soccer management skills in various roles, including as a coach, a scout, and a general manager against rivals from around the world![PES Console Game Engine on Mobile Devices]Enjoy playing realistic soccer matches with high-quality 3D graphics and analyzing tactics in realtime on an animated 2D screen.[Licenses Around the Globe]Official licenses for popular European and Southern American teams/leagues are included, with more than 5,000 authentic players.[Soccer Simulation Enjoyable for Core Strategists (Basic Gameplay All Free)]Simple controls allow you to easily set tactics during matches. The tide of matches will change based on your management skill.Experience gripping matches in which you are in total control.[Try out your Soccer Theory in Player Training Mode]Train players however you want by assigning them to a quality trainer and the training venue of your choice. You can compete against rivals around the world with the team built under your team concept.[User-Driven League]No need to log in at a fixed time. Play each season at your own pace.[Play the Global Standard of Soccer Games for Free]Winning matches with your own tactics/skills is more satisfying. Win League/Cup rewards to build your team. Bid for players on the market at the lowest price.We recommend PES CLUB MANAGER if you:・For those who want to construct a great stadium that will be iconic to the club's fans, just like how Borussia Dortmund did.・Possess a soccer philosophy like FC BARCELONA.・For those who are attracted to clubs like Borussia Dortmund, a team that contributes to their hometown and is loved by their local fans.・Believe tradition is important for a soccer club.・Think a soccer club can become something more than a ""club"".・Believe ""winning in a style"" is the ideal victory.・Think soccer is all about tactics.・Want to manage a dream team with your favorite players.・Want to become an owner of a soccer club with a long history.・Want to test out new soccer tactics.・Are curious about young soccer stars.・Are curious about mid-season transfers.・Watch national matches.・Root for young players in international tournaments.・Think training young generations is important.・Think philosophy is necessary for strong clubs.・Soccer is your favorite sport.* PES CLUB MANAGER is a free-to-play app. No purchases are required. All users can play the entire game free of charge, although purchasing PES Coins can speed up gameplay and help to strengthen your club faster. In-app purchases can be disabled by “limiting in-app billing” on the device used.Required OS: Android 4.2.0 or later*Operation is not guaranteed on other OSes.Compatible devices:https://www.konami.com/wepes/mobile/pescm/en/#compatibilty*Please note that support is not offered in response to inquiries that involve non-compatible devices.This is an online game only. Users must be connected to the internet (3G,4G,or Wi-Fi) to play. Internet connection charges may be incurred separately depending on the user's network environment.Use of this app requires agreement to the app’s Terms of Use, Virtual Currency Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy.License Rights:https://www.konami.com/wepes/mobile/pescm/en/#license
descriptionHTML:
This soccer simulation game for the Pro Evolution Soccer series has racked up a total of 28 million downloads from all over the globe.
Major update with the 2017/18 roster included.
New elements such as My Hometown area expansions with new facilities, an online live match mode against members in the same Association, and a ""Limit Break"" feature, which extends the players' potential maximum abilities, have been added in the new version.
This world standard of soccer simulation games will continue to evolve.
Test your soccer management skills in various roles, including as a coach, a scout, and a general manager against rivals from around the world!

[PES Console Game Engine on Mobile Devices]
Enjoy playing realistic soccer matches with high-quality 3D graphics and analyzing tactics in realtime on an animated 2D screen.

[Licenses Around the Globe]
Official licenses for popular European and Southern American teams/leagues are included, with more than 5,000 authentic players.

[Soccer Simulation Enjoyable for Core Strategists (Basic Gameplay All Free)]
Simple controls allow you to easily set tactics during matches. The tide of matches will change based on your management skill.
Experience gripping matches in which you are in total control.

[Try out your Soccer Theory in Player Training Mode]
Train players however you want by assigning them to a quality trainer and the training venue of your choice. You can compete against rivals around the world with the team built under your team concept.

[User-Driven League]
No need to log in at a fixed time. Play each season at your own pace.

[Play the Global Standard of Soccer Games for Free]
Winning matches with your own tactics/skills is more satisfying. Win League/Cup rewards to build your team. Bid for players on the market at the lowest price.

We recommend PES CLUB MANAGER if you:
・For those who want to construct a great stadium that will be iconic to the club's fans, just like how Borussia Dortmund did.
・Possess a soccer philosophy like FC BARCELONA.
・For those who are attracted to clubs like Borussia Dortmund, a team that contributes to their hometown and is loved by their local fans.
・Believe tradition is important for a soccer club.
・Think a soccer club can become something more than a ""club"".
・Believe ""winning in a style"" is the ideal victory.
・Think soccer is all about tactics.
・Want to manage a dream team with your favorite players.
・Want to become an owner of a soccer club with a long history.
・Want to test out new soccer tactics.
・Are curious about young soccer stars.
・Are curious about mid-season transfers.
・Watch national matches.
・Root for young players in international tournaments.
・Think training young generations is important.
・Think philosophy is necessary for strong clubs.
・Soccer is your favorite sport.


* PES CLUB MANAGER is a free-to-play app. No purchases are required. All users can play the entire game free of charge, although purchasing PES Coins can speed up gameplay and help to strengthen your club faster. In-app purchases can be disabled by “limiting in-app billing” on the device used.

Required OS: Android 4.2.0 or later
*Operation is not guaranteed on other OSes.

Compatible devices:
https://www.konami.com/wepes/mobile/pescm/en/#compatibilty
*Please note that support is not offered in response to inquiries that involve non-compatible devices.

This is an online game only. Users must be connected to the internet (3G,4G,or Wi-Fi) to play. Internet connection charges may be incurred separately depending on the user's network environment.
Use of this app requires agreement to the app’s Terms of Use, Virtual Currency Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy.

License Rights:
https://www.konami.com/wepes/mobile/pescm/en/#license
developerAddress: 東京都港区赤坂9丁目7番2号

• Bug fixes and optimization
summary: The club management simulation game of the "Pro Evolution Soccer" series!
title: PES CLUB MANAGER

comments: BEWARE!  They will take the system down and give you when it will be back up.  Only problem is they bring it up before the advertised time.  Meaning you are left vulnerable.  They do not follow their own rules.  They do not compensate players for their mistakes.  They let Chinese player buy packs cheaper and use at accounts.  If you are a Westerner do not play or pay on this game.  Their customer service sucks.  They actually try to get you to feel sorry for them.  Its amazing.  They will only steal from you.

This is definitely a pay to win game.  And I agree with previous reviews saying it favors Chinese players.  The developers claim it's not, but if it wasn't true, then why are 99% of the servers dominated by Chinese players?  Plus the Chinese to English translations are terrible.  You will barely understands what they're saying.
The game could use more tool tips and information to properly explain all of the content. If I hadn't played a similar style game before this would be difficult to understand for a beginner.
Nice that this game is helpful to a point. Yes could be a little bit more forthcoming about items and there do's and don't on Upgrades and applications
Just getting started I guess

The graphics are great and the game play is interesting but it's very independent to new players; from other players as well as the system itself. Like things that have been improved on in this genre of game in other apps are still frustrating here. Oh well, what can I expect from a freemium game? Overall it's enjoyable but I have to take it in doses; basically until I get frustrated by the gameplay or other players. All in all, there are worse was to spend your time.

descriptionHTML:
- Enter your country's guild and vie with players from all over the globe to become the ruler of the universe!
- When you download the game now, you'll be one of the first to receive $10 in new player boosters while supplies last!

I built, I sailed, I conquered!
Join the battle NOW!

With the expansion of the population, Earth is becoming increasingly crowded. The whole galaxy has turned into a new battlefield between human beings and extraterrestrial civilizations. Though governed by the Imperial Federation Government. The galaxy is still in the upheaval between various powers. On Planet Tekkman, you and alien creatures will operate your own space arks and create formidable fleets to confront against the Imperial Federation Government, fighting for living space and rebuilding the order.

Mighty Space Arks
- Construct your fortress on huge space arks.
- Operate the space ark on the battlefield in any way you deem.
- Battle like a carrier, attack your enemies while moving your ark.

Ultimate Galactic Military Power
- Upgrade your ark to elevate its power and change its appearance.
- Collect, equip and evolve terrific human and alien commanders.
- Establish your armed forces consisting of space infantries, mechs and spacecrafts.

MMO Strategic Gameplay
- Launch large-scale and real-time wars of alliance between hundreds of arks.
- Grab territories for your alliance with players from all around the world and chat through real-time translation.
- Dominate and govern a planet and rule over it. Use diplomacy to establish the order of your world.
- Trade your equipment and resources with other players and become a space merchant.

comments: I wasnt sure about this series at first, but it's really grown on me. The unique art style, interesting characters and immersive world make this an incredible game, especially considering it's a free mobile app! I would definitely love to see more sims like this in the future, (especially with the bad boy type). Seeing it transfer to desktop would be awesome! Overall, everything about this game is wonderful but, like everyone else says, the amount of energy given for free isn't enough! I think it would be wise to either lower the cost of energy actions take, give more free energy out, or split the story into parts in which 1 part can be played for free each day. Other than that it's a great sim!

My absolute favorite of all of the Is it Love games. Colin is an amazing character with an equally amazing backstory, and the way he connects with the MC is just incredible. The twists and turns in each chapter leave me craving more of the story. The energy they give you is somewhat lacking, but I'm used to it by now. Highly reccomend!

Really don't like how the guy treats the girl, what a scumbag! Plus I've been playing for over a week and the plot is unbelievably slow, the energy doesn't last long enough. There are much better otome style games out there.

Well the energy situation is beyond annoying. You only get very little for free and the prices for the energy and just WAY too expensive. I do like the story a lot though and will probably take 8 years to complete the story so I don't have to pay 50 bucks

OK, so I absolutely agree with everyone that the energy you get for free is nowhere near enough & packages are too expensive for what you get. I know, I've bought many. This story particular started bad, but now that I'm at the end, I'm hooked. Please continue to update. I have lots of bought energy going to waste!!

I don't really like the concept of earning energy every 24 hours. But I've got to say every time i see that message when my energy runs out. It leaves me on a cliffhanger and it keeps me in the story. Even if the energy wasn't there i would still play the game to my hearts content! Overall AMAZING story and characters!!
description: Is it Love? Colin is an  interactive story  in English.Like in a TV series, new episodes (chapters) are regularly released.You can download this love game for free. Will you find Love? Will you make it in the musical world? Story: "You come from a small town, you have a well-ordered life: Basic studies, a very respectful boyfriend and parents who decided on your future. You've always dreamed of becoming a pianist, But your father didn't look on it with a favourable eye, so you did what was expected of you. And then, one day, you felt trapped in your monotonous life. So you decided to leave it all behind and move to New York. But, after so many years, having put your dreams aside, your piano gathered dust and your mojo disappeared. At the Carter Corporation, you found a stable office job and good friends. And one night, Matt invites you along to a rock concert. A concert that changes everything. Your encounter with Colin, the leader of the group, turns your world upside down. This black-hearted character as stirring as he is inaccessible will awaken that old fire that burned in your heart: your love of music... " Main points: ✓ Experience a true love story✓ Your choices influence the course of the episode✓ 100% in English.✓ Become a rock starAn Otome is a visual novel type game in which you are the heroine about to live true romance (love story) with possible twists (Love, seduction, betrayal, marriage...) comments: First off to all those saying too many ads, there aren't any ads. What you're seeing is game packs that can be purchased to help you advance within the game. I love the game. Everythingis great. I just wish they would give everyone time to adjust to previous items before creating something new. And also the pricingis too high. $20-$50 is fine but $99 is way too much.

This game has become a cash cow for the developers at MZ. New features are added making the game more complex and diverse weekly. Costing players money. While old features players are familiar with and depend on break down  After contacting MZ you get a nice form letter stating thank you for bringing it to there attention but they hope you understand these things take time to fix.

This game should be awesome, but the updates just come too fast now. I bought 2 packs this week and still got zeroed as soon as i dropped shield. By the time you spend 2 days clicking upgrades, someone is stronger than you and just waiting for you to try to use your new stuff.

This game was fun about two years ago before MZ started trying to milk players each month for money.  If you buy a package from them,  which ranges from $14.99 to $399.99, make sure you get what you pay for. ..many times you don't get everything they promise; especially with the BOGO packages.   MZ will do little if anything to correct the matter.  Also, even after you spend tons of money, if you wait long enough they will give you the same stuff for free to all players.   My advice...find another game to play. ..something more fun and worthwhile. ..and not sponsored by MZ.

If you want to be at top of this game then be prepared to spend more than the price of a top end BMW in one year. I am not kidding. MZ releases major game changing upgrades every day for several $99.99 packs. Then you get tge worst customer support in the industry. Terrible software quality control and business practices that mirror drug cartels.

Mz took a once decent game and ruined it.  The weekly changes are senseless change is to be gradual.  Im finally walking away.  Im done with ur bots, done with admin accts and done with daily chances.  More and more people have quit and droves more will follow.  Choke on the money u got from all  of the foolish people who actually paid.  You deserve none of it
description: Don’t miss your chance to become legendary!Lead massive armies into epic battles against dragons, monsters, and players from around the globe in the most addicting, interactive strategy game! description: War is coming – Will you be ready? Summon heroes to defend your kingdom and charge the enemy in this one-of-a-kind RTS adventure!Magic Rush: Heroes is a revolutionary combination of skill-aiming controls, a thrilling, real-time PvP Ladder Tourney mode, exciting multiplayer World Map battles, simple yet addicting Tower Defense, and more! Experience the fun of multiple different genres all wrapped up in one extraordinary game.Rush forth on an unforgettable adventure that you won’t forget!FeaturesSummon Powerful Attacks With Skill-Aiming- Manually choose targets or directions when casting skills. You call the shots!- Summon attacks to stun, silence, knock airborne, heal and even interrupt enemy skills using precise controls- Strategy and speed combine. Master them both, and victory is truly in your hands!Hero Training Powers You Up to Defend the Kingdom- Role play as diverse hero types, including dozens of unlockable heroes with hundreds of distinctive skills.- Heroes can be combined in different ways and take the opposition by storm.- Upgrade your defender with equipment enhancing, rune inlaying, and unique upgrades and abilities for every kind of weapon.- RPGs and RTS combine to bring you the ultimate Equipment System.PvP Games in the Ladder Tourney- Charge to war in a global, cross-server PvP Arena with a turn-based ban/pick phase to level the playing field.- Defend your victory by strategically banning your opponent’s heroes depending on your own battle plan.- PvP combat offers awesome rewards for every season!War Strategy and RTS Gameplay- RTS combat challenges you to build your tower, upgrade your tech, and dispatch your armies to plunder resources from enemies.- Defend the kingdom together! Create alliances with millions of players from around the world to thrive in this war-torn landscape.- RTS battles let you conquer enemies to become the dominant alliance!Hero Tower Defense Combines Your Favorite Strategy Genres- An all-new “Hero Tower Defense” concept cleverly combines the heroes of the game with dozens of exquisitely designed Tower Defense stages.- Drop tower emplacements and activate Hero abilities in real time during exciting battles that you won’t want to put down!- Defend your based on one-of-a-kind map creations.Constant Updates Offer- New heroes- In-game events- Weekly updates based on your feedback and suggestions!- Hard-working developers are constantly updating and improving the gaming experience with new gameplay!Are you the defender this kingdom needs? descriptionHTML:
War is coming – Will you be ready? Summon heroes to defend your kingdom and charge the enemy in this one-of-a-kind RTS adventure!
Magic Rush: Heroes is a revolutionary combination of skill-aiming controls, a thrilling, real-time PvP Ladder Tourney mode, exciting multiplayer World Map battles, simple yet addicting Tower Defense, and more! Experience the fun of multiple different genres all wrapped up in one extraordinary game.

Rush forth on an unforgettable adventure that you won’t forget!

Features

Summon Powerful Attacks With Skill-Aiming
- Manually choose targets or directions when casting skills. You call the shots!
- Summon attacks to stun, silence, knock airborne, heal and even interrupt enemy skills using precise controls
- Strategy and speed combine. Master them both, and victory is truly in your hands!

Hero Training Powers You Up to Defend the Kingdom
- Role play as diverse hero types, including dozens of unlockable heroes with hundreds of distinctive skills.
- Heroes can be combined in different ways and take the opposition by storm.
- Upgrade your defender with equipment enhancing, rune inlaying, and unique upgrades and abilities for every kind of weapon.
- RPGs and RTS combine to bring you the ultimate Equipment System.

PvP Games in the Ladder Tourney
- Charge to war in a global, cross-server PvP Arena with a turn-based ban/pick phase to level the playing field.
- Defend your victory by strategically banning your opponent’s heroes depending on your own battle plan.
- PvP combat offers awesome rewards for every season!

War Strategy and RTS Gameplay
- RTS combat challenges you to build your tower, upgrade your tech, and dispatch your armies to plunder resources from enemies.
- Defend the kingdom together! Create alliances with millions of players from around the world to thrive in this war-torn landscape.
- RTS battles let you conquer enemies to become the dominant alliance!

Hero Tower Defense Combines Your Favorite Strategy Genres
- An all-new “Hero Tower Defense” concept cleverly combines the heroes of the game with dozens of exquisitely designed Tower Defense stages.
- Drop tower emplacements and activate Hero abilities in real time during exciting battles that you won’t want to put down!
- Defend your based on one-of-a-kind map creations.

Constant Updates Offer
- New heroes
- In-game events
- Weekly updates based on your feedback and suggestions!
- Hard-working developers are constantly updating and improving the gaming experience with new gameplay!

Are you the defender this kingdom needs? Download Magic Rush: Heroes and join the RTS war today!

PLEASE NOTE! Magic Rush is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Magic Rush.

description: Bei diesem Spiel handelt es sich um ein Strategie- und Aufbauspiel, dessen Hauptthema das Sammeln und Entwickeln von Monstern ist. Die Monster, die sich in dieser wundersamen Welt tummeln, verfügen über einen individuellen Entwicklungsweg. Außerdem können Spieler ihren Monstern Flügel und Reittiere zur Verfügung stellen. Besonders spannend wird es, wenn sich Spieler im Zweikampf messen. Doch neben dem Wettbewerb gibt es auch Kooperation! Verbünde dich mit deinen Freunden und gründet gemeinsam eine Arena! Dann könnt ihr zusammen gegen den Welt-Boss in die Schlacht ziehen! Dich erwartet das volle Spielvergnügen!

comments: Been playing this game for 2 yes now and I upgraded my phone to a Google pixel. The game worked for a couple days, but now I just have a black screen. I won't uninstall yet because I've spent a few hundred dollars on this game.  Please fix any bugs with the Google pixel so I can get back to taping

I love this game and these developers! They took a week of their own time and helped me sync my account, which I bet was not easy. That alone deserves 5 stars, but the game itself is amazing. It's a great time waster and has tons of story and puzzles in the stories if you read them. So overall I give a 10 out of 5 stars!

This gamebis fun,i just got the game 5 ninutes ago and im doing very good on this game.you can farm gold. [By countunelessley killing enimies.]my guy deals 17.60 milloion damage per tap.i give this game 5 stars

Game is actually mindlessly fun. Climb the ladder and get stronger, and win tournaments. However, the game is not balanced for casual players and the development put a huge emphasis on pay to play. If you want to climb you really have to give up your life and keep climbing, and pay so you can simply redo your skills as you gain more. Hard to justify committing so much time.

Love the game! That is until I got a new phone(LG G6) that is plenty capable of playing this game. Now it opens to a black screen and sits there. I'd love to continue to play, but unless this is fixed, I'll look for something else, not that I want to...
The new Valentine's update is annoying. Whenever I try to log into my existing account it keeps on saying unable to connect to server. Please fix I still like this game.

comments: I actually really like this game, graphics are beautiful and the concept is fun... problem is, I've had it a week and been in the game 4x. It doesn't load... like ever. I've restarted my phone, uninstalled and installed and nothing. It just sits on the opening screen, sadly I will have to delete. Wish I didn't have to but it's just wasting space on my phone now. Otherwise, I did enjoy it.

Its completely pay to play. You have to use diamonds to expand your land, but you can't earn them. You have to buy them with real money. It would be a problem if you could buy a small amount for like $0.99... But the minimum is $10 Its ridiculous.

I would love the game,if there was really something to do, no interaction,from what I've read this is a useless app.i got on after the update today,and my screen is blank except for my buildings,the scenery is gone,black! I am on a mobile and can't use any of the great functions everyone talks about. I can't even help my team,totally disappointed,that's for sure. And I've spent quite a bit of money. I am so bored.Theres only a couple things to enjoy on it.Come on ,why can't you get this game together for Android users?

Playing on the phone app. I am disappointed that I cannot play the full version. I cannot send messages to my fellowship members, I cannot see their cities, I cannot participate in the events with my teammates. All I am doing all day every day is trying to build up resources for upgrades, and those are high compared with how much you can make. You cannot earm free diamonds, and many of the buildings you cannot get without them. Will rate higher when these things are improved.

The game is beautiful, but its a bit to complicated. And the in app purchases are rediculus. I'd love it if you could actually advance in the games. There are just too many things needed to advance in the slightest. It's too bad cuz the game it has great graphics.
Game is great. Love building games. Only letdown is that is pay-to-win. It would be better if non-paying players would have little more easy time with game, like give more builders at least... 😉
description: BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS IN MAGICAL ELVENARChoose between elves and humans to build a beautiful, fantasy city. Discover a world of magic and mystery as you constantly build, develop and expand your realm. You decide how to advance your city as you gather resources, trade with other players and research ancient technologies. Whether you want to build a whimsical paradise or a well-organized metropolis, it’s easy to create a home for fantasy creatures and enjoy the detailed beauty of Elvenar.CHOOSE YOUR RACEPlay as powerful humans or magical elves to build as you see fitSTART INSTANTLYCity building is quick and easy with a friendly introduction and active communityEXPLORE THE WORLDDiscover new provinces to expand your cityTRADE WITH FRIENDSTrade goods and resources with fellow players and merchants in the marketplaceADVANCE YOUR CIVILIZATIONUpgrade your buildings to supply your growing populationWELCOME NEW CREATURESCreate a home for dwarves, fairies, dragons and other charming fantasy racesElvenar is based on the successful browser city-builder, published by InnoGames. Now players can enjoy the online fantasy fun on mobile, tablet and PC browser – all from the same account. Elvenar is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. A network connection is also required.Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/imprint
descriptionHTML:
BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS IN MAGICAL ELVENAR

Choose between elves and humans to build a beautiful, fantasy city. Discover a world of magic and mystery as you constantly build, develop and expand your realm. You decide how to advance your city as you gather resources, trade with other players and research ancient technologies. Whether you want to build a whimsical paradise or a well-organized metropolis, it’s easy to create a home for fantasy creatures and enjoy the detailed beauty of Elvenar.

CHOOSE YOUR RACE
Play as powerful humans or magical elves to build as you see fit

START INSTANTLY
City building is quick and easy with a friendly introduction and active community

EXPLORE THE WORLD
Discover new provinces to expand your city

TRADE WITH FRIENDS
Trade goods and resources with fellow players and merchants in the marketplace

ADVANCE YOUR CIVILIZATION
Upgrade your buildings to supply your growing population

WELCOME NEW CREATURES
Create a home for dwarves, fairies, dragons and other charming fantasy races

Elvenar is based on the successful browser city-builder, published by InnoGames. Now players can enjoy the online fantasy fun on mobile, tablet and PC browser – all from the same account.

Elvenar is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/imprint

comments: This is a great game. It's fun, addictive, and a great time killer. The only problem I see is that I created an account on the game thinking it would save. WRONG! I had to do a factory reset on my phone and now I have to start over. I was so far with some really good cards, but alas I know more about the game now, so maybe I'll get there quicker this time.

Don't bother downloading this game.  The customer service in this game is terrible.  I submitted a ticket because several combinations i researched in game disappeared.  I got a response that the game would fix itself and my ticket was being closed.  The problem didn't fix itself and i can't remember every combo lost. I submitted another ticket and I'm waiting for a response but after how my first ticket was handled I'm not confident they'll fix it. I've only been playing a few days but if the game is this buggy already then i don't recommend downloading it.

It's actually surprisingly fun. The card mechanics are simple to grasp but with a enough depth to keep you trying new decks and combos. I chuckled a few times at some of the dialouge between the characters. 10/10 would recommend

The game is addictive, but in short it's a gamble for cards. The prices are a lot for what you are getting. Lots of repetitive challenges. Unfortunately the quest for cards is really a quest for your wallet. I played since 9/16 and decided to walk away. Unfortunately you get to a point where the only way to move up is to spend, spend, spend. The gambling pulls for cards on real money game currency got old.

The main problem with the game in my opinion is being able to attack your opponent while they have other cards in play. Perhaps if you could choose to block rather than be forced to take it the game would be a bit better aa youd have to manage your resources a bit better rather than beat hard until its over. Aside from that it is a very fun game to play

Waste of money. No matter what you spend you never get decent cards. They stack the odds so no matter how you buy cards you'll always get ripped off. Mom's box is supposedly random yet I've bought hundreds of boxes I've never got anything worth a damn. I've played over a year and wasted a hundred bucks on this game w no reward. I strongly recommend you don't spend a dollar on this game. It won't help. The game will still screw you. Money will not help on this game.
description: FAMILY GUY! BOB’S BURGERS! FUTURAMA! AMERICAN DAD! KING OF THE HILL!  It’s Animation Throwdown: The Quest for Cards! comments: I absolutely love this game. I make it a point to not spend money on mobile games cus they typically turn out to be a cash trap, but this was just like buying a regular video game. No adds, and even before buying the full game it doesn't shove "buy our product" notifications down your throat. Nintendo has always had good games and I have no doubts that I will keep playing this every day.

Was pretty short to begin with but Nintendo has supported this game well, adding additional content, even a new mode. The simplified game mechanics to fit Mario gaming on a phone work great and feel natural. The story with it's additional challenges to open new courses are fun, toad run is addictive, the remix 10 is somewhat redundant content wise but also good. I'd rather pay $10 up front than have in-game purchases, the reception to this game indicates that I'm very much in the minority on that. Great game, very fun for a quick session of Mario.

Awesome update! Make the game worth again, when it seems Nintendo had abandoned Super Mario Run, they back and release more content for the half of the price. This is the kind of update I was waiting for, once I didn't paid the game yet, I think this could be a great time to purchase. Probably in the future they will release more content, but the price will back to 9.99, so the best time to purchase is now! Great job Nintendo, I love your games since my childhood.

Awesome and all, but you only get 4 levels for free. To go to world 2, WHY IN THE UNIVERSAL WORLD RIGHT HERE IN A CITY (lol😀) DO YOU HAVE TO BUY WORLD 2, 3, 4, 5, AND 6? TALK ABOUT A RIPOFF! 😞 (Warning to Nintendo: If you dont fix this soon, I'm deleting. Sorry!)

Favorite game. It has a one time cost for full version and not a monthly fee or several different things you have to buy to enjoy it. I like the updates with the remix, and the star courses. I didnt like that there was so little to do before I bought it. I got bored quick. But was surprised by the cost, and love it after buying it. I do wish we could see our friends land and share things we don't need and give rally tickets to others.

This is just proof Nintendo can make amazing games no matter the platform. All the bad reviews are people's mad you gotta pay for the game. Lol wut? It's a great time killer made  by the best gaming company in the world and you're mad it's not free? Funny. There's no IAP.  It's not pay to win. But it is the most fun 5$ will ever buy you.

Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.・ More playable charactersIf you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?・ More courses in Toad RallyThe types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.・ More buildings and decorations in Kingdom BuilderThe types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. descriptionHTML:
A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.

You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!

Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.

■World Tour
Run and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser’s clutches!
Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.

Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.

After rescuing Princess Peach, a nine-course special world, World Star, will appear.

■Remix 10
Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!
This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!

■Toad Rally
Show off Mario’s stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.

In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.
Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow.

■Kingdom Builder
Gather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.

Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.

■What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds

・ All courses in World Tour are playable
Why not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?

・ Easier to get Rally Tickets
It's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.

・ More playable characters
If you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?

・ More courses in Toad Rally
The types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.

・ More buildings and decorations in Kingdom Builder
The types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.

・ Play Remix 10 without having to wait
You can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.

*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
developerAddress: 京都府京都市南区上鳥羽鉾立町11-1

There are also some brand-new courses, a new playable character, and a new feature that lets you listen to your favorite music while you play!
Why not try out the updated Super Mario Run?"
summary: Control Mario with just a tap!
title: Super Mario Run

comments: Not a bad game but it's typical like some other games. It starts off with the levels being super easy, letting you build your confidence to get you thinking you're really good.  Now I understand the higher the levels the more difficulty there is but not to the point where they make it almost impossible trying to get you to buy more chances. Another words they're trying to get you to pay to win and advance not necessarily on skill level. Very sneaky. Uninstalling. It's fun for a while but overall I do not recommend.
I love this game, but this afternoon it's going in slow motion! It's very hard to play this way! Everything else is working fine I'm my phone. I even restarted it to see if that would help - no luck!

Love this game, but it freezes up. I go to try and reinstall it after a few days but it won't let me reinstall the game. Just stays at the same  level last completed. Still having the problem of when having to reinstall I lose all my lives and charms. Love the game but hate ,owing all my lives and charms

The update took me from level 400 back to level 1 very upset be first I wasn't getting my daily play rewards so I figured like everything else it may need to update and the update blow my whole progress. I'm so pissed is there a way to fix this?

I actually enjoyed the game and would give it four or five stars except 200 coins and multiple items were taking away simply because I got logged out if Facebook. Also several levels were lost.... This I understand, glitches happen. What I don't understand and don't accept is the lack of response from the developer. I've sent several emails and have yet to get a non automated response.
I installed the game about 3 times and gave up. Can't connect with Facebook and when playing it suddenly stop and say it's not responding.

comments: Overall great game as far as playing is concerned. Major thing that could use work is matchmaking. Currently an 89 overall getting matched against 98-105 overall players. No chance to win and may discourage some people from playing the game. The gameplay is awesome and I have lots of fun, 100% worth your time if you avoid Head-to-head or tournaments (unless you have money or don't mind being poorly matched).

This is my full honest review. Madden Mobile is back!! I'll admit before it was not fun and I complained that you need to pay to win but EA really did good when I came back to play. The game is fun and is somewhat easy to get 100 overall players and now they are bringing back Draft Champs and I have seen early drafts and it looks great. The promos are great. I would like to say great job EA on bringing this game back and making it fun. I always want to play everyday and build my Ultimate Team

I have played this game for 3 seasons now.  I can't even begin to say all that is wrong, but one of the things that stands out most to me, is that your players stats mean nothing.  You spend a lot of time and effort completing events and grinding, and improve your team only to find out that when you play a team way below your level, it seems that that teams players are much faster and tend to play way above their ability.  this game seems to have the liberal bug that everyone is equal.  I am done with this game, don't get caught up with it, it's not worth the waste of your time

Thanks alot EA for this new head to head style. Great to know that all the grinding and work put in is only allowing those who have a 100 overall or better reap the rewards. Everytime playing one of these individuals they have a counter for every single play. This really turns me off to the game.

For the person hoping to find Madden 18, this is the closest thing you are gonna get. Yes, it doesn't have practice mode or my player mode, but it DOES have a incredible roster of players that you bargain for. The graphics are pretty good for a game on a smartphone.  Overall, this game is a MUST HAVE for NFL fans. 10 outta 10.

You know I really like all of the Live Events but when I get these old collectible cards that aren't worth anything I have to cut them one by one. It takes way too long and I've got over a hundred. I would suggest having a way to group delete or in Madden terms "cut" the old dead weight.
description: KICK OFF AN ALL-NEW SEASON WITH OUR BIGGEST UPDATE EVER, INCLUDING COMPETITVE TOURNAMENTS, PLAYER LEVELING, ENHANCED VISUALS, AND OUR FIRST-EVER STORY MODE. Be the G.O.A.T. in the greatest Madden NFL season yet. Become the GM of your favorite football franchise and handpick a team of stars and legends. Train with the best as Tom Brady takes you through his favorite drills and provides tips on building an unstoppable team. Compete in Tournaments, win the Super Bowl, stay up to date with the real NFL, and play through the careers of current football icons. It’s all here, it’s all fresh, in Madden NFL.  BUILD YOUR ALL-PRO TEAMChoose your NFL franchise and take over as GM. Stack your squad with current stars and Hall of Famers, then level them up with rare Super Skills. comments: I've been playing this game, since it came out. I love it the same as I did then to now. This game does allow f2p to challenger some p2p as well. Sure there is a point where there is a wall, but at least you know your one of the strongest. Plus it makes me want to climb that wall, and topple whales.

Maybe one of the best games that still let you play to win. You can get everything with enough patience and a little luck. If you do want to pay though, it's gonna be pretty expensive and the stuff you get does not really let you advance a lot (unless you actually spend A LOT of money).

+ Easy to play + Good story line + Also easy to get the items + I like the game mechanic  - Need more challenging on battle - Need table of hero type - Inventory items don't include the gear being use  Overall i like this game, very good. Also, more hero will make this game more good. And... adding charge chain attack will be awesome  Edit: After update my account was lost, please fix it

This game is great. It doesnt beat you over the head with paywalls, you could probably play f2p and still have a ton of fun. Graphics are good and mechanics are deep and satisfying. Only complaint is the reddit coommunity, but cant blame the devs for that.

Previous rating was 👍👍. Now 👍.  Content drought at the end of the game with some very expensive in app purchases. End game is killing the same dragon or farming the same level over and over and over...there are daily tasks which are a chore. Hoping for quality of life improvements similar to what the reddit suggests.   I really like the art style.

Great game with the most responsive and generous developers.  The only thing bad about this game is the toxic gaming community.  Full of unjustifiable whiners who are so poor they need their freebies for EVERY event or else they have a hissy fit and threaten to quit game AND also cry koz of nerfs on their heroes and threaten to quit(but really don't). They also attack every person who does spend for the game (casual spender or whale) God-forbid the devs need to also earn for a living.

comments: Amazing game very addictive...  Love the fact that they have a specials  more often... Also like the events with the second hospitals... Would like if we had special events more often... Just wish we had a platform to save the game my sister had to restart the game 6 times i had to do it twice... Wou be great to save progress on fb or another platform... Even log in  Really frustrating when we lose progress.... I only need 5 more characters then I'll have them all... So if i lose progress again im not starting over  Overall my favorite game on my phone!! Thx

I couldn't get enough patients, I couldn't get enough cash, and my staff energy seemed to drain way too fast. I love the surgery games but you maybe get one of those a day. I ended up uninstalling when room upgrades said they would take 12 hours. Too much waiting, not enough action. I liked the story so far too. Maybe I'll reinstall in the future if the times go down.

Controls don't work properly during surgery! There is lot of lag while performing an action while the timer works properly. Moreover, it doesn't allow me to suture the skin, even if I'm trying to do it right (it worked at the begining). Please fix these bugs or I will uninstal the game...

Love the overall feel of this, though some things need tweeking. For example, I only have half of the staff available and am now getting far too many duplicate cards concidering how many I have left to get. Makes it feel all too much like it's pushing people to spend real money, something that always ends with me deleting the game and moving on. Hope this doesn't happen in this case, but I'm not holding my breath...

It's a nice game, I like the concept, you get to operate on patients and manage a hospital. Problem with the recruitment part, it was always giving me surgeons and wasted 200 hearts on the same person. There should be an option if you want to fire someone or replace with another staff. The biggest issue is with their connectivity, internet connection is very stable works with all apps except for this one, no idea why. Fix it please I would hate to delete this game. Thanks.

This game will cheat you! I  upgraded a bunch of my characters but the next time I logged in nothing had saved! The funds I used to upgrade were also gone, of course. Don't waste money buying anything because the upgrades you make just disappear.
description: Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital! Game Characteristics🚑  Play the most realistic surgery simulations🚑  Build your own hospital🚑  Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives🚑  Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department🚑  Dive into two captivating seasons 🚑  Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and contentPERFORM SURGERIESPerforming challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITALBuild and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMALive dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors. Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!
descriptionHTML:
Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital!

Game Characteristics

🚑 Play the most realistic surgery simulations
🚑 Build your own hospital
🚑 Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives
🚑 Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department
🚑 Dive into two captivating seasons
🚑 Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and content

PERFORM SURGERIES

Performing challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!

BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITAL

Build and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!

EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMA

Live dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors.

Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!

description: EXCITING 3D ACTION3D graphics and simple controls make for free-flowing and fast-paced hack-and-slash action.EPIC SPECIAL MOVESUnleash each Bleach character's unique special moves to carve your way to victory. Special moves are fully voiced by the original Japanese anime voice actors.THREE'S COMPANYCombine your favorite characters into teams of three. You can even make combinations of characters you would never see in the original story. The possibilities are almost limitless!RELIVE THE BLEACH STORYFollow the Bleach story from the moment Rukia and Ichigo first meet. Develop your characters as you complete quests that recreate pivotal scenes from the story.BATTLE OTHER PLAYERSCompete in weekly leagues. Pit your best warriors against other players' teams and vie for the top spot.DEVELOP YOUR CHARACTERSBrave Souls features a highly flexible character improvement system that allows you to create exactly the warriors and the team you want. Enter battle and earn experience to level up characters and improve their base stats, Ascend them to increase their max level, train them on the Soul Tree to further improve specific stats, or link characters together to provide additional support. The choice is yours!Official Sitehttps://www.bleach-bravesouls.com/en/TwitterAccount: @bleachbrs_enHashtag: #BraveSoulsFacebookhttps://www.facebook.com/BleachBS.en/Recommended OS Android 4.0 or laterThe following permissions are necessary to play this game.Storage AccessPermission: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGEPermission: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGENecessary for the game to be able to store game data in an external location. These permissions only apply to Android versions earlier than 6. For Android 6 or later, you can still play the game even if you decline these permissions. Identity (find accounts on this device)Permission: GET_ACCOUNTSNecessary to receive push notifications.Camera/Microphone AccessPermission: CAMERA / RECORD_AUDIONecessary for using the video recording function.-----------------------------------------------------© Tite Kubo/Shueisha, TV TOKYO, dentsu, Pierrot
descriptionHTML:
EXCITING 3D ACTION
3D graphics and simple controls make for free-flowing and fast-paced hack-and-slash action.

EPIC SPECIAL MOVES
Unleash each Bleach character's unique special moves to carve your way to victory. Special moves are fully voiced by the original Japanese anime voice actors.

THREE'S COMPANY
Combine your favorite characters into teams of three. You can even make combinations of characters you would never see in the original story. The possibilities are almost limitless!

RELIVE THE BLEACH STORY
Follow the Bleach story from the moment Rukia and Ichigo first meet. Develop your characters as you complete quests that recreate pivotal scenes from the story.

BATTLE OTHER PLAYERS
Compete in weekly leagues. Pit your best warriors against other players' teams and vie for the top spot.

DEVELOP YOUR CHARACTERS
Brave Souls features a highly flexible character improvement system that allows you to create exactly the warriors and the team you want. Enter battle and earn experience to level up characters and improve their base stats, Ascend them to increase their max level, train them on the Soul Tree to further improve specific stats, or link characters together to provide additional support. The choice is yours!

Official Site
https://www.bleach-bravesouls.com/en/

Twitter
Account: @bleachbrs_en
Hashtag: #BraveSouls

Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/BleachBS.en/

Recommended OS
Android 4.0 or later

The following permissions are necessary to play this game.
Storage Access
Permission: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Permission: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Necessary for the game to be able to store game data in an external location. These permissions only apply to Android versions earlier than 6. For Android 6 or later, you can still play the game even if you decline these permissions.

Identity (find accounts on this device)
Permission: GET_ACCOUNTS
Necessary to receive push notifications.

Camera/Microphone Access
Permission: CAMERA / RECORD_AUDIO
Necessary for using the video recording function.

-----------------------------------------------------
© Tite Kubo/Shueisha, TV TOKYO, dentsu, Pierrot

comments: Nice Game! Thanks Devs! my only hope is that please make planting/ crops a little easier on us common folks,it gets a little bit tiring to have to press from seed>plant repeat (depending on your available field). description: Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!Endorsed By Gal Gadot! An Epic Fantasy RPG Adventure！An eternal cycle of conflict has turned the world of Elysium upside down. The endless power struggle has finally toppled the Angels from their place as the aristocracy. But this did not lead to peace. In fact, the strife between the Humans, Elves, and Orcs have intensified even more. All the while, lurking in the shadows, a nefarious power plots its revenge.When the Prophecy of the Apocalypse spread across the land, it became woven into the fabric of fate. Legend says only "Omega," an ancient relic of the Angels, has the power to alter fate and prevent the end of the world.Join the epic saga! EMPOWER YOUR HEROES, BATTLE WITH ANGELS! Reclaim the glory of the League of Angels![Game Introduction]The newest mobile game in award-winning League of Angels series is here! League of Angels: Paradise Land is the next epic fantasy RPG that will take you on a harrowing journey through the world of the Angels.Visually, the game features beautiful 3D graphics, dynamic scenery, and exquisite character design created by senior art director on GTA5. On the gameplay side, a new dual-resource combat system and incorporation of multiple genres like MOBA and Roguelike has created a unique and innovative mobile RPG for the LoA universe.	[Game Features]Superb Visual Presentation:- Stunning combat effects- Dynamic 3D scenery- Exquisite character art and designEngaging Strategy:- Epic Battles: Recruit Heroes and strategically build your team to defeat the forces of evil- Innovative Dual Resource combat system adds another layer of strategyMultiple Progression Methods:- Recruit Heroes, Augment and Ascend their power, learn and upgrade powerful Skills, and build your ultimate team- Thousands of Hero Equipment to find; Upgrade, Refine, and even Awaken them to unlock their true potential- Imbue your Heroes with new powers using the mystical Magistones- Hero Blessing allows all your Heroes add to your strengthWide Variety of Gameplay:- Honor Trial: Dungeon-crawling game mode based on the Roguelike genre- Labyrinth: Explore the darkest depths, find hidden treasures, and confront epic Bosses!- Arena: Battle players around the world, use strategy to conquer your rivals- Guilds: Create or join Guilds with hundreds of players, strive towards common goalsVisit the official website to start your saga: https://pl.gtarcade.com/Follow us on Facebook for a chance to earn special rewards: https://www.facebook.com/LoAParadiseLand/
descriptionHTML:
Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!

Endorsed By Gal Gadot! An Epic Fantasy RPG Adventure！

An eternal cycle of conflict has turned the world of Elysium upside down. The endless power struggle has finally toppled the Angels from their place as the aristocracy. But this did not lead to peace. In fact, the strife between the Humans, Elves, and Orcs have intensified even more. All the while, lurking in the shadows, a nefarious power plots its revenge.

When the Prophecy of the Apocalypse spread across the land, it became woven into the fabric of fate. Legend says only "Omega," an ancient relic of the Angels, has the power to alter fate and prevent the end of the world.

Join the epic saga! EMPOWER YOUR HEROES, BATTLE WITH ANGELS! Reclaim the glory of the League of Angels!

[Game Introduction]
The newest mobile game in award-winning League of Angels series is here! League of Angels: Paradise Land is the next epic fantasy RPG that will take you on a harrowing journey through the world of the Angels.

Visually, the game features beautiful 3D graphics, dynamic scenery, and exquisite character design created by senior art director on GTA5. On the gameplay side, a new dual-resource combat system and incorporation of multiple genres like MOBA and Roguelike has created a unique and innovative mobile RPG for the LoA universe.


[Game Features]

Superb Visual Presentation:
- Stunning combat effects
- Dynamic 3D scenery
- Exquisite character art and design

Engaging Strategy:
- Epic Battles: Recruit Heroes and strategically build your team to defeat the forces of evil
- Innovative Dual Resource combat system adds another layer of strategy

Multiple Progression Methods:
- Recruit Heroes, Augment and Ascend their power, learn and upgrade powerful Skills, and build your ultimate team
- Thousands of Hero Equipment to find; Upgrade, Refine, and even Awaken them to unlock their true potential
- Imbue your Heroes with new powers using the mystical Magistones
- Hero Blessing allows all your Heroes add to your strength

Wide Variety of Gameplay:
- Honor Trial: Dungeon-crawling game mode based on the Roguelike genre
- Labyrinth: Explore the darkest depths, find hidden treasures, and confront epic Bosses!
- Arena: Battle players around the world, use strategy to conquer your rivals
- Guilds: Create or join Guilds with hundreds of players, strive towards common goals


Visit the official website to start your saga: https://pl.gtarcade.com/
Follow us on Facebook for a chance to earn special rewards: https://www.facebook.com/LoAParadiseLand/

title: League of Angels-Paradise Land

comments: Well this is not a grate game this game is FANTASTIC  !!! Haven't seen any adds in over two weeks I've been playing it. I think they asked, but I came all by myself to rate it because its a grate game! Gorgeous graphics, controls are excellent, music is good  and most of all its quite interesting! Way to go people ! Thank you! Came back to update on my experience with this game. Over a month paying no  surprises, no adds, no asking to rate it just wonderful. Challenging at times than easyer and so on. Congratulations to the creators of this game and keep up the grate job!!! I am at the level 126!

I am at level 218, since the recent update I am unable to play, screen goes to loading the level them just keeps loading, I've uninstalled and reinstalled several times with the same result. There's a glitch that I wish would be fixed before I decide to uninstall for good. Lost all of my gold bars, all of my cherries upon reinstall. It's a shame.
Used to love this game. Now game is too difficult. Have to repeat level over and over again to move on. It is no longer fun to struggle at each level. That is frustrating...not relaxing.
AHHHH ONCE AGAIN AN UPDATE THAT WIPED OUT EVERYTHING I'VE WORKED FOR.  SOMEDAY YOU'LL FIX THAT BUG!  It's better than any of the others despite bugs.
Use to love it but shuts down every time I try to play lately!  Also have never been able to pick apples always says oops try again!

I lost  300+ gold & 700+ cherries after the game crushed last night. worst update ever   UPDATE 20 MAR: Would you please add a comfirm message when using 10 golds for play on? I have to restart  saving for  golds after the evil update, and I just lost all the 40 golds by wiping play on accidently due to slow respones of the game.
