comments: Buggy! Once they fix the signing bugs, this might be a good game. Now, there are widespread examples of users not being able to get in; instead, it freezes at a white screen.  Many videos crash the game, which means you lose the treat you would otherwise earn by watching those ads. Other crashing problems as well.

For not getting even the first event bird out of 3 in alien excavation after opening so many premium eggs reaching (*4) of the premium eggs. I blame - chimera and rovio. Either the makers of the game are idiots or the game is stupid and seriously 2000 per month for an imaginary egg everyday that cannot guarantee a 4 or 5 star bird. Yeah, the makers of the game really are idiots.

the game is really fun and humorous. I love the clan feature- found a great clan to be part of. there are glitches that rovio needs to iron out that affect play. I am hoping this new big update helps fix all that. the changes look to be really good. excited to see what they've done.

I did not expect to enjoy this nearly as much as I have. The frequent events are nice and having a guild just makes them better. I don't feel compelled to be social be because there is no chat, just playing the game. It is a wonderful balance.

Love the game. The game play is great. Only down side is that I feel that the game cheats against me sometimes by adding enemies. Only happened about 3 times now. ***edit*** I have since realized there are certain pigs that do add more pigs when hit. The game doesn't cheat. I'm extremely happy with the game play and ability to build a great team without paying a whole bunch of money. You just need patients and good planning.

Decent game, lots of fun to keep you coming back. I would of rated a 4 star game but every time I need to watch a video the game stops working, stopping me from getting a free premium egg or opening chests!
description: Collect, assemble, and evolve your flock.100+ crazy new Angry Birds?! We’re gonna need a bigger nest. The flock is bigger and badder than ever before. Build your own team, combine super skills and evolve your birds into their ultimate form.Embark on an epic adventure.Something sinister is brewing on Bird Island. Why are there so many pigs around? Who is behind the mysterious Bacon Corp? What’s the Eagle Force? Who lost the dungeon keys? Find the answers – only in Angry Birds Evolution.Crush the pigs in explosive battles.What’s worse than egg-stealing pigs? Over 90 different varieties of egg-stealing Pigs, that's what. Pirates, ninjas, tourists – someone has to clean this place up. Let the feathers fly in full contact battles and send the pigs packing.Join weekly events.Earn awesome rewards, and get a chance to add extra rare birds to your team by taking part in weekly events. Join by yourself or assemble a clan of buddies to compete with other clans. Build the strongest, most awesome clan on Bird Island and rule the roost! Compete against other players.The Oinktagon: two teams enter – only one leaves (victorious). Challenge other players in PVP tournaments of the Bird Island pastime, Pigball, and dominate the leagues for even more awesome rewards.FEATURES:– Over 100 colorful new characters to hatch and collect.– Assemble the ultimate flock of birds and take down the pigs with ease.– 5 Classes of birds with unique abilities.– Evolve your feathery heroes into unstoppable super birds.– Explore the island and stop the Bacon Corp.– Climb up the Eagle Mountain and win ultimate eggs.– Battle other players in the Oinktagon.– Join clans to unlock perks, compete with other clans, and chat with clanmates.– Send out scouts for rewards & challenges.This game may include: - Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13. - Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page. - Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.- This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. After the initial download, additional content will be downloaded and this may include data charges.
descriptionHTML:
Collect, assemble, and evolve your flock.
100+ crazy new Angry Birds?! We’re gonna need a bigger nest. The flock is bigger and badder than ever before. Build your own team, combine super skills and evolve your birds into their ultimate form.

Embark on an epic adventure.
Something sinister is brewing on Bird Island. Why are there so many pigs around? Who is behind the mysterious Bacon Corp? What’s the Eagle Force? Who lost the dungeon keys? Find the answers – only in Angry Birds Evolution.

Crush the pigs in explosive battles.
What’s worse than egg-stealing pigs? Over 90 different varieties of egg-stealing Pigs, that's what. Pirates, ninjas, tourists – someone has to clean this place up. Let the feathers fly in full contact battles and send the pigs packing.

Join weekly events.
Earn awesome rewards, and get a chance to add extra rare birds to your team by taking part in weekly events. Join by yourself or assemble a clan of buddies to compete with other clans. Build the strongest, most awesome clan on Bird Island and rule the roost!

Compete against other players.
The Oinktagon: two teams enter – only one leaves (victorious). Challenge other players in PVP tournaments of the Bird Island pastime, Pigball, and dominate the leagues for even more awesome rewards.


FEATURES:
– Over 100 colorful new characters to hatch and collect.
– Assemble the ultimate flock of birds and take down the pigs with ease.
– 5 Classes of birds with unique abilities.
– Evolve your feathery heroes into unstoppable super birds.
– Explore the island and stop the Bacon Corp.
– Climb up the Eagle Mountain and win ultimate eggs.
– Battle other players in the Oinktagon.
– Join clans to unlock perks, compete with other clans, and chat with clanmates.
– Send out scouts for rewards & challenges.

comments: Last comment 2/19 I was in board 1170. Today 3/12 I am on 1240. Pkease fix the boards with the water buckets... The pieces fall on top of each other which prevents proper play. Also, when making moves the move I make is not the move that happens. Also, when watching the video for the xtra coin: when the video ends the game restarts taking me back to tohome screen to press play to enter back into the game.. Thank you loyal player!!

The sound effects of the tornado is kind of frightening but I don't fear because all the characters are near as I ease on down the road. The characters interactions will assist if I follow the yellow brick road. "I can't wait to meet the wizard" I believe I'm going to be granted more golden bricks to extend the yellow brick road. I'm curious like a lion. Lol. The best for the whole family. Thanks!

This is by far the greatest game that I've ever played! A lot of my friends play as well, so I  can enjoy playing for a long time. Caution: Very addictive game!!! I find it hard to stop playing once I start. This is one app that you're going to want to download if you want to have some fun.

I use to enjoy playing this game.  Lately though, there are less power ups to achieve and more of the movie tickets.  I would rather have the power ups than the tickets.  This is why I am changing the rating I previously gave of 5 stars to 3.  Also, you should really have more of the Glenda versus the Wicked Witch challenges.

Great game but I really wish that daily rewards are better. It used to be you would get a crystal ball often, money and other things that to help with game, but lately it has been stuoid little rewards like two coins or one row clear. What happened to good rewards for players that come on every day and expect to get a little help in the game play

I love this game except for ONE big aggravation.   When you win extended life you don't get to choose when to use it.  It starts immediately and sometimes you've been playing to complete a sprint or another section and you CANT play another two hours.   That means you lose that extra time.   Today I've lost a 3 hour extra play and now I'm about to lose another 2 hour play.   Very Annoying!
description: Match 3 down THE YELLOW BRICK ROAD™ in a magical puzzle adventure game featuring DOROTHY™, the SCARECROW™, the TIN MAN™ and the COWARDLY LION™! Magic awaits in the EMERALD CITY™! Join the fun by solving puzzles and unlocking magical movie Moments! Learn fun facts and trivia, and see never-before-seen stills from The Wizard of Oz! Discover the rarest Moments to learn more about your favorite movie! Match your way to meet the wonderful Wizard of Oz in this amazing puzzle adventure! The Wizard of Oz: Magic Match Features: MATCH 3 IN THE LAND OF OZ!- Match 3 with new and unique gameplay based on the beloved Wizard of Oz movie and characters!- Matching brings you farther down the Yellow Brick Road with hundreds of exciting levels to overcome on your way!- Match even faster with bonuses and power-ups from GLINDA THE GOOD WITCH™! Use Dorothy’s RUBY SLIPPERS™, Munchkin Lollipops and the Tin Man’s Axe to solve puzzles!- Get help from your favorite movie characters by dropping their Medallions to the bottom of the board. They will appear and provide assistance on your current level! BATTLE AGAINST THE WICKED WITCH!- Match 3 or more gems against the WICKED WITCH OF THE WEST™ as you battle to reach The Wizard of Oz.- The fantasy comes to life as you take on the Wicked Witch in turn-based matching combat. ADVENTURE IN A MAGICAL WORLD!- Visit Munchkinland, the Haunted Forest, and more enchanting locations on your way from Kansas to the Emerald City!- Discover brand new levels and your favorite beloved characters in each new region you unlock.- Adventure with friends from Facebook, sharing gifts as you go. COLLECTIONS - MOVIE FACTS & MOMENTS!- Unlock and collect new Moments for an all-new perspective on classic scenes from the film!- Learn fun facts about your favorite movie! Collect each type of Reel containing Moments to complete Sets for big rewards and to unlock the full magical experience! DAILY REWARDS AND EVENTS!- Redeem Dorothy’s Daily Reward for a new bonus each day!- Win amazing prizes every day and join Happy Hour Events for even more!- Come and take part in weekly events, where you can face off against the Wizard of Oz himself, and other fun characters!   Download The Wizard of Oz: Magic Match and relive the magic of The Land of Oz today! Already enjoying The Wizard of Oz: Magic Match? Like us on Facebook to stay up-to-date on the latest content, newest levels, exciting contests, and more. https://www.facebook.com/TheWizardOfOzMagicMatch/ ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES • For specific information about how Zynga collects and uses personal or other data, please read our privacy policy at http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.• This game does permit a user to connect to social networks, such as Facebook, and as such players may come into contact with other people when playing this game. comments: It's my favourite of all the poker apps on the market so far. Two things I would change... Enable chat so you can say what you want. Also make buying chips less expensive (it's far too easy to go bust, then you can't play unless you spend lots of money on PLAY chips) sort it out please

I'm giving 4 star becuz I need help from you devs! I play GOP3 in STEAM directly in PC & I have an option to synch my steam account to my Android, I tried all the steps that's listed. But it ain't working. Can you help me out? Cuz if u help me, I personally feel you guys deserve a 5 star :)
Now I remember why I deleted this in the first place. Terrible game. Hardly ever win a hand. Too many so called 'players' keep raising so you lose more than you win. Deleting for the last time!

If you continuously win you lose continuously and if you have a lot of chips you'll lose the chips know why? This games is money hungry and wants you to buy stuff I had 25 million and now I have 13 million because the dealer got 20 2 times in a row mabey if you made the cards random and didint do what I complained about I would've gave this 5 stars.
There's a few small glitches but they are always keeping up and listening to players comments to make things better,  bravo! Really fun team challenges separates gop3 from all others.
This game is garbage the daily spin is garbage and the hands are not good ever. Unless your willing to spend money everyday don't bother. IT doesn't respond back to tech issues eith.

recentChanges: 20 new levels!
Chapter 110 Ancient Remains
Trix motioned to the heads poking in and out from the trees. "It's like they're watching us."
"They once lived in this forest's protector, a giant tree spirit," Jenni explained.
"Why can't just go back home and leave us alone?" Trix retorted.
They came upon a huge tree stump, riches spilling out of its hollowed center. "The bandits cut it down for the treasures that grew within," Jenni said.
"Oh no!" cried Trix. "We need to stop those bandits!"
summary: Win big with the best, most addictive, match 3 game. Play Genies & Gems Now!
title: Genies & Gems - Jewel & Gem Matching Adventure

comments: Excellent game! I have no doubt that the game is one of the most perfect games. Everything but one thing. I just ran one race that comes with the actualization and I won around 5k, te first upgrade for the camaro Nascar costs around 130k does that even make sense. In the real life if you spend that money to make a competitive car to win that money... I hope you get my meaning

The MOST AMAZING racing game in the mobile device. The gameplay, graphics, and the controls were perfect. Also, the tracks in the game were so real like I was racing in real life. I also loves the cars that were added in this game, it looks so amazing. But, what I like the most from this game was online real-time racing. There were no other racing games that has this feature. Just have suggestions, add custom race mode. In this mode, you can chose tracks, daytime, amount of opponents, and also the laps. And also enable to invite friends to custom race mode. Also, probably adding weather system will be better. Last, make the cars could do rev-bombing. So, at the start of the races, you could have some pretty good start. Although, keep it up Electronic Arts & Fire Monkeys. Hopefully, these suggestions could help the game become much better and better.

Good game, good graphics,good sound. I like that it is on going, not like some similar games. I found it fairly easy to get used too. Plenty of choices and cars. I like that you are not constantly forced to spend real money in order to progress. That is a big plus for us game players. Well done all at EA, you have a real winner with this game. I personally am loving playing this game. Update, I have been playing for a few days now, the only drawback I have noticed is, the game takes up a lot of space on my device. Having said that, its so good its worth it. As previously, well done all at EA.

Well,to start off, game really speaks for itself.Everything is pretty dope. I'm just going to name some things that I'm sure most of the people wants. -Dynamic weather conditions,how amazing snow day on Bathurst would be?Rain,wind,foggy... -Breakable parts, mirrors, spoilers,even wheels,and those should be on the tarmac whole race. -Drift events, I'm just going to say,we all want it. -More hatchbacks definitely,and more cars like its Jeep,or Ford Raptor,and you can add unique cars from movies,etc. -And sprint events,point to point.How fun is that. -More mountains!!! Please. Peace!

the graphic, control, and gameplay is good as always, but the problem is, i played this years ago just with a device with 1gb RAM and i have mid-high graphic setting, but now im running with oppo a37f and i think it can run this game with a mid or mid 2 graphic setting... but no, my game always set to the lowest graphic, could you guys fix this problem? i love this game and i'd like to enjoy it in its best performance

It's a great game where you can race and customise your own car. However here are some ideas I would like you the imlament please  1. If the cars from the NASCAR can get the custmizeing like all the others.   2. To extend the custmize can yo add a tab where you can put spoilers, air intakes And other things you would put on a car.  3. Finally to make this game real racing 3 if when a race of just go to see all the car you have.  There be a "i" button that will give the player real information about the car the player is looking at.

descriptionHTML:
**#1 Top Free App in over 100 countries**

Real Racing 3 is the award-winning franchise that sets a new standard for mobile racing games – you have to play it to believe it.

This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.

Over 200 Million Downloads!

TabbyAwards 2014 – WINNER: Best Action, Adventure, Arcade & Racing Game
Mobile Excellence Awards – WINNER: Best Mobile Game 2013
Game Connect Asia Pacific – WINNER: Game of The Year 2013, Technical Excellence, Excellence in Art
Meffy Awards – FINALIST: Best Mobile Game 2013

Real Racing 3 features an ever-expanding roster of officially licensed tracks with 39 circuits at 17 real-world locations, a 43-car grid and over 140 meticulously detailed cars from top manufacturers. Plus Real-Time Multiplayer, Social Leaderboards, Time Trials, night racing, and innovative Time Shifted Multiplayer™ (TSM) technology, allowing you to race anyone, anytime, anywhere.

**This is a resource-intensive game featuring extremely high quality visuals. Please make sure you have at least 1.5GB of free space on your device.**

PRAISE FOR REAL RACING 3
“Feels a full generation ahead of the competition” (IGN, 9.1/10, Editors’ Choice)
“A stunning visual masterpiece on mobile” (Touch Arcade)
“Sets the new standard on mobile for racing games” (Pocket Gamer, 9/10, Gold Award)

REAL CARS
Take the wheel of over 140 intensely detailed vehicles from iconic manufacturers like Ford, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Aston Martin and Mercedes-Benz and test your skills on an authentic 43-car race grid – the most epic racing experience on any handheld.

REAL TRACKS
Burn rubber on a full lineup of 17 real tracks in multiple configurations from top worldwide locations, including Silverstone, Hockenheimring, Le Mans, Dubai Autodrome and many more.

REAL PEOPLE
Go bumper to bumper with friends and rivals in global 8-player, cross-platform, real-time racing with drafting. Or drop into any race to challenge their AI-controlled versions in Time-Shifted Multiplayer™.

MORE CHOICES THAN EVER
Compete in over 4,000 events including Cup races, Eliminations and Endurance challenges. Choose from a wide range of upgrades to maximize your car’s performance. Customize your car with a huge collection of paints, vinyls and rims. View the action from a variety of camera angles, tweak the HUD and fine-tune the controls to your personal preference.

THE PREMIER RACING EXPERIENCE
Powered by the remarkable Mint™ 3 Engine, Real Racing 3 features detailed car damage, fully functioning rear view mirrors, and dynamic reflections for truly HD racing. Enjoy a rich, next-gen game with the most advanced cross-platform social and competitive racing community ever. Real Racing 3 delivers it all and pushes the boundaries with every update.

Welcome to the definitive racing experience.

comments: Cannot get in touch with support. When Pennypop ran the game, they were very helpful and easy to get ahold of. Now I can't reach anyone and my account is in limbo (even after having been a dedicated player years ago). Be warned, it's not the game it was and until it steps up on customer service, I wouldn't put any money into it.

Tried reinstalling on a new device and it couldn't connect to facebook. Couldn't recognize my email (even though I get emails from them). Kept trying to get me to make a new account. I'm sorry, but when I play something off and on for roughly half a decade, then I'd like for the app to work so I can retrieve my account. Fix it, and I'll change my review because I really do love this game.

I'll give this game a higher rating only if the game support will release my epic monster, which is permanently locked for mission at the dig site. A glitch that they fail to do anything. No response, no support.

I'm revising my review.. I use to love this game. Now it's becoming more like a pain in my behind to even play. The game is not allowing me to do normal things that I'm suppose to be able to do. It's really making me angry!
I really love the hell out of this game.. Those haters who say its slow its not.. your phone is. your CPU is tacy as F plz don't blame the game..

Takes 2 mins to load then you have to press "try again" 20 times then wait for 2 mins and repeat everything 100x before it can load then just after you beat a boss you have to press try again 100x then it crashes. Best game ever.

comments: I've been playing this game for a long time now, and I have to say, I didn't have high hopes when I started. 30 minutes in, I couldn't stop and I wanted to play more. It's a different take on a Final Fantasy game, and it really does feel like a Dissidia game in RPG form. The bravery and HP system is very interesting, and I'm always looking forward for new characters and their few, but unique, special abilities. TL;DR Overall great game.

My name is auron I've been playing game since release and I have some concerns. For starters I have 999 all strength crystals. Why is there still events to get crystals? And wakka can use some ability to boost his buff dance. He barely procs.maybe instead of strength crystals you can have key events for summon materials... Love this game btw keep up the good work and please rework wakka!!!!

It's liked someone finally thought "hey,  maybe people just want a classic ff based game with out to much mobile game bull." I liking  it so far,  leveling pretty fast(well until  the pay wall hits) and the chance of me spend money on this 70 percent. But for real,  4 chapters in still  no Squall ya killing me.

Absolutely amazing. I can safely call this an actual game that you can play. There is no energy that stupidly limits play time, you can unlock all available characters by playing the game, and it actually FEELS like a true Final Fantasy game! I love this game and I am definitely going to spend money in the future to show my support for this amazing game.   However, since this game is fairly new, there isn't much to do. You definitely need to add more quests, more characters, more events, and PvP. Real-time PvP would be amazing. This is truely a spectacular game, and I highly recommend it for any Final Fantasy fan. Also, Cloud is available near the start of the game! Big thumbs up. Please don't screw around with energy Square Enix, please as it is a plague in the mobile gaming business.   EDIT: Please increase the level cap to 99 in the future please. Lv 50 cap doesn't feel right at all. Otherwise, awesome game.

The game is amazing!! However I am not able to play on my Samsung Galaxy 9+ after upgrading my phone and this is truly unfortunate. Are you guys working on a fix? Pleease let me know, will update to five star after...cause I mean at this point I cant play the game :(.

Got this game since launch, but after the 6th days, the game get pretty repetitive. My cload still at lvl 47 lol. The cutscene video could be better because I always skipped it. The casually walking at the start of a video make me wanna spam the skip button. I remember what intrigued me from the old ff cutscenes wasn't about the graphic, but their action pack scenes. RTK just launched (currently #1 on play store). I'll be playing that game instead for now.
description: ----------------------------------------◆ Game Info ◆----------------------------------------● A Dream Collaboration! Legendary heroes and villains from across the FINAL FANTASY series come together in a compelling story of powerful deities and a world in peril. Fans of the series will see their favorite characters in a brand-new adventure, and newcomers will experience the compelling story, drama, and combat that the FINAL FANTASY series is known for!● Turn-Based Combat with a Twist! Engage in simple yet strategic turn-based combat! The unique Bravery system challenges you to balance offense with defense as you build up your Bravery and wait for the right moment to strike! ● Assemble Your Party! Build parties from a cast of dozens of FINAL FANTASY heroes and villains and prepare them for battle with a variety of equipment and abilities. Embark on a journey alongside beloved characters and encounter familiar faces, summons, and more along the way! ● Play with Friends! Multiplayer quests allow you to join forces with up to two other players to bring down mighty enemies and earn fabulous rewards!----------------------------------------◆ Story ◆----------------------------------------Darkness converges upon us, and the world crumbles before our very eyes…What was once a sanctuary for the weary has now become a battlefield.Long ago, the deities Spiritus and Materia warped the fabric of time and space to create a new world—a world they populated with warriors from other realms.These men and women were forced to fight day and night without reprieve, and the strain of endless battle soon grew to be too great.With battered bodies and shattered spirits, they sent out a cry for help…
descriptionHTML:
----------------------------------------
◆ Game Info ◆
----------------------------------------
● A Dream Collaboration!
Legendary heroes and villains from across the FINAL FANTASY series come together in a compelling story of powerful deities and a world in peril. Fans of the series will see their favorite characters in a brand-new adventure, and newcomers will experience the compelling story, drama, and combat that the FINAL FANTASY series is known for!

● Turn-Based Combat with a Twist!
Engage in simple yet strategic turn-based combat! The unique Bravery system challenges you to balance offense with defense as you build up your Bravery and wait for the right moment to strike!

● Assemble Your Party!
Build parties from a cast of dozens of FINAL FANTASY heroes and villains and prepare them for battle with a variety of equipment and abilities. Embark on a journey alongside beloved characters and encounter familiar faces, summons, and more along the way!

● Play with Friends!
Multiplayer quests allow you to join forces with up to two other players to bring down mighty enemies and earn fabulous rewards!

----------------------------------------
◆ Story ◆
----------------------------------------
Darkness converges upon us, and the world crumbles before our very eyes…
What was once a sanctuary for the weary has now become a battlefield.
Long ago, the deities Spiritus and Materia warped the fabric of time and space to create a new world—a world they populated with warriors from other realms.
These men and women were forced to fight day and night without reprieve, and the strain of endless battle soon grew to be too great.
With battered bodies and shattered spirits, they sent out a cry for help…

comments: I am only giving ABF a 3 right now. I have played ABF since the beginning of it's time. I feel as if the coin rewards are very slim in the higher leagues. I am a Diamond Star 4 and I feel as if the higher the level the higher the reward but, the rewards are all the same. When you work your way up you want to feel rewarded! If coin rewards increase in the higher levels so will my rating!!!!!

I would give it 5 stars, but they've changed a few things. It's now more difficult to earn coins for power-ups. So in order to win the tournaments, they've put people in the position of having to make purchases more often. Needless to say, I don't play as often anymore. I've also noticed that several of my friends don't play anymore either. Too bad, the game used to be a lot more fun.

Been playing this game for years. Loved it in the beginning.  Seems the lower I rate the game as they try to make easier for people that are not good.  the birds I throw are nearly useless a lot of times compared to playing the same game for a star 2 player I know. And now the game is crashing constantly. Wish I could sell the nearly 100,000 bird coins I have. Seems I won't need them.

Ok so when there is an issue that needs addressed, sometimes it take a couple of days for the tech people to get to it. But overall the game is awesome! This is the only game that I still play every day from the time I got a smart phone, which has been several years!

I love playing angry birds friends. I'm an adult woman and have played since they came out with the game. Scoring in first place many times. Recently there seems to be too much graphics and sometimes using plays from other games or other angry birds games. If people are submitting what they have thought out, please make sure it stays within original angry birds friends game. Some levels are too far out there.

I loved this game to keep in touch with a few friends but please take those stupid Dignity ads off... They do not close and always end up missing up my game. I have to close the game out and start all over. Loosing many power ups and coins in this tedius game making it more frustrating than fun.

comments: A well made app that's immersive, addictive, and the essence of the Kingdom Hearts franchise. The app is mission based and has a complex but easy to use medal system with rock-paper-scissors type of combat. You can join/make a party, or go solo. Money isn't an issue so long as you pace yourself. It gets better the more you play. There are optional event quests and a story, but don't fret if you can't get the app or just starting out; it's slow going. 735 quests.

Liking the cute art style but my god does this game take forever to download even with a low resolution. Has taken me two attempts and I'm doubtful that it's related to my broadband speed and connection (not sure if it's to do with my phone? But again, doubtful.) Would be great if this could be fixed somehow.

I freaking love this game! However I have a small complaint that is probably fixable. I was wondering for my lg g6 if you could expand the borders so the screen would fit. And if the screen is not able to get any bigger, I'm hoping you people can at least put a cool border around it instead of leaving it as a black bar. I know you people can make cool borders. Thanks for your attention!

Hey guys, huge fan of the kingdom hearts series and also the game in general. Though one thing I wish you could add is the option to link your data to your Google Play account as well as Facebook. Not a lot of us use Facebook so I wish there was more options to get your data back if you ever deleted the app. Otherwise, good game!

I love this game.  Strategy, adventure, and story (once you get far enough) are all great!  Although it is a little pay to win, and they keep coming out with new medals (attacks) that are infinitely better than your current ones.  This can get discurraging, because your hard work doesn't really mean much in the long run.    I played for 6 month when a friend got a single medal that made him more powerful than me on his 1st week playing.

[Edit: THANK YOU SO MUCH! I love that you all added a lower quality version this way I can play this game.] I like it and all, but when that very large download starts after the tutorial, it stops at 4/6 and restarts, even though my phone has enough room for it, I think. Please fix this, I really want to play it!

Good luck in this game if ya don't want to spend money. No game balancing meaning a lvl12 can attk lvl  1 with no post attk shield or protection of any kind. Got attk 12 times in a row by same player of higher lvl. Also If you have issues with game content good luck getting a good answer on that too.

Hi A.K server 52. Have been playing for couple of months now and still love the game.just when you think you are on top of things something new comes up. I personally like the challenge and new changes.for those who have not played this game before I would recommend it.  Very addictive. If you are going to spend money in this game spend wisely.
After last update, this game getting worst, score for pirate event has been reduced, and the pirate getting stronger.. fix it fast.. many player complaining about this Nick : Premi06 Server : 041

Please add more vessels like USS Carl Vinson, and enabled to play offline too. And please make no time limits to purchase for the new promotion with a cheap price such as new ships or aircrafts, when that happened I bet there will be more interesting. Thanks.

If you don't have money to burn then don't play this game. This game is the embidiment of the 'pay to win' phrase and would make EA look like a baby when it comes to that. Levels are easy to scale up in the beginning but as you cross level 10 through 20, you'd realise that without paying through your nose, you are just fodder for paying players. Don't be a sheep they'd like you to be. On top of that, the game is riddled with bugs and the developers are unresponsive, unless again you are a paying player. Do yourself a favor and Invest your time in another game.

description: Become a modern farmer in Farming Simulator 18! Immerse yourself in a huge open world and harvest many types of crops, take care of your livestock - cows, sheep, and pigs - take part in forestry, and sell your products on a dynamic market to expand your farm!You have access to a huge selection of over 50 farming vehicles and machines, faithfully recreated from over 30 of the biggest names in the industry, including AGCO’s most respected brands: Challenger, Fendt, Massey Ferguson and Valtra. Drive and use brand new equipment and harvest sugar beet, potatoes, wheat, canola, corn, and for the first time sunflowers.With a deep and powerful simulation experience, a vast open world and a wide fleet of vehicles including brand new machines, Farming Simulator 18 invites you aboard the most complete handheld farming simulation ever created!Features of Farming Simulator 18 include:• Use realistic tractors and trucks from some of the biggest agriculture machine makers• Plant and harvest six different crops: Wheat, canola, corn, sugar beet, potatoes and sunflower• Breed pigs and sell them for profit• Feed your cows and sheep to produce and sell milk and wool• New front loader attachments expand your options when transporting bales or wood• Manage AI helpers for better results or let them drive your vehicles to a destination of your choice• New 3D graphics show even more detail on your machinery and the southern US environment• Harvest wood with dedicated machinery and sell the timber• Play with friends in local multiplayer mode for WiFi and Bluetooth
descriptionHTML:
Become a modern farmer in Farming Simulator 18! Immerse yourself in a huge open world and harvest many types of crops, take care of your livestock - cows, sheep, and pigs - take part in forestry, and sell your products on a dynamic market to expand your farm!

You have access to a huge selection of over 50 farming vehicles and machines, faithfully recreated from over 30 of the biggest names in the industry, including AGCO’s most respected brands: Challenger, Fendt, Massey Ferguson and Valtra. Drive and use brand new equipment and harvest sugar beet, potatoes, wheat, canola, corn, and for the first time sunflowers.

With a deep and powerful simulation experience, a vast open world and a wide fleet of vehicles including brand new machines, Farming Simulator 18 invites you aboard the most complete handheld farming simulation ever created!

Features of Farming Simulator 18 include:

• Use realistic tractors and trucks from some of the biggest agriculture machine makers
• Plant and harvest six different crops: Wheat, canola, corn, sugar beet, potatoes and sunflower
• Breed pigs and sell them for profit
• Feed your cows and sheep to produce and sell milk and wool
• New front loader attachments expand your options when transporting bales or wood
• Manage AI helpers for better results or let them drive your vehicles to a destination of your choice
• New 3D graphics show even more detail on your machinery and the southern US environment
• Harvest wood with dedicated machinery and sell the timber
• Play with friends in local multiplayer mode for WiFi and Bluetooth

title: Farming Simulator 18

comments: Extremely addictive! First day I played I overshot my bus stop by 5 minutes because I forgot to look up.  There is always something to do in the game somewhere - and the micro transaction bit doesn't feel forced, and you can easily progress without it.  It kept me occupied for days - unfortunately I had to delete it because I got too caught up.  So if you're looking for a game to grab your attention and keep you entertained on long commutes and the like, this is great for that

Fun little game, but I would love for food, and water, to be a little bit faster. Also maybe rise up the rush chances. I do have 1 suggestion, maybe when the people off to the Waste Lands, they can find some rare stuff, like gems or maybe clothes/weapons. This game is really fun, even though I've just started it, keep up the great work! 👍🏽

I figured my old ass phone wouldnt run this game when first announced, just confirming for folks it sure doesnt. I thought there might be a chance it would cos my phone is rooted and I have full control over how my ram is utilized. Thank bob for android emulators on desktop, can't wait to play :)

Look, I can kind of understand dwellers not dropping their assignments to fight raiders, but can we have the ability to assign fighters to the raiders themselves. It's a massive and unnecessary pain to constantly remind my few armed dwellers to actually fight the raiders instead of just looking cute in the room they just left. Weapons are scarce in this game, and raiders move too often to play pass the gun. It would also be nice if there was a pause feature, but that would reduce the butler-bot purchases.

Fantastic! A resource management sim that is incredibly fresh and charming thanks to the richness of the Fallout franchise. Keeps you coming back for hours. From the quirkiness of the dwellers to the depth of the side quest system, this game is deserving of your time. Finally, the game is totally playable without paying. Still, throw the devs a few bucks! You'll sink hours into this title.

Absolutely love this game. If you're a die hard fallout fan, or even someone new to the series this is the perfect game for you. You'll get a sense of nostalgia pulling your first legendary dweller, or a sigh of relief when you obtain that last part for the weapon you've been looking to craft. Fallout Shelter is the perfect mobile game for any fan of the series. The game is slow and hard in the beginning but when you get on your feet you'll never want to put it down. If you're on the edge about downloading it please do, it's worth all the time and space!
description: ** Google Play Best of 2015  **Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE AwardsWinner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat"Probably the best game of E3 2015” – Gizmodo "Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZoneBUILD THE PERFECT VAULTCreate a brighter future…underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.CUSTOMIZETurn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.PROSPERA well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly! EXPLORE THE WASTELAND Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don’t let them die!PROTECT YOUR VAULTFrom time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside…and within.Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.
descriptionHTML:
** Google Play Best of 2015 **
Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE Awards
Winner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game

"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat
"Probably the best game of E3 2015” – Gizmodo
"Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZone

BUILD THE PERFECT VAULT
Create a brighter future…underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.

OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY
Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.

CUSTOMIZE
Turn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.

PROSPER
A well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly!

EXPLORE THE WASTELAND
Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don’t let them die!

PROTECT YOUR VAULT
From time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside…and within.

Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.
developerAddress:
Bethesda Softworks LLC
1370 Piccard Drive, Suite 120
Rockville, MD 28050
recentChanges: Vault-Tec approved St. Patrick’s Day preparations. (Celebration begins 3/15).
-Feeling Lucky?  Your dwellers will, with faster Luck training.
-Everyone loves a surprise – so surprise quests will appear more frequently.
Vault-Tec certified optimizations and date adjustments.
summary: Fallout Shelter puts you in control of a state-of-the-art underground Vault.
title: Fallout Shelter

comments: This game is really fun, I love everything about it, specially joining in a clan. But I wish there would be a chance to chat with each member not just smileys but as of now it's super great! Really fun to play, this is the longest time I've ever played such a game in my phone. Absolutely love it!

this game is good till about 8 hours in where your waiting days to build anything. Gems are really hard to come by so you have to be wary about how much stock u have. And there's no way to dispose of unwanted items in your warehouse (that I know of) but yeah, it's a catchy game

Pretty much a money pit. It's designed to frustrate you into spending money. Everything takes stupid amounts of resources to build or expand. The expansions are tiny. It becomes impossible to fill orders because they all want items you can't make because you cant build anything. Caravans usually ask for ridiculous amount of things and you have no storage room. Everything takes too long to make or regrow so even if you have room, the caravan times out. And the rewards for filling them is measly. It'll still take weeks to get enough to defeat monsters that block expansions. Don't download if youre looking for a fun game.

I liked this game, and have played it for months, until a few days ago when I noticed the "price" of buildings required to progress take a huge jump up!! I will gladly support a game I like by making purchases but I'm not about to spend my house payment just to progress IN A GAME!! Not cool, and makes me regret the money Ive spent so far. On to the next!!

Question why do I have to give 30 diamonds for one shield? And Everytime I expand my barn it on expand from 5-10 I need more room then that over then that.. I wake up out my sleep just to play this game. I need more space please and Thank u.
They deleted my whole account out of nowhere!  Everything gone. Don't waste your time. And please dont spend any money. Totally rip off!

comments: This game has a great support department, they try their best to resolve all issues that come up in the game quickly.  I love playing this game it has some of the most fantantic story lines and great graphics.  Again I would like to thank all the staff at My Tona makers of Seekers Notes and especially Amy Smith for all her help. Trina   P.S. I would like for the makers of the game to make the COINS available towards the purchase of RUBIES - either at the bank or in TRADE at one of the shops, I have $2,509,310.00 at this time and still accumulating, I never use that much at the shops.

Deceptively simple it's very enjoyable and a little addictive. Challenging enough to keep me interested it can be a little frustrating that is not as generous as it could be with producing items needed but it's not so slow to produce as to put me off. Love the challenges and find the interaction with friends is simple. After the most recent update I noted a lot of complaints but these all seem to have been addressed by the developers.
Only just got going on the game and so far it's a pleasant way to pass the time. I'm guessing it could end up costing a bit as some items are so hard to find!

Love this game! Updates are just frequent enough that I can complete the missions before the next update without getting behind or waiting too long for the next update. Also good about listening to feedback

I REALLY like this game! The only two issues I have is that 1) some times I'll click on a (correct) item while playing the game and it won't accept it so I'll click it again and then it deducts 10 seconds and I'll have to click it AGAIN and it'll do ally accept it. I also don't like that when I'm completing a collection if I already have an item in the collection, it won't let me skip finding it and still makes me play the level to find it, even though I already have it. It wastes my energy and that's annoying. Other than those 2 things this game is AH-AMAZING! And super addictive.
Need tutorials more often during the game for fuller enjoyment.

description: For the first time ever, The Godfather officially comes to you as a brand new mobile game in an untold tale of money, power, and corruption.  Don Vito Corleone has summoned you to enter the notorious criminal underworld of 1945 and become his devoted Underboss.  As second in command to the Godfather, YOU will be the one to carry out the Corleones’ dirty deeds and fight for the honor and respect of the most powerful Family in New York City.Building a legacy won’t be a simple undertaking.  As your wealth and influence grow, unfortunately, so does your list of dedicated enemies.  Keep a watchful eye over your empire, as even a trusted ally could turn against you.  When hostilities arise, you will have to use strength, intimidation, and intelligence to protect your assets, as well as your honor.  Recruit your Capos and train them well, for vengeance is yours.Every well-respected Boss needs a mansion.  Once you take control of your domain, you must find lucrative ways to enhance your resources and increase your wealth.  Blood is a big expense, but if necessary, be ready to engage in deadly warfare. Remember to keep your friends close and your enemies closer— you never know who will use your information for their own personal gains.Can you maintain your loyalty to The Godfather?  Once you pledge your allegiance to the Don, there is no turning back.  Remember, it’s not personal...strictly business.   Buona Fortuna.KEY FEATURESBuild A Palace Fit For A Don-  Learn to run your lavish estate under direct guidance from The Godfather himself, Vito Corleone.Mobilize Your Crew-  Gain protection by enlisting Capos and Soldiers to “handle” any misunderstandings and spy on untrustworthy rival families.Establish Powerful Friendships- By helping your allies, favors will be returned to you. After all, the richest man is the one with the most powerful friends.   Leave The Gun. Take The Cannoli.- Successfully complete tasks, and you will be generously rewarded.  Upgrade buildings and equipment, while improving your skills and weapons.  Make profitable investments, and then cook the books.Go To The Mattresses- Defend your territories and declare war against rival Families in order to seize properties and accrue vast wealth.Become A Legend- Secure your place as a “made man” amongst the Corleone Family.
descriptionHTML:
For the first time ever, The Godfather officially comes to you as a brand new mobile game in an untold tale of money, power, and corruption. Don Vito Corleone has summoned you to enter the notorious criminal underworld of 1945 and become his devoted Underboss. As second in command to the Godfather, YOU will be the one to carry out the Corleones’ dirty deeds and fight for the honor and respect of the most powerful Family in New York City.

Building a legacy won’t be a simple undertaking. As your wealth and influence grow, unfortunately, so does your list of dedicated enemies. Keep a watchful eye over your empire, as even a trusted ally could turn against you. When hostilities arise, you will have to use strength, intimidation, and intelligence to protect your assets, as well as your honor. Recruit your Capos and train them well, for vengeance is yours.

Every well-respected Boss needs a mansion. Once you take control of your domain, you must find lucrative ways to enhance your resources and increase your wealth. Blood is a big expense, but if necessary, be ready to engage in deadly warfare. Remember to keep your friends close and your enemies closer— you never know who will use your information for their own personal gains.

Can you maintain your loyalty to The Godfather? Once you pledge your allegiance to the Don, there is no turning back. Remember, it’s not personal...strictly business.

Buona Fortuna.

KEY FEATURES

Build A Palace Fit For A Don- Learn to run your lavish estate under direct guidance from The Godfather himself, Vito Corleone.

Mobilize Your Crew- Gain protection by enlisting Capos and Soldiers to “handle” any misunderstandings and spy on untrustworthy rival families.

Establish Powerful Friendships- By helping your allies, favors will be returned to you. After all, the richest man is the one with the most powerful friends.

Leave The Gun. Take The Cannoli.- Successfully complete tasks, and you will be generously rewarded. Upgrade buildings and equipment, while improving your skills and weapons. Make profitable investments, and then cook the books.

Go To The Mattresses- Defend your territories and declare war against rival Families in order to seize properties and accrue vast wealth.

Become A Legend- Secure your place as a “made man” amongst the Corleone Family.

descriptionHTML:
Befehligen Sie eine unbesiegbare Flotte und herrschen Sie über die Weltmeere.

"Clash of Battleships" ist ein interaktives Seeschlacht Spiel mit komfortabler Bedienung und reich an Strategien, das die verschiedensten Schlachtschiffe wieder auf die Bildfläche bringt. Über 200 berühmte Schiffe von Jütland bis zum Golf von Leyte aus der Ära glorreicher Seeschlachten warten auf dich. Auf dieser Reise kannst du mit Gleichgesinnten eine Armee aufbauen, um die Herrschaft über Weltmeere gemeinsam zu verwirklichen.

Features:
1. Die Wiederkehr klassischer Kriege!
Geschichtsträchtige Schlachten und Hintergründe dienen als Vorlage, um echte Kampfesszenen wieder aufleben zu lassen.

2. Entscheidende Seeschlachten auf höchstem Niveau!
Mehr als 200 Schlachtschiffe der verschiedensten Gattungen beherrschen das Meer.

3. Neue Expeditionen!
Atemberaubende Fähigkeitsspezialeffekte, Stil und Modelle bringen deine Reise auf eine neue Stufe.

4. Versenke sie alle!
Die Geschichte der Kriege ist lang und von Erneuerungen geprägt. Neue Funktionen, Verbesserungen und Ergänzungen stehen nun zur Verfügung.

"Clash of Battleships" nimmt dich mit auf die Reise, die vier Meere zu erobern.

Folgt uns auf Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Clash.of.Battleships.DE
Folgt uns auf Instagram: Clash of Battleships
developerAddress: 1 Queen's Road Central, Hong Kong

comments: I got this game about a month after it was released.  Everything was awesome, the support was phenomenal and worked well together fixing bugs and listening to players.  They have done many great things, but the support more on non existent except for those who put thousands into the game.  I've dropped about $600 and the ignore my mails, msging via messenger.  Fun game, support is AWFUL

The trailer ad for this game shamelessly plays Pirates of the Caribbean soundtrack, and graphical assets in the actual game are similarly copied from other people's work. And by that I mean not influenced, by but blatantly ripped off. Hellooo lawsuit...

Developer has long history of poorly coded apps with server stability issues as well as loss of purchased game credits and lack of proper support.  Pick a game by a developer who actually SUPPORTS their app instead, you'll be much happier.

It was Great, until the stupid game started crashing every day!  I spent cash on this, and to lose so much due to it glitching and crashing is unacceptable!  I'll give more stars when this issue is fixed... until then if you don't wanna lose your money die to crashes and glitches DO NOT INSTALL!   Update , I wish I could give negative Stars,  it is continuously CRASHING if my troops die due to FAILURE which is caused by the developers faulty upkeep this time, I'll quit and never play another game made by this company again!  SIMPLY FIX THE ISSUES ON YOUR GAME OR REDUND OUR MONEY, YA CROOKS!!!!!!😠😠😠😠😡

Game was great. But now has to many glitches. Hopefully you don't have a problem because the support team is non existent. They never get back to you when you email them. I personally have list alot of troops because of glitches. 1 month ago I would have said download this game but I wouldn't now untill they fix the glitches.

customer service is a joke. hard to find a game where owner/developer cares about their players that spend $500 to keep their servers running. player community great. rest sucks. I deleted this app after crashing almost everyday for a week

description: Rings of Anarchy is a medieval fantasy 3D MMORPG mobile game. In this game, players travel to the wondrous homelands of the elves, dwarfs, gnomes, orcs, cyclopses and more in order to collect 27 powerful rings and save the world! Featuring many unique game modes and systems, such as the free equipment system, where equipment is obtainable only via killing monsters. The free trade system, in which players can freely trade items without price restrictions. A powerful and diverse social system, including Emperors and civilians, masters and apprentices, guilds and teams. Plus a balanced and exciting world boss system where bosses can be found across the world map and refresh all day long. [Game Features]——New Era, offline auto-combatUnique auto-combat system design that even offers offline auto-combat will help you to upgrade and kill bosses when you are busy, creating a win-win situation for both work and play.——Advancement, exclusive customization systemFeaturing a fully customization system, in which you can advance as you see fit, outside the constraints of a traditional class system. Acquire your very own exclusive titles, spectacular skills and featured looks. ——Cool mounts, customizable looksDozens of cool mounts including tyrannosaurus, skyfyre and griffins are at your service. Customizable equipment and looks will make you stand out of the crowd. ——Trade freely, buy or sell equipmentIn the market of this game, you can freely sell any unused or extra equipment obtained from killing bosses or completing quests. None of your resources or time shall be wasted.
descriptionHTML:
Rings of Anarchy is a medieval fantasy 3D MMORPG mobile game. In this game, players travel to the wondrous homelands of the elves, dwarfs, gnomes, orcs, cyclopses and more in order to collect 27 powerful rings and save the world! Featuring many unique game modes and systems, such as the free equipment system, where equipment is obtainable only via killing monsters. The free trade system, in which players can freely trade items without price restrictions. A powerful and diverse social system, including Emperors and civilians, masters and apprentices, guilds and teams. Plus a balanced and exciting world boss system where bosses can be found across the world map and refresh all day long.


[Game Features]

——New Era, offline auto-combat
Unique auto-combat system design that even offers offline auto-combat will help you to upgrade and kill bosses when you are busy, creating a win-win situation for both work and play.

——Advancement, exclusive customization system
Featuring a fully customization system, in which you can advance as you see fit, outside the constraints of a traditional class system. Acquire your very own exclusive titles, spectacular skills and featured looks.

——Cool mounts, customizable looks
Dozens of cool mounts including tyrannosaurus, skyfyre and griffins are at your service. Customizable equipment and looks will make you stand out of the crowd.

——Trade freely, buy or sell equipment
In the market of this game, you can freely sell any unused or extra equipment obtained from killing bosses or completing quests. None of your resources or time shall be wasted.

comments: Addictive and engrossing game.  The bonus covers work well. The constant character tweaking and release rate makes the vs progression awards with wins is very good.  The favorites is a good way to let folks focus on building certain characters.  The transition points are still frustrating, especially when you get a run of bad luck with tokens.  Tokens might work better if they scaled instead. Biggest issue is progression awards in versus and the tough transitions in levels.

I have been playing this game for a few years now and love it! But a little suggestion... Because of the time I've spent playing it and the already difficult ability to get 4 and 5 star characters, I have nearly 3 million iso-8 that I literally cannot spend. Please add a way to convert iso-8 into hero points or command points!!! I'd like to get further in the game instead of literally stockpiling iso-8. This has all been done without spending a single dollar on the game too, btw

This is an awesome, addictive and hyper fun game. Brilliant idea and concept. In all the games I have played this is the first I have spent money on. VIP member. Have a couple suggestions for developer tho. Can you add abilities to swap covers with alliance members and maybe add as a bonus drop for playing, an extra free slot. Keep up the brilliant work. Truely love this game.

This is my go-to game. Day and night. It's fun, simple and sometime challenging. My only complaint is that i have like a million of Iso-8 and don't know what to do with them. My thought would be that if we don't need so much Iso-8, be sweet to give some to aliance member who needs it or so on. Great game. Don't know what I'd do without it!

Suitable for all age groups, Marvel Puzzle Quest is a great game for everyone. Progress with higher tier characters may be slow but yet significant. The wide variety of heroes and villians within the game allows for endless possibilities of the "best team". Highly addictive, I would recommend this perfect game to anyone and everyone.

Love that they are always adding new characters. Would like to see some different characters like Cable, Domino, Sabretooth, and Bishop just to name a few. Just because they don't have a movie... Would also like to see some new events, new animations, and less repetitiveness. Love the collection part and finally being able to use characters when you've finally built their powers enough. Love that it can be played for free. Love that feedback is read and the game is constantly evolving.Thanks.
description: Marvel Comics’ fearless Super Heroes and evil Super Villains come to life in this Official Marvel match 3 role playing game! Create your own epic Dream Team using the strongest Super Heroes and the nastiest Super Villains in the Marvel Universe! Play Super Hero characters like Spider-Man, Captain America, Wolverine and the Hulk as you battle your way to victory through multi-level match-three puzzles. Thor, Iron Man, Deadpool and other comic and movie Super Heroes await your challenge!   FEATURES★ Snag the top rank in Tournaments, Alliances, and Season Play for new character rewards and other prizes! ★ Form alliances with your friends and use your collective power to fight other players in events and epic battles via chat★ Experience deep RPG leveling★ Challenge your team of Super Heroes in exciting Player vs. Player tournaments★ Build strategic alliances with your favorite heroes and villains★ Join a community of 8 million players worldwide★ New events, features and tournaments direct from the Marvel Universe★ Exclusively written by Marvel’s Frank Tieri (Iron Man, Wolverine, Weapon X) and Alex Irvine (Iron Man: The Rapture, Daredevil Noir)THE ORIGINAL MATCH THREE SUPER HERO GAME!Match tiles to annihilate your opponents, harnessing Hulk’s superpower strength or Professor X’s mind control to manipulate the game board! Match 3 gems to power up, damage and bring even the most powerful Marvel comics characters to their knees. Will you be able to rank among the top champions?PLAY WITH MARVEL’S GREATEST HEROES AND VILLAINSRecruit your favorite Super Hero characters from the X-Men, Avengers, S.H.I.E.L.D., Guardians of the Galaxy and more to create the ultimate Marvel dream team! Whether you play Spider-Man alongside his arch-nemesis Venom, or play Captain Marvel alongside her Ms. Marvel successor, Kamala Khan, YOU assemble your very own epic team of Marvel Comics Super Heroes!Play Ms. Marvel and her infamous fists against your fiercest foes or launch Captain America’s shield to stun your opponents in the final contest. Marvel Puzzle Quest’s ever-growing list of Super Hero comics and movie characters is updated regularly with new Super Heroes including Magneto, Black Panther, Ant-Man, Daredevil and more!UPGRADE YOUR CHAMPIONS AND GAIN POWERFUL REWARDSHarness the power of Iso-8 to upgrade your Super Hero Dream Team and collect comics to unlock Marvel characters and new superpowers. descriptionHTML:
Marvel Comics’ fearless Super Heroes and evil Super Villains come to life in this Official Marvel match 3 role playing game! Create your own epic Dream Team using the strongest Super Heroes and the nastiest Super Villains in the Marvel Universe! Play Super Hero characters like Spider-Man, Captain America, Wolverine and the Hulk as you battle your way to victory through multi-level match-three puzzles. Thor, Iron Man, Deadpool and other comic and movie Super Heroes await your challenge!

FEATURES
★ Snag the top rank in Tournaments, Alliances, and Season Play for new character rewards and other prizes!
★ Form alliances with your friends and use your collective power to fight other players in events and epic battles via chat
★ Experience deep RPG leveling
★ Challenge your team of Super Heroes in exciting Player vs. Player tournaments
★ Build strategic alliances with your favorite heroes and villains
★ Join a community of 8 million players worldwide
★ New events, features and tournaments direct from the Marvel Universe
★ Exclusively written by Marvel’s Frank Tieri (Iron Man, Wolverine, Weapon X) and Alex Irvine (Iron Man: The Rapture, Daredevil Noir)

THE ORIGINAL MATCH THREE SUPER HERO GAME!
Match tiles to annihilate your opponents, harnessing Hulk’s superpower strength or Professor X’s mind control to manipulate the game board! Match 3 gems to power up, damage and bring even the most powerful Marvel comics characters to their knees. Will you be able to rank among the top champions?

PLAY WITH MARVEL’S GREATEST HEROES AND VILLAINS
Recruit your favorite Super Hero characters from the X-Men, Avengers, S.H.I.E.L.D., Guardians of the Galaxy and more to create the ultimate Marvel dream team! Whether you play Spider-Man alongside his arch-nemesis Venom, or play Captain Marvel alongside her Ms. Marvel successor, Kamala Khan, YOU assemble your very own epic team of Marvel Comics Super Heroes!

Play Ms. Marvel and her infamous fists against your fiercest foes or launch Captain America’s shield to stun your opponents in the final contest. Marvel Puzzle Quest’s ever-growing list of Super Hero comics and movie characters is updated regularly with new Super Heroes including Magneto, Black Panther, Ant-Man, Daredevil and more!

UPGRADE YOUR CHAMPIONS AND GAIN POWERFUL REWARDS
Harness the power of Iso-8 to upgrade your Super Hero Dream Team and collect comics to unlock Marvel characters and new superpowers.

App is available in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, and Korean.

comments: Fantastic game.I am loving this game. Still there is few problem.Miniclips please solve the issues. After players matching ,game is hacked/stopped by several times.Only way to win that kind of match,any of one player has to quit or network issues.Its waste of time,also harm for devices (battery drainage,high heating). So,admin plz look after these prob.Why it's hanging or hacking.

As football based game it is superb, in terms of gameplay, graphics etc. But the biggest idiotic part of this game is that if freezes like magic. The whole game main screen becomes unresponsive and stays like that no matters the game is restarted or the damn phone is. Get this thing sorted out Miniclip. You have a reputation to maintain or not?

Could you please enable the user to save his progress in a Gmail account??  So that, when you lost or change your phone, you can recover the level and progress you had before instead of restarting from the beginning!!!!!!!!!!!!   If you could allow more media for sharing the game, it would be better, Facebook is not the only social media!!   And sometimes, it bugs!! Sometimes, the game is very slow and causes you to lose. Indeed, you shoot but the ball goes after many seconds even though the connexion is good!! Consequently you loose against a weak player, And this makes very angry!!!   Should those problems fixed, I will rate 5 stars.

I think this game is a really fun addicting game. The main reason why I got it was because of 8 ball pool. That game is also very fun. The only thing I don't like about football strike is that when I get on sometimes it won't let me click the spinner. So it's like my phone froze. But my phone didn't freeze. It's just the app. So can you guys please fix this.

At first I was skeptical about this game. I had downloaded it and went without playing for a couple of weeks. Then,one day I just happen to open the app and play. Best move I ever made for an app! This game is just flat out addicting, fun and challenging.  I was pleasantly surprised about how much fun it is and that there is, most of the time, something new.  Chalkenign friends and new people always makes for a challenging and fun time waster. Even if I don't have the time to play, I still make time!! Haha

There is a bug in your game I went first of my league, supposingly I am entitled to 350 cash, but it wasn't there.  How could you make it so unfair for someone. Why bother having a prizes if not given to the right person.

comments: The game itself is wonderful, but I've had this bug ever since Chapter 2 or 3 (I just finished Chapter 12) where when I finish the final level, the screen goes black and won't play the cutscene. I end up having to close the game and never get to see it, then I go into the next Chapter not really knowing what's going on. The story is important to me and it's very unfortunate that this is happening. A fix from the developers or a suggestion on something I can do would be greatly appreciated.

Really enjoy this game.  Just wish we could pay for land expansions because they don't come fast enough.  Running out of room to place everything.  Yes they have the cargo ship but you lose points for doing that.

I play whenever I can. Very Enjoyable!  Love both searching scenes and decorating my island. Love being able to rearrange, and I wish I could move the gifts I receive.  Don't like waiting the 4 hours to regain energy and I would gladly watch ads to be able to fill my energy. It would be nice to have a larger expansion area while needing the same requirements. Love the speciality collections!  Great job!

In one of the recent updates, the timers to receive flowers messed up.  Purchased the passenger car and I'm on the fourth day so far. It counts down, but just before it finishes, another day is added.
Game is too slow to progress. You find the clues, you get the flowers but you have to spend DAYS to get stars to progress!
Energy Bar drains too quickly. Other than this very cool game.

A hidden object game for story lovers everywhere

Discover June’s Journey, the brand new hidden object game from the makers of Pearl’s Peril. Find hidden clues and solve exciting puzzles across beautiful locations that draw you right into the heart of the mystery!
Surprises at every turn, stunning hand drawn scenes, and a cast of glamorous characters await you in a globetrotting story game. From the heart of 1920s America to the perfect style of Paris and beyond, enjoy a story unlike anything you’ve seen before.
With every new chapter, you’ll sink into a world of thrilling mystery and exciting drama in a story to take you around the world.
Take a break from the stresses of life, and dive into a mystery game like no other.

*MORE THAN JUST A MYSTERY!*
FROM THE MAKERS OF PEARL’S PERIL – The follow-up to the hit hidden object game played by over 90 million fans

MODERN WOMEN – Join June, a brave adventurer in a mystery game you’ll love
TRAVEL THE WORLD – See some of the most beautiful places in the world, all lovingly hand captured from the 1920s
ALL-NEW EPISODES – Just like your favourite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new chapter

comments: Cars could look better and authentic during the race. They look like miniature toy cars. Not even look like the real car. You should patch the game after some time, after you have the revenue. Cars not even look like they "look" in the real life. The gameplay is alright so far, might become enjoyable for a longer gameplay.   Just started, but I wasn't suggested to invite my friends to play. Correct it also for making the community larger. Where is the option to play with my friends? Also, any crew creator option? So far , 4/5. Started yesterday

I normally hate card base games, but I saw the preview as an ad on another game. So I thought it looked good enough to try it out. This game is HELL A LOT BETTER than the preview suggested. It does have pacts of cards to buy with real money, yet at the same time you earn gold coins to buy same packs. You can easily save the gold coins to buy these packs. LOVE THIS GAME
Hi... The game keeps crashing down after the recent update.. Can't even write to the support team about it, it crashes just seconds after I start the game.. Help!

I liked the game but the reason its a 4 is because on the 0 to 150 races i have a car that its high is 157 mph but it just randomly stops at 134 and says dnf my car is way faster plz fix the Chevrolet Impala 1967 and my Chevrolet Camero 1970 can make it to 145 mph on a mile drag but cant make it to 130 mph on a 0 to 150 race, thats bs plz fix these cars' top speeds plz. They r broken

Great game, constantly playing, was crashing this morning but fixed now so up to 5 stars.  Would like more ways to make money once the campaign is 100% complete, maybe more, or replayable campaigns, or new game modes all together, but still great fun.
Since yesterday I can't even the game anymore keeps crashing right after the loading screen I wish that a lot of money on this game if it's not working properly I will complain

descriptionHTML:
Think you know your cars? It’s time to put your knowledge to the test in Top Drives - the #1 FREE car racing card collection game on mobile.
BUILD THE PERFECT CAR RACING DECK from over 700 officially licensed cars.
UNLEASH YOUR CARS on 100s of racing challenges with our all-new Card Racing System.
COMPETE FOR EXCLUSIVE CARS in live multiplayer events against rivals.

Why is Top Drives the ultimate motorsport experience for every car enthusiast?
- Marques such as McLaren, Bugatti, Pagani, Porsche, Mercedes and many more.
- Real Car stats sourced from Evo Magazine making this the ultimate bench racing tool.
- Manage, upgrade and tune your cars – be the best motorsport manager.
- Race scenarios include drag strips, race circuits & hill climbs.
- Weather effects and multiple surface types, including dirt, asphalt, and snow.
- Stunning car photography from one of the world’s top car magazines.
- Addictive and fun racing strategy gameplay.

Top Drives is free to play but offers some optional in-game items that can be purchased for real money. Top Drives is an online game and requires a persistent internet connection to play.

comments: One of the best game i've played, so many reward systems, good control and great graphics. Keep up the gpod work, hope to see more new hero. One last thing, the co-op mode has some bug where u created the room but unable to start the game even when u have enough player. Please fix that, thank you.

I think it's a good game. Suck that you have to pay money to go up against other people that already have SS Hero's. Just wanted to say y'all should make at least more S hero's that are FTP so y'all can get people to get back into the game I don't want this game to die off.

The game is really addictive. Hours of game play and activities. I really like it. However, since it's international the time for coop game should be more flexible so i can join with my friends at suitable time. Tournament matching is a little bit unbalanced, either it's a raid or it's a total defeat. And heroes skills should  give more details on stats, so we can plan effectively. Thank you for such a good game.

They are about to make it more of a money trap with an update that screws f2p and budgeted p2w. They say they have free events and events so part time p2w have fun. Then why are people talking about quitting? These are high paying players. I know you plan on making it so hero's bought for special skills like stun and silence won't work if there's a big gap. You've made it so hero's bought for the purpose of moving these budgeted p2w are useless. So it's in favor of real p2w. It should be a reverse. Make the lower people have a better chance not a worse one.

I found an issue, when I defeat the boss by bleed damage, the victory screen doesn't show up. It just stuck at the boss level with its dead body lying on the ground. I hope you fix this. Great game by the way.

Heroes Night Watch unique skill is not working. It stated any enemies that hit the magic barrier will be stopped immediately but when I use it in arena enemies pass the barrier like nothing. It had been a month and nobody seems bother about this.

descriptionHTML:
TAP, SWIPE & SLING your heroes to send them smashing towards hordes of monsters, unleashing explosive power on impact and looting epic treasures!

ALSO FEATURES

•Simple Control, Super Fun:
Issue orders, take aim and cast skills, all easily controlled by a finger swipe!

•Turn-based combat and tactical thinking:
Plan your moves, adjust formations and build up combos to overcome your enemies!

•Strategic Team-building & Hero Collection:
Each hero comes with a set of unique stats & skills that greatly affects how your plan & plan!
Try out different setups to gain the upper hand!

•Multiplayer Game Modes: Fun With Friends & Prove Your Strength
Play Co-op levels with up to 3 buddies, share the extra loot & fun!
Or battle head-to-head against other players in real-time PVP duels!

Hyper Heroes is free to download and play, however, some in-game items can be purchased with real money.
If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

A network connection is required to play, and Wifi connection is recommended for multiplayer games.

Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/hyperheroes

Our service mailbox: hyperheroes@90kmile.com

comments: the new fusion medals added make it so you can not fuse heros without spending money this game is officially broken theres no free way to advance anymore dont download. its very sad i like the idea behind the medals but whos going to grind with 0 progress for 8 months and still not get thier first 6 star .... its messed up

All in all a fun game which u dont have to pay for.. on lvl 104 now and still enjoying the game and actually progressing too.. thumbs up from me! Update: dropped down to 3* after update. Totally been made to p2w now by adding stupid fusion medals.. was a hrund before but now almost unplayable.. greed have ruined the game for me and will probably uninstall.. many others also when u go in chat room.. not good epic summoners, not good at all.. good game ruined again :(

Latest update with fusion medals ruined the game. Got stuck like many other players. Fusing was hard enough without them (ie collecting 4 same 4 star heroes plus 4 same 3 star, PLUS random 4 star heroes... Ridiculous) to get 5 star one, now you stuck waiting to lvl up your current ones to pass stage boss and MAYBE get fusion medals... Ruined very good game.

What the hell are you people thinking,.  Fusion Medals are the most ridiculous thing to add to the game.   It was bad enough the game cost so much to play, but then you really screw us over good with Fusion medals.   Crooks,. You guys should be in jail. Class action law suit.  Horrible,.   Don't play this game, waste of your time and big money.

They absolutely ruined this game with the last 2 updates! Be prepared to spend a fortune to be competitive! They took away the best parts of the Game! Added another item you need to make heroes that are very difficult to get! Then they reduced the number of dark soul you get when disassembling heroes! I'm a paying customer, don't mind supporting development but not when you feel taken advantage of! Don't recommend this game! Very Very Greedy company! Planners should Be Fired!

New updates have killed game experience.  Now not only do you have to wait to gain xp for adventure levels,  you are now limited on fusing characters.  Lack of ability to gain fusion medals limits game play. Very few other actions log in and play 10 minutes a day and then nothing to do for another whole day.  No ability to move at your own pace.  Everything is limited.  To those that can endure slow pace only way to gain in game is slowly over time with daily log ins.
