comments: I absolutely LOVE this game!! The stories of each character are amazing! I just wish they had more suitors. And I wish they made more games exactly like this but with a completely new story line and characters. Like, I love the voice animations and how long the chapters are and how long the story line of each person is. I also love how your character talks like a modern day girl when she's at the sengoku era. You don't have to pay to see more about each person either. It's amazing. I Love this app. Please make more!!!! ❤️❤️❤️

So, this is my third update. That's how much I love this game 😂. Thank you for giving us castle and closet space via game events. Very helpful. I don't have anymore lag issues. And I appreciate the diversity in storylines. No route is the same, unlike other Otome games. Also, the relationship development is fantastic - not too slow or fast. The main character actually talks like a real person and less like a "character". Art is beautiful, too. I just feel bad that I can't say much about the music or voice acting, as I usually have my phone on vibrate.

Idk what to say, but one thing for sure I really loveee this game!!!! Is so awesome, the chara omg so magnificent. I don't mind spending much money on this game hahaha it's so freaking beautiful!!! And I really love the MC she's so strong and cute, it's just like I want to have a route for MC too. But rn I'm waiting for KENSHIN UESUGI route, I hope it will come out soon. Damn, Cybird always make such a beautiful otome game. Thank you for making this game, it just made my life💗💗💗💗

I couldn't resist to do a newer version of the review, so here it is. I've been playing this game for nearly three months now, and that's saying something. First of all, the story is really engaging. The characters are really sweet, and I love how we don't need to spend money to enjoy it, unlike other otome games. Shout-out to the people who made Ieyasu's route a dream come true.

There are only a few routes out currently but they are wonderful all the same. The main character is funny and reacts realistically to situations! Not to mention the voice acting is impeccable like wow I don't speak a word of Japanese but everytime Nobunaga speaks I'm just nodding along. Also this game has an adorable animated series and it is the best

The most romantic and sweetest experience of falling in love game..  I feel like I'm truly falling in love with Masamune date.. Love his playful side, his sweetness,  fierce yet gentle  sometimes.. The only reason I CANNOT RATE 5 STAR is I cant read back the route chosen even though I have spent actual money..  Its like I'm purchasing the story,  but the fact is,  I'm not.. This is frustrating..  Atleast after having spending so much money,  we can keep the story to be read again afterwards..  Please reconsider this..  Thank you
description: You've just nabbed your dream job as a fashion designer when you're sent hurtling back in time to an alternate version of Sengoku era Japan! After accidentally changing history and earning the favor of warlord Nobunaga Oda by saving him from near death, you must survive 3 months surrounded by Japan's most famous and handsome Sengoku warlords before your next chance to make it back home. In a world where it takes one man to conquer a nation, do you have what it takes to conquer his heart?Ikémen Sengoku: Romances Across Time, one of CYBIRD's most popular games in Japan, is finally out in English! Enjoy a vibrant, exciting story complete with engaging music, gorgeous illustrations, and character voices! Receive 5 free Chapter Tickets each day to progress through the story! Free to download! Play now and find your one and only Sengoku love!■Enjoy Characters voiced by some of Japan's most popular Voice Actors!Nobunaga Oda (Voice: Tomokazu Sugita)Masamune Date (Voice: Kazuki Kato)Yukimura Sanada (Voice: Kensho Ono)Ieyasu Tokugawa (Voice: Toshiki Masuda)Hideyoshi Toyotomi (Voice: Kohsuke Toriumi)Shingen Takeda (Voice: Yuuichiro Umehara)Mitsuhide Akechi (Voice: Shunsuke Takeuchi)Mitsunari Ishida (Voice: Yoshitaka Yamaya)Kenshin Uesugi (Voice: Hiroaki Miura)Sasuke Sarutobi (Voice: Kenji Akabane)Kennyo (Voice: Tarusuke Shingaki)■Collect Gorgeous Illustrations!With each character route, you receive 3 beautiful illustrations of your guy that will suck you right into his story! You can also receive illustrations through special in-game events!■Cute Avatars for Every Girl to Enjoy. Dress Up Your Guy As Well!Experience more interactive otome gameplay with the in-game avatars!Extravagant kimono, beautiful Japanese rooms and gardens, and cute accessories all await you in this game.Collect hundreds of attire pieces to adorn your avatar. Limited edition attire pieces are constantly being added so that you can always stay up to date with the latest trends! Characters from the story are also available as avatars!Dress up your love interest for the perfect day out together.■Shape Your Story through the Choices You Make!In Ikémen Sengoku, there are multiple endings available for each guy depending on the choices you make in the game. If you get enough points you might even receive a special epilogue with your one true love! Which happy ending awaits you? Play to find out!■Enjoy In-Game Story Events for a New Experience with Your Guy!Ikémen Sengoku holds many free Story Events that require no Chapter Tickets to continue reading! Play to experience exciting mini stories outside of the main story. Get into new situations with your favorite guys, and clear endings to get bonus items and attire pieces!Team up with your friends to clear the events faster and get every event ending!*1・・・Free to Play （In-Game Payable Content Available）
descriptionHTML:
You've just nabbed your dream job as a fashion designer when you're sent hurtling back in time to an alternate version of Sengoku era Japan!

After accidentally changing history and earning the favor of warlord Nobunaga Oda by saving him from near death, you must survive 3 months surrounded by Japan's most famous and handsome Sengoku warlords before your next chance to make it back home. In a world where it takes one man to conquer a nation, do you have what it takes to conquer his heart?

Ikémen Sengoku: Romances Across Time, one of CYBIRD's most popular games in Japan, is finally out in English! Enjoy a vibrant, exciting story complete with engaging music, gorgeous illustrations, and character voices! Receive 5 free Chapter Tickets each day to progress through the story! Free to download! Play now and find your one and only Sengoku love!

■Enjoy Characters voiced by some of Japan's most popular Voice Actors!
Nobunaga Oda (Voice: Tomokazu Sugita)
Masamune Date (Voice: Kazuki Kato)
Yukimura Sanada (Voice: Kensho Ono)
Ieyasu Tokugawa (Voice: Toshiki Masuda)
Hideyoshi Toyotomi (Voice: Kohsuke Toriumi)
Shingen Takeda (Voice: Yuuichiro Umehara)
Mitsuhide Akechi (Voice: Shunsuke Takeuchi)
Mitsunari Ishida (Voice: Yoshitaka Yamaya)
Kenshin Uesugi (Voice: Hiroaki Miura)
Sasuke Sarutobi (Voice: Kenji Akabane)
Kennyo (Voice: Tarusuke Shingaki)

■Collect Gorgeous Illustrations!
With each character route, you receive 3 beautiful illustrations of your guy that will suck you right into his story! You can also receive illustrations through special in-game events!

■Cute Avatars for Every Girl to Enjoy. Dress Up Your Guy As Well!
Experience more interactive otome gameplay with the in-game avatars!
Extravagant kimono, beautiful Japanese rooms and gardens, and cute accessories all await you in this game.
Collect hundreds of attire pieces to adorn your avatar. Limited edition attire pieces are constantly being added so that you can always stay up to date with the latest trends! Characters from the story are also available as avatars!
Dress up your love interest for the perfect day out together.

■Shape Your Story through the Choices You Make!
In Ikémen Sengoku, there are multiple endings available for each guy depending on the choices you make in the game. If you get enough points you might even receive a special epilogue with your one true love! Which happy ending awaits you? Play to find out!

■Enjoy In-Game Story Events for a New Experience with Your Guy!
Ikémen Sengoku holds many free Story Events that require no Chapter Tickets to continue reading! Play to experience exciting mini stories outside of the main story. Get into new situations with your favorite guys, and clear endings to get bonus items and attire pieces!
Team up with your friends to clear the events faster and get every event ending!


*1・・・Free to Play （In-Game Payable Content Available）

comments: pretty good game except that they still havent been able to fix the bugs that prevents the game to be accessed easily. always getting a black screen after the intro or it says network unstable. from the other reviews, its affecting android phones. prolly fix this issue before other fixes i guess

This game is not stable on android phones at all. I find i cannot play it "due to network instability" on my phone when I can on my iPad, using the same wifi network.  It crashes and sometimes lags.  Very frustrating. #firstworldproblems
I can't play it if im using data. But if im on wifi, its all good. This only happens to me after i change my phone from Huawei Mate 9 to Mate 10. Pls get it fix!
This is a fun game to play, when it loads. It shows the video of the Tsum Tsums then it freezes on a black screen. Very annoying that it takes 5 or 6 attempts to start it before you can play.

I like this game a lot, but it has some one big frustration. In a game that involves the collection of various characters, it can be disheartening to spend money on this game and still not get the tsum tsum you want,  even during the so-called "lucky times". I recommend keeping your money in your wallet since it is unlikely that you collect the ones that you want, when you want them.   There is also a minor glitch in loading the game, but if you try multiple times, it will eventually load.

Huwaei P9 Lite DON'T PLAY IT!!  I used to play this game all the time and I even got all my friends to play it... BUT sadly it stopped working on my phone months and months ago (almost like... A year?). It is very sad because I did love it but now I just can't find a way of getting it to work on my phone. PLEASE FIX IT!

descriptionHTML:
70 million downloads world wide!!

LINE: Disney Tsum Tsum is the fluffiest puzzle game ever! Collect, connect and pop Tsum Tsum based on the popular Disney Tsum Tsum plushes.

Mickey Mouse, Winnie the Pooh, Frozen and more beloved Disney characters are here!

Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains social media links to connect with others and in-app purchases that cost real money.

How to Play
-Collect Tsum Tsum and set your favorite as your MyTsum.
-Connect 3 or more of the same Tsum Tsum to pop them.
-The more Tsum Tsum you connect, the more points you'll get!
-Trigger off Fever Mode to rack up a whole bunch of extra points!
-Each Tsum Tsum has a different skill. Use the one that matches your play style! Find a strategy that works for you!

LINE Disney Tsum Tsum is published by LINE under license from Disney.

comments: This is not another Clash of Clans clone, but definitely pushes the boundaries of the clan genre. Good graphics, fun gameplay, and balanced in terms of units vs. defences for your island. While diamonds can be purchased by real-world money, the game doesn't trap you into needing them. The weekly mini-game missions help keep things fresh and assist in moving your base up the tech tree if you're patient. SuperCell is continually expanding the game to keep it interesting. Definitely worth a download!

Like ot a lot. Taskforces need to be improved drasticly. Focus on playing with others makes it a lot more fun. EDIT: still no real task force improvements, why it doesn't open straight onto you TF or why I have to go through several buttons to see people starts is stupid. sorting this out make my review 5*

Very addictive and always checking on my base, upgrades etc. Strategic game play, however too much pressure to buy diamonds as it takes FOREVER! !! for some things to upgrade. Seriously. ..2 days for an upgrade??? Only other issue is the limited time "special abilities"...they're fun but it makes it far too easy for someone to raid your base and take all resources needed to get the upgrades. Lots of fun and love the graphics

The graphics are amazing for this type of game. And I think that's why so many people love it. The only thing I wish that their could be is offline play. Just block the chats and player raids and only allow campaign attacks and their would be many more players able to play... Bcs sometimes I don't have data or wifi where I am and it's a pain bcs I love Supercell games. And ik why there isn't offline play, bcs the other players that attack you. But their must be some way around that like maybe a whole offline mode. Well if u read this ty and it's a great game keep up the amazing work you do providing us with amazing games...  ~Bladez

I have played this game since it has come out and I have seen all of the changes and they have shaped that game for better over the years the game has been out it has improved and is one of my best games I have ever played. But the down side is that it is really hard to get resources at first but then before you know it you are full and you have nothing to do about it. Also when getting the heros they should make that base a bit easier because the lower level people can't attack till the have a lot better troops.

Great game, but too slow. While I love the lack of pay to win, I'd wish for a way to speed up resource gathering: I've cleared out every similar level player in my area, and spend days waiting for RSS to build up so I can upgrade. Which is necessary before I can access a larger zone. No point buying speedup gems, as I've never anything to use them on!

Scout, plan, then BOOM THE BEACH!PLEASE NOTE! Boom Beach is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. Welcome to Boom Beach: come with a plan or leave in defeat!

Fight the evil Blackguard with brains and brawn in this epic combat strategy game. Attack enemy bases to free enslaved islanders and unlock the secrets of this tropical paradise. Create a Task Force with players around the world to take on the enemy together. Scout, plan, then BOOM THE BEACH!

PLEASE NOTE! Boom Beach is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.

FEATURES

- Battle for control of precious resources to upgrade your base against enemy attacks
- Explore a huge tropical archipelago and discover the mysterious power of the Life Crystals
- Face fearsome Blackguard Bosses and uncover their evil plans
- Join other players to form an unstoppable Task Force to take on co-op missions

Under our Terms of Services and Privacy Policy, Boom Beach is allowed for download and play only for persons 13 years or over of age without parental consent.

comments: Addictive and engrossing game.  The bonus covers work well. The constant character tweaking and release rate makes the vs progression awards with wins is very good.  The favorites is a good way to let folks focus on building certain characters.  The transition points are still frustrating, especially when you get a run of bad luck with tokens.  Tokens might work better if they scaled instead. Biggest issue is progression awards in versus and the tough transitions in levels.

I have been playing this game for a few years now and love it! But a little suggestion... Because of the time I've spent playing it and the already difficult ability to get 4 and 5 star characters, I have nearly 3 million iso-8 that I literally cannot spend. Please add a way to convert iso-8 into hero points or command points!!! I'd like to get further in the game instead of literally stockpiling iso-8. This has all been done without spending a single dollar on the game too, btw

This is an awesome, addictive and hyper fun game. Brilliant idea and concept. In all the games I have played this is the first I have spent money on. VIP member. Have a couple suggestions for developer tho. Can you add abilities to swap covers with alliance members and maybe add as a bonus drop for playing, an extra free slot. Keep up the brilliant work. Truely love this game.

This is my go-to game. Day and night. It's fun, simple and sometime challenging. My only complaint is that i have like a million of Iso-8 and don't know what to do with them. My thought would be that if we don't need so much Iso-8, be sweet to give some to aliance member who needs it or so on. Great game. Don't know what I'd do without it!

Suitable for all age groups, Marvel Puzzle Quest is a great game for everyone. Progress with higher tier characters may be slow but yet significant. The wide variety of heroes and villians within the game allows for endless possibilities of the "best team". Highly addictive, I would recommend this perfect game to anyone and everyone.

Love that they are always adding new characters. Would like to see some different characters like Cable, Domino, Sabretooth, and Bishop just to name a few. Just because they don't have a movie... Would also like to see some new events, new animations, and less repetitiveness. Love the collection part and finally being able to use characters when you've finally built their powers enough. Love that it can be played for free. Love that feedback is read and the game is constantly evolving.Thanks.
description: Marvel Comics’ fearless Super Heroes and evil Super Villains come to life in this Official Marvel match 3 role playing game! Create your own epic Dream Team using the strongest Super Heroes and the nastiest Super Villains in the Marvel Universe! Play Super Hero characters like Spider-Man, Captain America, Wolverine and the Hulk as you battle your way to victory through multi-level match-three puzzles. Thor, Iron Man, Deadpool and other comic and movie Super Heroes await your challenge!   FEATURES★ Snag the top rank in Tournaments, Alliances, and Season Play for new character rewards and other prizes! ★ Form alliances with your friends and use your collective power to fight other players in events and epic battles via chat★ Experience deep RPG leveling★ Challenge your team of Super Heroes in exciting Player vs. Player tournaments★ Build strategic alliances with your favorite heroes and villains★ Join a community of 8 million players worldwide★ New events, features and tournaments direct from the Marvel Universe★ Exclusively written by Marvel’s Frank Tieri (Iron Man, Wolverine, Weapon X) and Alex Irvine (Iron Man: The Rapture, Daredevil Noir)THE ORIGINAL MATCH THREE SUPER HERO GAME!Match tiles to annihilate your opponents, harnessing Hulk’s superpower strength or Professor X’s mind control to manipulate the game board! Match 3 gems to power up, damage and bring even the most powerful Marvel comics characters to their knees. Will you be able to rank among the top champions?PLAY WITH MARVEL’S GREATEST HEROES AND VILLAINSRecruit your favorite Super Hero characters from the X-Men, Avengers, S.H.I.E.L.D., Guardians of the Galaxy and more to create the ultimate Marvel dream team! Whether you play Spider-Man alongside his arch-nemesis Venom, or play Captain Marvel alongside her Ms. Marvel successor, Kamala Khan, YOU assemble your very own epic team of Marvel Comics Super Heroes!Play Ms. Marvel and her infamous fists against your fiercest foes or launch Captain America’s shield to stun your opponents in the final contest. Marvel Puzzle Quest’s ever-growing list of Super Hero comics and movie characters is updated regularly with new Super Heroes including Magneto, Black Panther, Ant-Man, Daredevil and more!UPGRADE YOUR CHAMPIONS AND GAIN POWERFUL REWARDSHarness the power of Iso-8 to upgrade your Super Hero Dream Team and collect comics to unlock Marvel characters and new superpowers. App is available in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, and Korean.Developed by Demiurge StudiosINSTALL MPQ TO UNLEASH YOUR INNER SUPER HERO AND BECOME PART OF THE MARVEL UNIVERSE!© 2017 MARVELGAME SOFTWARE © 2017 D3 Go!

comments: Would be ZERO STARS. Lost my account and no way to retrieve it. Piece or garbage app I spent money to support and now it is gone. Not even able to try to retrieve my account. Just forces me to start over. What a garbage game. Don't waste your time since it is so easy to lose everything. ZERO STARS! Avoid this game like the plague. No customer service and you will just be a farm for other players. ZERO STARS
Pay to win, it seems. Similar to King of Avalon: Dragon Warfare (or whatever it was called).  Ditched them both now. KoA draws you in, but then you become fodder for the big spenders.

It looks good BUT so geared to paying extra it's pointless, just purely money driven, got less than hour before realizing everything is pay for! I paid a bit so didn't expect for free. Don't waste your life and money. No advancement without paying, constant cry for cash. Shameful.

shows homm5 gameplay in the trailer. something completely different in the actual game. i wonder if false advertising applies to f2p games. still its generic time sink and a reskin of those mobile "strategy" games that are all the same thing
Tons of fun, frustrating at first cuz you get constantly attacked by armies way stronger than you, but that passes and you actually get to enjoy the game after that. Very much like HOMM 3
Error code 3 always appears on the hero trial. What does it mean?
description: Bored with typical MMO Strategy game play? Play War and Magic! Every action counts for battle victory.It’s time to show your strategic mind and capture the legendary honors in the most exciting REAL TIME MMO ACTION STRATEGY GAME! The well-designed battle system may challenge your strategic and tactical thinking. Command every action of your troops and every decision counts in the battles. Power is no longer the key to victory, but tactics and strategy.Ally with worldwide players and fight for the highest throne in this magic world. descriptionHTML:
Bored with typical MMO Strategy game play? Play War and Magic! Every action counts for battle victory.

It’s time to show your strategic mind and capture the legendary honors in the most exciting REAL TIME MMO ACTION STRATEGY GAME! The well-designed battle system may challenge your strategic and tactical thinking. Command every action of your troops and every decision counts in the battles. Power is no longer the key to victory, but tactics and strategy.

Ally with worldwide players and fight for the highest throne in this magic world. Build an empire with advanced technologies and structures. Protect your homeland and fight against enemies with legendary heroes and powerful troops. Support each other within the alliance and fight for the honors together. Only the winners from the clash could be commemorated as legends!

FREE to play! Get it now!


Real Time Tactics and Strategy
- Improved game play for chessboard battlefield – every strategic action counts!
- Strategically mix and match various heroes and soldiers for powerful troops.

Build an Empire
- Forge powerful equipment, level up your structures and technologies for greater power.
- Real time resource management – maximize every bit of your resources and grow as fast as possible!
- Look out for the enemies! Improve your defense ability and never let them succeed in plundering.
- Participate in various daily competitions which could strengthen your empire power.

Trigger an Online World War
- Released worldwide in 8 languages. You could ALLY or FIGHT with other players worldwide in real time.
- Attack your enemies and colonize the land! Also, be careful about improving your defense ability.
- United we stand, divided we fall! Share troops and resources with alliance members to support and strengthen each other. Remember, you are not alone!
- Battle for the throne! Conquer and defend the three world cities, struggling for the crown of the King.

Explore the Magic World
- 8 legendary heroes and 17 types of soldiers with unique skills and spells for you to choose from.
- Seek exotic monsters in the extensive world map and captive them for your troops.
- Visit relics covered under the mist and grab the treasures.

Need helps?
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warandmagic/
Email: cstyroriaglobal@gmail.com

comments: A good graphics for a good beginning franchise. A well tame game for an anime base. But my concerns on playing this game is sometimes ita forcing crash. (I thought this was a high end game so basically you need a good phone that can handle a game like this) im looking forward for better improvements such as more charcaters to come. And much more sfx. Big thumbs up for this game.

Great game and graphics. Need to work on the optimization though as constant crashes occurs. Will also be thrilled to see rework on Yomo as he looks really plain in this game. Character collision and ability lock in also needs improvement, especially those with dashes which will be better to have single target lock in. Overall as a TG fan I love this game.

The game is absolutely amazing ^^ This is definitely one of the better start up games in the app store. I would love to see more improvement with the graphics, load time, and effects. I can't wait to see the characters that will be added next. If I may I'd like to suggest that everyone's eyeball fascinated mask maker be added. Uta is definitely one of my favorite characters and it's a shame Yomo was implemented but not Uta. Many wishes for this game ^^

I have been waiting for someone to make a Tokyo ghoul game now here it is. What can I say about this game other then its awesome I love it , but I do wish they would add more characters and maybe add some from the Tokyo ghoul re manga but anyways awesome game. Now someone needs to make a my hero academia game then a one piece game and I'll be happy.

Had been really enjoying this game despite the consistent crashes.  Now; however, the game won't even start.  It stays stuck on the beginning loading screen.  Please fix and I will update my review.  EDIT:  issue fixed.  Looks like it was maintenance they didn't bother announcing until after the fact.  Love the game so still 5 stars but would be nice to have to some advance notice with these things.

Ok, as fun as this game is, it has a lot of problems. Severe lagging during missions and crashing, just to name the few. On top of that, lately I can't even start up the game, cuz I get stack on the loading screen before I can even log in into the server. Very disappointed. There's hoping the devs will fix that issue soon, since this game shows a lot of potential.
description: Tokyo Ghoul: Dark War is an anime ARPG mobile game offcially authorized by Studio Pierrot and launched by GameSamba. In this game, experience the original story from Tokyo Ghoul, collect your favorite characters, face exciting challenges, battle together with other players and attend PVP events.- Especially designed for mobile devices!Enjoy a fun and simple mobile operation experience, simply touch the screen and play the game.- Next-gen graphics, delicate music and original sound effects will completely immerse you in the Tokyo Ghoul world!The game features stunning graphics and character skills. Travel through the dark Tokyo streets, Anteiku, CCG Laboratory and other familiar settings from the anime. Original anime clips will be used for game scenes, and the English-dubbed version of the anime will take you back to the Tokyo Ghoul world.- Choose your favorite characters! Select different Ghouls and CCG Investigators to fight together!Ken Kaneki, Touka Kirishima and other popular anime characters will appear in the game. You can choose from over 50 different characters. Even if characters belong to opposing sides, they can fight side by side on your team as you build the strongest combinations!- Multi-dimensional character growth system to develop characters in different ways!Collect, raise, grow, upgrade, equip, and choose different character combinations to make the best team. Create a unique formation of your own!- Rich solo and team gameplay!Besides the traditional solo challenge, the game also offers high level dungeons that requires team cooperation. If you love PVP mode, you will enjoy playing the MOBA mode as well. Call up your friends and fight to your heart’s content!
descriptionHTML:
Tokyo Ghoul: Dark War is an anime ARPG mobile game offcially authorized by Studio Pierrot and launched by GameSamba. In this game, experience the original story from Tokyo Ghoul, collect your favorite characters, face exciting challenges, battle together with other players and attend PVP events.

- Especially designed for mobile devices!
Enjoy a fun and simple mobile operation experience, simply touch the screen and play the game.

- Next-gen graphics, delicate music and original sound effects will completely immerse you in the Tokyo Ghoul world!
The game features stunning graphics and character skills. Travel through the dark Tokyo streets, Anteiku, CCG Laboratory and other familiar settings from the anime. Original anime clips will be used for game scenes, and the English-dubbed version of the anime will take you back to the Tokyo Ghoul world.

- Choose your favorite characters! Select different Ghouls and CCG Investigators to fight together!
Ken Kaneki, Touka Kirishima and other popular anime characters will appear in the game. You can choose from over 50 different characters. Even if characters belong to opposing sides, they can fight side by side on your team as you build the strongest combinations!

- Multi-dimensional character growth system to develop characters in different ways!
Collect, raise, grow, upgrade, equip, and choose different character combinations to make the best team. Create a unique formation of your own!

- Rich solo and team gameplay!
Besides the traditional solo challenge, the game also offers high level dungeons that requires team cooperation. If you love PVP mode, you will enjoy playing the MOBA mode as well. Call up your friends and fight to your heart’s content!

Thank you very much for the hard work and improving the app all the time, Voltage. ^^

I have no problem anything except the roulette. I hope Voltage will change the value of coins from 5 to 10(bronze), 10 to 50 (silver) and 100 (gold) remains the same.  It requires unfathomable patience for how many days just to get the whole story. One chapter for 100 coins, I'm fine with it if it has only 5 chapters but aside from too many chapters it has also separated sequels and epilogues. *cries*  Please reconsider changing the amount of coins. Hopes for better system and greater stories.

Loved it,even though at the beginning,i 'm a bit skeptical about it, it is kinda efficient in some way.but i do miss the standlone apps.also the login bonus is quite dissapointing,like we only get 5-10? At least give us a bit of generous amount like 10-20 coins

For anyone looking for an MC who isn't a pushover, try the newer stories. Our Private Homeroom stands out as unusually well-localized, to the point it feels like someone studied the English speaking hemisphere of the Internet for modern slang. I very much appreciate the upgrade in sass and backbone, so it was pretty well done nonetheless. I've been a monthly subscriber for months with no intention to change this.

Prices aren't competitive with paperback books. Why spend $4 per chapter when I can buy a 400 paged book new for $8. Also, the daily login bonus gives 5-10 coins per day; it would take months to unlock a single chapter at that rate. The only thing thia app has going for it is the free story every 2 weeks. 🙏🙏🙏 I suggest making this work more like Voltage's Lovestruck app & also letting us watch adds in exchange for coins.

description: Large war strategy game "Glory Road" 2018 new version, Valentine's Day party! Strive to create a more perfect gaming experience.SettingDuring the several decades of King Edmund's reign, the Kingdom of Glory had been peaceful. However, the king's younger brother had been coveting the throne,  and he has even decided to launch a war to usurp the throne because King Edmund's son would soon inherit the throne. In order to win the war, he signed a contract with the Night Demon - the lord of demons. He sold his soul to the Night Demon and he thus gained a large number of Wights in return to dispatch.In the end, King Edmund died during the war and he handed over the throne to the prince before he died. Since then, the new king has been taking up the heavy responsibility to fight against his uncle and also the Wights, rebuilding his homeland and reviving the kingdom...FeaturesIn contrast with traditional simulation games, this game has more elements of strategy and development. In the game, you can build your own territories, rally troops, develop arms, cultivate dragons, and fight together with various heroes and even gods. Like traditional simulation games, it has a siege system, too. In addition, it has numerous elements of war, including adventure, military exercises, Dragon Treasure, battle for capitals, battle for the throne, and so on. The game also has various mechanisms to boost player interaction such as alliance gathering and the Magic Garden. Just start playing with players from all over the world.We've been working hard to make the gaming environment fair. We've just added a limit to the kingdom level, and also added a lot of new ways to earn gold and other resources for free.Gameplay & Functions**Real-time Translation System**The chatting system supports real-time translation of all languages to remove communication barriers.**Global Competition**Players from all over the world will compete in the 7 capital cities around the throne.**Kingdom Level**For fairness reason, players will raise the level cap of their own castles step by step.**Alliance Gathering**Build forts for your alliances and expand your alliance's territory.Gather resources together with your friends to increase output of resources.**War Supplies**By leveling your castle up, you can earn a number of troops directly.When you've lost a lot in war, you can trigger war supplies to get tons of free resources as compensation.**Casual PVP**Compete with players from all over the world at any time to earn glory.Battles in the arena will not cause losses.**Cultivate Dragons**Hatch Blue Dragons and Red Dragons to make them fight by your side.**Recruit Heroes**Raise the affinity level of your legendary heroes, to make your troops much stronger.Contact Ushttps: //www.facebook.com/GloryRoadOnlineQQ group:  606861217
descriptionHTML:
Large war strategy game "Glory Road" 2018 new version, Valentine's Day party! Strive to create a more perfect gaming experience.

Setting
During the several decades of King Edmund's reign, the Kingdom of Glory had been peaceful. However, the king's younger brother had been coveting the throne, and he has even decided to launch a war to usurp the throne because King Edmund's son would soon inherit the throne. In order to win the war, he signed a contract with the Night Demon - the lord of demons. He sold his soul to the Night Demon and he thus gained a large number of Wights in return to dispatch.
In the end, King Edmund died during the war and he handed over the throne to the prince before he died. Since then, the new king has been taking up the heavy responsibility to fight against his uncle and also the Wights, rebuilding his homeland and reviving the kingdom...

Features
In contrast with traditional simulation games, this game has more elements of strategy and development. In the game, you can build your own territories, rally troops, develop arms, cultivate dragons, and fight together with various heroes and even gods. Like traditional simulation games, it has a siege system, too. In addition, it has numerous elements of war, including adventure, military exercises, Dragon Treasure, battle for capitals, battle for the throne, and so on. The game also has various mechanisms to boost player interaction such as alliance gathering and the Magic Garden. Just start playing with players from all over the world.
We've been working hard to make the gaming environment fair. We've just added a limit to the kingdom level, and also added a lot of new ways to earn gold and other resources for free.

Gameplay & Functions
**Real-time Translation System**
The chatting system supports real-time translation of all languages to remove communication barriers.

**Global Competition**
Players from all over the world will compete in the 7 capital cities around the throne.

**Kingdom Level**
For fairness reason, players will raise the level cap of their own castles step by step.

**Alliance Gathering**
Build forts for your alliances and expand your alliance's territory.
Gather resources together with your friends to increase output of resources.

**War Supplies**
By leveling your castle up, you can earn a number of troops directly.
When you've lost a lot in war, you can trigger war supplies to get tons of free resources as compensation.

**Casual PVP**
Compete with players from all over the world at any time to earn glory.
Battles in the arena will not cause losses.

**Cultivate Dragons**
Hatch Blue Dragons and Red Dragons to make them fight by your side.

**Recruit Heroes**
Raise the affinity level of your legendary heroes, to make your troops much stronger.

Contact Us
https: //www.facebook.com/GloryRoadOnline
QQ group: 606861217

comments: I'm not a fan of mobile gaming, but this game is truly something else. I love The Walking Dead, so I gave this a shot, however, after playing Road to Survival (or whatever it's called- it's the TWD game based off of the comics), my expectations were pretty low. This game though, is not Road to Survival; it's so much more. This is how you do a free to play game with microtransactions right. You can buy a lot in this game with money, but you can easily obtain everything on your own, and quite frankly, it's more fun to do that anyways. This game is super addicting and gives me something fun to do when I've got a few minutes. I've been playing it for months, and I don't plan on stopping anytime soon.

Just a suggestion, it'll be SO MUCH MORE AWESOME probably 10 stars for TWD fans if you could do better missions or events that allow us to get better opportunities to farm for TWD character tokens or class tokens, and also more chance for farming or creating weapons instead of the current set up now. Don't quite like the fact that when deals are awesome but they cost a ton! Try lessen the value a little bit and im sure some players dont mind spending (just my opinion). But overall review, its awesome for TWD fans out there!

It's got good action in graphic. Been playing for a 2 years in 10 month's now.Stay human and Survive.  Up dates all the time love it keep them coming Robert Cregman. Thanks for making the Walking  dead show And game. New stuff to do all the time. In wow all these new survivers. There are some loading issues action issues movement issues alot more mission.

Originally gave you 4 stars, but its one of only a couple of mobile games I have never deleted since installing. Constant content coming in, great use of TWD licence! Keep up the great work- seriously from someone who hates most mobile games!
I've been playing for over 2 years. A few more new maps would be nice and stop nerfing our great traits like interrupt and wrestler! Other than that, great game and great community.
Really good strategy game. The thing that lost it the 5th star is that when I started a second game on another device, it won't play ads for free stuff
description: Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle. • FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead • JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - GamezeboFor more, please visit:http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomanslandhttp://twitter.com/twdnomanslandhttp://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.comhttp://www.youtube.com/nxtgmsFor player support, please visit:nextgames.helpshift.com
descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!

Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle.

• FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat
• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission
• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead

“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer

“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable

“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - Gamezebo

description: The true love in Jianghu is like constant burning flame, dazzling, fierce and enviable. The newest update Commit For Life offers player a chance to experience Jianghu romance. Get ready to adventure with the ‘one’ of yours, hop on the special mount for two, defeat anyone in your way with custom martial skills, new companion. For Fame, for gold, and for love, are you prepared enough to Commit? Panoramic Martial Arts KingdomPowered by the second generation Flexi Engine, Sword of Shadows takes players on an authentic journey through an ancient martial arts kingdom, as they become legendary warriors. We've paid incredible attention to detail to ensure that Sword of Shadows raises the bar in terms of what 3D mobile games can accomplish visually.Revolutionary Flying Skills & Sky BattlesIn Sword of Shadows, players can literally take flight, allowing them to experience a martial arts battle like never before. The Eight Fighting Flying Skill allows players to soar above their PvP opponents. Players can also learn the Ultra Flying Skills to fly across Sword of Shadows' expansive map.Fast-Paced and Dynamic CombatSword of Shadows' fast-paced and dynamic combat mechanism allows players to adjust the combat mode based on the circumstances of the fight. Players will master a range of martial arts abilities and battle tactics, including the ability to block feints and break through defenses to defeat opponents. The Snail team has also added refraction and displacement effects to increase the visual impact of Sword of Shadows' unique martial arts moves.Five Unique Schools to JoinThe path to martial arts mastery begins in one of Jianghu's five Martial Arts Schools! Each school has unique qualities that provide endless opportunities for character customization. Are you a swift and silent Tangmen ninja? Or are you more Emei, as brutal as you are beautiful? Between the five featured schools in Sword of Shadows, players are guaranteed to find the path to martial arts mastery that is perfect for them.==Connect==Visit our official site to learn more about Sword of Shadows: http://sword.snail.com/en/ Join the Sword of Shadows community and learn more on Facebook and our official Forum: Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/SwordofShadows/ Community Forum: http://swordbbs.snail.com/en/
descriptionHTML:
The true love in Jianghu is like constant burning flame, dazzling, fierce and enviable. The newest update Commit For Life offers player a chance to experience Jianghu romance. Get ready to adventure with the ‘one’ of yours, hop on the special mount for two, defeat anyone in your way with custom martial skills, new companion. For Fame, for gold, and for love, are you prepared enough to Commit?

Panoramic Martial Arts Kingdom

Powered by the second generation Flexi Engine, Sword of Shadows takes players on an authentic journey through an ancient martial arts kingdom, as they become legendary warriors. We've paid incredible attention to detail to ensure that Sword of Shadows raises the bar in terms of what 3D mobile games can accomplish visually.

Revolutionary Flying Skills & Sky Battles

In Sword of Shadows, players can literally take flight, allowing them to experience a martial arts battle like never before. The Eight Fighting Flying Skill allows players to soar above their PvP opponents. Players can also learn the Ultra Flying Skills to fly across Sword of Shadows' expansive map.

Fast-Paced and Dynamic Combat

Sword of Shadows' fast-paced and dynamic combat mechanism allows players to adjust the combat mode based on the circumstances of the fight. Players will master a range of martial arts abilities and battle tactics, including the ability to block feints and break through defenses to defeat opponents. The Snail team has also added refraction and displacement effects to increase the visual impact of Sword of Shadows' unique martial arts moves.

Five Unique Schools to Join

The path to martial arts mastery begins in one of Jianghu's five Martial Arts Schools! Each school has unique qualities that provide endless opportunities for character customization. Are you a swift and silent Tangmen ninja? Or are you more Emei, as brutal as you are beautiful? Between the five featured schools in Sword of Shadows, players are guaranteed to find the path to martial arts mastery that is perfect for them.

==Connect==
Visit our official site to learn more about Sword of Shadows: http://sword.snail.com/en/
Join the Sword of Shadows community and learn more on Facebook and our official Forum:
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/SwordofShadows/
Community Forum: http://swordbbs.snail.com/en/

description: For Freedom, a 2016 fantasy-themed strategy war game, is now LIVE!Build a city and recruit four races of Humans, Orcs, Elves and The Darkness. Launch an attack or retreat at your will. You can control every single unit like you navigate in Google Map. Become a mighty dragon lord and control dragon knights, or be wiped out by the cursed dragons. It’s all up to you! An epic war in an immersive worldThe war has been going on for ten thousand years in the For Freedom universe. The ancient dragon ten thousand years ago and the invasion of the cursed legion now. The four races have to bury the hatchet and fight alongside each other against the invaders of their land! However, Elves are wiped out immediately after the outbreak of the war. The world is being corrupted by darkness. You are given a magic fortress that keeps your from the dark force. Would you like to lead the four races to victory and save this world from all this chaos? Four races offer endless possibilities of unit combinationYou can recruit units of Humans, Orcs, Elves and The Darkness in your city, with signature buildings from all the four races providing different city functions. There are more than 16 types of buildings and over 20 distinctive units that have either advantage or disadvantage over each other. You can build your own army in a lot of ways, making it possible for you to defeat your enemy even if you are outnumbered. Strategy plays a crucial role in For Freedom.A bigger world map, the bigger pictureThe most intuitive world map ever. Zoom out to look observe the whole world and zoom in to focus on every single battle. There is no dead angle for you. Be ready for enemy’s ambush and allies’ call for help. You can choose either to attack or retreat at any time!Greatest satisfaction for your desire for warLet your power speak! Get new technology and train your army. Advanced units offer much more power in your quest for glory! Fight to kill monsters in the wild, plunder resources, conquer rival alliances! There are kingdom wars, cross-server wars and world boss fight! You can even wage a server-wide war that involves thousands of players from all over the world! Amazing missions and official eventsDaily quest, Newbie quest, Recommended quest, Random quest. The difficulty varies but the rewards are all amazing! Rare items will appear randomly after you complete quests. You have to put the quest system to good use if you want to turn the tide.Official events open at regular intervals. They will keep you busy in the game for sure!New Kingdom war is live. The fourth race Elves are now at your command!Do you want to see Frost Wyrm, Tauren, Mage and Druid fight alongside each other? Download and play For Freedom, Fantasy-themed strategy war game of 2016!
descriptionHTML:
For Freedom, a 2016 fantasy-themed strategy war game, is now LIVE!

Build a city and recruit four races of Humans, Orcs, Elves and The Darkness. Launch an attack or retreat at your will. You can control every single unit like you navigate in Google Map. Become a mighty dragon lord and control dragon knights, or be wiped out by the cursed dragons. It’s all up to you!

An epic war in an immersive world
The war has been going on for ten thousand years in the For Freedom universe. The ancient dragon ten thousand years ago and the invasion of the cursed legion now. The four races have to bury the hatchet and fight alongside each other against the invaders of their land! However, Elves are wiped out immediately after the outbreak of the war. The world is being corrupted by darkness. You are given a magic fortress that keeps your from the dark force. Would you like to lead the four races to victory and save this world from all this chaos?

Four races offer endless possibilities of unit combination
You can recruit units of Humans, Orcs, Elves and The Darkness in your city, with signature buildings from all the four races providing different city functions. There are more than 16 types of buildings and over 20 distinctive units that have either advantage or disadvantage over each other. You can build your own army in a lot of ways, making it possible for you to defeat your enemy even if you are outnumbered. Strategy plays a crucial role in For Freedom.

A bigger world map, the bigger picture
The most intuitive world map ever. Zoom out to look observe the whole world and zoom in to focus on every single battle. There is no dead angle for you. Be ready for enemy’s ambush and allies’ call for help. You can choose either to attack or retreat at any time!

Greatest satisfaction for your desire for war
Let your power speak! Get new technology and train your army. Advanced units offer much more power in your quest for glory! Fight to kill monsters in the wild, plunder resources, conquer rival alliances! There are kingdom wars, cross-server wars and world boss fight! You can even wage a server-wide war that involves thousands of players from all over the world!

Amazing missions and official events
Daily quest, Newbie quest, Recommended quest, Random quest. The difficulty varies but the rewards are all amazing! Rare items will appear randomly after you complete quests. You have to put the quest system to good use if you want to turn the tide.

Official events open at regular intervals. They will keep you busy in the game for sure!

New Kingdom war is live. The fourth race Elves are now at your command!

Do you want to see Frost Wyrm, Tauren, Mage and Druid fight alongside each other? Download and play For Freedom, Fantasy-themed strategy war game of 2016!

summary: For Freedom is a fantasy-themed strategy war game set in an epic kingdom.
title: For Freedom

description: Quyết khô máu cùng anh em!Với sự thành công rực rỡ khi ra mắt, Kỵ Sĩ Rồng tiếp tục cập nhật phiên bản 2.0 mang tiên Chiến Binh Huyền Thoại với nhiều tính năng mới hấp dẫn. Trong đó nổi bật nhất lần update này là tính năng liên đấu 3vs3, cho các Dũng Sĩ tổ đội với nhau để tranh tài liên server cùng nhiều thời trang, tọa kỵ mới.I – Giới thiệu:- Đây là tựa game mobile MMORPG duy nhất không chia phe hay thế lực, mà tập trung vào hệ thống Quân Đoàn để gắn kết cộng đồng.- Kiểm chứng bởi cộng đồng game Hàn, đây là tựa game có hệ thống tương tác giữa người chơi sâu sắc, mật thiết. Có anh em là có tất cả!- Đồ họa chuẩn Châu Âu, hình ảnh sắc nét, hiệu ứng và kỹ năng hoành tráng.- Game có hệ thống Lãnh địa tranh đoạt mang lợi ích vô song và thực tế nhất.- Chiến trường không giới hạn, Quân Đoàn chiến vinh danh Hoàng Thành Chủ.- Hệ thống Boss đa dạng: Boss dã ngoại, Boss thế giới, Boss Quân Đoàn…- Game có hệ thống Pet và thú cưỡi phong phú nhất trên mobile- Đám cưới sang trọng mang phong cách quý tộc, diễu hành quanh thành.- Tối ưu hóa trên các thiết bị có cấu hình thấp, tự động điều chỉnh chế độ tiết kiệm pin khi không có thao tác.Ngoài ra, Chiến Binh Huyền Thoại - Kỵ Sĩ Rồng 2.0 còn rất nhiều các tính năng đặc sắc khác cho các bạn thỏa sức khám phá!II- Lưu ý từ BQT:1. Game đã thiết kế dân cày cũng có vị thế độc tôn, còn VIP thì sẽ nổi bật oai hùng. Vì thế, anh em chả còn lo bị GATO, tứ hải giai huynh đệ.2. Tựa game này TUYỆT ĐỐI không dành cho người “yếu tim”, sống ích kỷ chỉ có hại không có lợi.3. Có thêm ANH EM, càng đông càng vui4. Trong game có vô số Quân Đoàn, gặp là “bem”, ngứa mắt là PK5. Khỏe chưa chắc đã “cân team” nhưng ĐÔNG lại là một lợi thế6. Treo máy cày quái là bình thường, nhưng hãy CẨN THẬN những tên “farm người”, tranh bãi train.7. PK đồ sát người khác bị chữ đỏ? Lính canh không BỎ QUA cho bạn đâu. Vào tù còn có thể bị mấy thằng bạn khốn thả chó cắn. Nghĩ mà cảm thấy, tym tao đau quá man ! Hiện nay trên thị trường có rất nhiều tựa game khác, cảm ơn bạn đã chọn Chiến Binh Huyền Thoại - Kỵ Sĩ Rồng 2.0 – Dragon Knights của SohaGame. Chúng tôi cam kết sẽ mang đến trải nghiệm tuyệt vời nhất cùng hệ thống hỗ trợ liên tục, đảm bảo giải quyết các vấn đề thắc mắc của game thủ.
descriptionHTML:
Quyết khô máu cùng anh em!

Với sự thành công rực rỡ khi ra mắt, Kỵ Sĩ Rồng tiếp tục cập nhật phiên bản 2.0 mang tiên Chiến Binh Huyền Thoại với nhiều tính năng mới hấp dẫn. Trong đó nổi bật nhất lần update này là tính năng liên đấu 3vs3, cho các Dũng Sĩ tổ đội với nhau để tranh tài liên server cùng nhiều thời trang, tọa kỵ mới.

I – Giới thiệu:

- Đây là tựa game mobile MMORPG duy nhất không chia phe hay thế lực, mà tập trung vào hệ thống Quân Đoàn để gắn kết cộng đồng.
- Kiểm chứng bởi cộng đồng game Hàn, đây là tựa game có hệ thống tương tác giữa người chơi sâu sắc, mật thiết. Có anh em là có tất cả!
- Đồ họa chuẩn Châu Âu, hình ảnh sắc nét, hiệu ứng và kỹ năng hoành tráng.
- Game có hệ thống Lãnh địa tranh đoạt mang lợi ích vô song và thực tế nhất.
- Chiến trường không giới hạn, Quân Đoàn chiến vinh danh Hoàng Thành Chủ.
- Hệ thống Boss đa dạng: Boss dã ngoại, Boss thế giới, Boss Quân Đoàn…
- Game có hệ thống Pet và thú cưỡi phong phú nhất trên mobile
- Đám cưới sang trọng mang phong cách quý tộc, diễu hành quanh thành.
- Tối ưu hóa trên các thiết bị có cấu hình thấp, tự động điều chỉnh chế độ tiết kiệm pin khi không có thao tác.

Ngoài ra, Chiến Binh Huyền Thoại - Kỵ Sĩ Rồng 2.0 còn rất nhiều các tính năng đặc sắc khác cho các bạn thỏa sức khám phá!

II- Lưu ý từ BQT:

1. Game đã thiết kế dân cày cũng có vị thế độc tôn, còn VIP thì sẽ nổi bật oai hùng. Vì thế, anh em chả còn lo bị GATO, tứ hải giai huynh đệ.
2. Tựa game này TUYỆT ĐỐI không dành cho người “yếu tim”, sống ích kỷ chỉ có hại không có lợi.
3. Có thêm ANH EM, càng đông càng vui
4. Trong game có vô số Quân Đoàn, gặp là “bem”, ngứa mắt là PK
5. Khỏe chưa chắc đã “cân team” nhưng ĐÔNG lại là một lợi thế
6. Treo máy cày quái là bình thường, nhưng hãy CẨN THẬN những tên “farm người”, tranh bãi train.
7. PK đồ sát người khác bị chữ đỏ? Lính canh không BỎ QUA cho bạn đâu. Vào tù còn có thể bị mấy thằng bạn khốn thả chó cắn. Nghĩ mà cảm thấy, tym tao đau quá man !

Hiện nay trên thị trường có rất nhiều tựa game khác, cảm ơn bạn đã chọn Chiến Binh Huyền Thoại - Kỵ Sĩ Rồng 2.0 – Dragon Knights của SohaGame. Chúng tôi cam kết sẽ mang đến trải nghiệm tuyệt vời nhất cùng hệ thống hỗ trợ liên tục, đảm bảo giải quyết các vấn đề thắc mắc của game thủ.
developerAddress: 19 Floor, Center Building, 01 Nguyen Huy Tuong, Thanh Xuan, Hanoi
summary: Battle of the Corps
title: Chiến Binh Huyền Thoại - Kỵ Sĩ Rồng 2.0

comments: This game has been great to me forever, and I never had a complaint but this recent update has driven me here. The trophy cap is a real kick in the nuts and ruins the game for casual gamers like me. You now HAVE to advance through the games prestige system and keep resetting all your work just to help out a gang. And if you are in a strict gang like I am, they require 100 trophies a day. If I keep advancing, I won't be able to keep up with that. This is all a money grab by zepto now. They want you to have to pay to keep your machines strong so you can compete.

I love this game. I have been playing it for a very long time. I play it every single day. I like the new updates however it seems you are getting away from the original game and focusing more on ultimate machines. Increasing the prestige levels was awesome but you need to also add additional upgrades with them as well. I have over 100 paw upgrades that are completely useless to me at the moment.

Look this was a great game, worthy of it's previous accolades. Sadly since then it's been progressively ruined by an ever more aggressively enforced attempt to move to a pay to win model. Previously you could achieve anything in the game with a bit of hard work, then they tweaked it and you could achieve anything with a bit of hard work and team work. Sadly though what's happened is soft paywalls have been introduced, things you can't outright buy, but will only manage with financial outlay and change after change is being introduced with new soft paywalls and new ways to try and cash grab. The game is on a steady but rapid downward decline and to any new players I would avoid picking it up and investing your time in it now.

Update: Now it won't even open. Once you find out your progression is rigged, the fun wears off. You will have a win streak going, them "mysteriously" a machine will show up with just the right set up to beat yours. Then once you finally get the right configuration to beat that one (however long that takes) another machine with the perfect set up to beat yours shows up again preventing you from progressing. Over and over and over....

Great game, easy to play and a good time waster. One thing I would like to see in a future update  is a scroll bar for the parts in your garage. It would make it a lot easier than swiping through them, especially for those who have a lot of spare parts like myself. Other than that, awesome game.

This game sucks. First it is really hard to get good equipment. Then it is also very laggy. Everytime im playing the game it freezes right when im doing something. (Mainly when im customizing my car). Think about it when you are getting ths game to take up storage. If you'll excuse me now I've got a game to delete.

descriptionHTML:
Featured by Google Play for 2 consecutive weeks in 2016! Over 1 million downloads, players around the globe are here!

New expansion to be launched this month: Holy Relic system; Level max limit increase to 100; Nightmare Mode of Elite Instances;

New user log in to collect Liu Bei (5-star orange grade), Guan Yu (5-star), Zhang Fei (4-star), log in for 7 consecutive days to collect Diao Chan, log in now to feel the mighty power!

Game Features: no more touch to release, release connection skill through our unique swiping control, Lu Bu + Diao Chan, Zhu Ge Liang + Pang Tong, the Cao’s family…… there are more for you to find out.

Story Background:

The world is in chaos by the end of Eastern Han Dynasty. Killing and Death are the theme of the time. Striving for hegemony and being hero is everyone’s dream. There is always someone who could bring heroes and the country to peace. And this legendary story starts in Luoyang city……

You are the best commander in the Three Kingdom Period, find your heroes and use all tactics you have to become the last King.

Gameplay:

√ Releasing Ultimate skill through unique hero connection

The swiping attack combo is creative and fun, link heroes in different orders to release different skills. It’s all about your tactical thinking!

√ World-wide real time PVP, will you domain the battlefield?

Real time PVP is available from 9:30 – 10:00 every day, show your micro control and strategy to win the fight and collect rich rewards. It’s more than exciting!

√ Over 100 Heroes for you to choose and command

Recruiting different heroes and get to know their stories, each one carries different stats and skills, combine them at your will to create your very own formation!

√ Download for free and collect your rewards now.

description: ライン・ストラテジーRPG『メルクストーリア -癒術士と鈴のしらべ-』（メルスト）4周年を迎えアニメ化も決定したメルストを今後共よろしくお願いします！■□■□■□■メルクストーリア 3 つの特徴■□■□■□■● 超本格！ライン・ストラテジーRPG！！かわいいキャラが簡単操作でサクサク動くのに、とっても硬派なライン・ストラテジーRPG！戦略ゲームと RPG（ロールプレイング）の要素を組み合わせた新ジャンルタイトル！パーティメンバーとなるユニットを育成し、待ち受ける数多のクエストに挑戦!!戦略的にパーティの陣形を維持しつつ、モンスターとの絆の証、『ティンクルシード』で一発大逆転を狙おう！！● リアルタイム救援で「激ムズ」突破を目指せ！ストーリークエストには「ふつう」・「ムズ」・「激ムズ」の３段階を用意！「ふつう」でも一筋縄ではいかないのに、「激ムズ」の難易度はまさに「激ムズ」！！そんな時は、ゲーム内に常設されているログを活用して、ギルドメンバーや同じルームに所属しているプレイヤー達に救援をお願いして協力プレイ！攻略中のクエストに続々と駆け付けるプレイヤー達の姿はまさに圧巻！● “へたれ癒術士と瓶の少女の冒険譚”才能に恵まれつつも、冴えない日常に埋没する少年と、自らを探す旅を望む、瓶の中の少女…魅力溢れるかわいいキャラクター達と、個性的なモンスター達が画面狭しと紡いでいく、ファンタジックコミカルストーリーをお楽しみください。■□■□■□■公式ツイッター（ティティ）■□■□■□■泣いてばかりな、こーほー担当のティティが、メルストの攻略法や最新情報、運営からのお知らせをつぶやいているよ♪忘れずにフォローして、メルストの最新情報をチェックしよう！https://twitter.com/merc_storia

description: HỢP KÍCH 36 THẾ - XƯNG ĐẾ THIÊN HẠ“Một trong những sản phẩm game thẻ tướng chiến thuật chất lượng nhất đến từ Studio của Netease – một trong những công ty game lớn nhất thế giới, Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng xứng đáng là trò chơi công phá năm 2018 được game thủ kì vọng nhất.” – Sendor Grimer – BTV Gamek.vn1. PHÁT HÀNH TOÀN CẦU VỚI NHIỀU NGÔN NGỮ TẠI NHIỀU QUỐC GIAPhát triển từ một Studio thuộc Tencent, Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng đã được phát hành tại 6 quốc gia thị trường lớn trên thế giới bao gồm: Malaysia, Indonesia, Thái Lan, Hồng Kông, Đài Loan, Macao và bản tiếng Anh toàn cầu. Việt Nam chính là thị trường tiếp theo phát hành trò chơi chiến thuật đang cực kì thành công này.2. ĐẶC THÙ VÀ DUY NHẤT: BỘ TƯỚNG HỢP KÍCH – XUẤT CHIÊU BÍ TRUYỀNTrong Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng, mỗi bộ tướng đều có duyên phận, không chỉ kích hoạt các chỉ số đặc biệt khi cùng có mặt trong trận hình, mà còn giúp nhân vật mạnh nhất trong bộ tướng đó thay đổi kĩ năng hoàn toàn mới để xuất tuyệt chiêu hợp kích Bí Truyền. Đây là tính năng chưa một game chiến thuật nào có trên thị trường Việt Nam hiện tại.3. THỜI TRANG QUYẾT ĐỊNH CHIẾN THUẬT – ĐỔI THỜI TRANG, ĐỔI KĨ NĂNGHệ thống thời trang của Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng không chỉ đẹp, “khủng” mà còn đem đến những chỉ số, hiệu ứng thuộc tính và bộ kỹ năng mới đặc thù trên từng bộ thời trang. Vì vậy, khi thay đổi thời trang, nghĩa là người chơi sẽ thay đổi hoàn toàn đặc tính và chiến thuật của trận hình. Đặc biệt, các bộ thời trang này không được cộng dồn thuộc tính, khiến cho trò chơi trở nên trí tuệ hơn nhiều.5. GIẢI ĐẤU ĐỈNH PHONG – VINH DANH TẠC TƯỢNG LIÊN SERVERĐây là tính năng PvP thi đấu liên server trong Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng, nơi hội tụ tất cả những game thủ mạnh nhất tại các server, tham gia tranh tài để tìm ra người chiến thắng. Giải đấu được tổ chức như một vòng chung kết WorldCup, thi đấu chia bảng và các vòng đấu cực kỳ hấp dẫn. Ngoài danh hiệu, được tạc tượng liên server, người chơi tham gia giải đấu sẽ nhận thưởng điểm tích lũy dùng để đổi lấy các mảnh tướng Đỏ siêu hiếm. Người chơi khác cũng có thể ủng hộ, bình chọn và cổ vũ những người chơi tham gia giải đấu để nhận thưởng nhiều phần quà giá trị.6. 37 HIỆU ỨNG – TÙY HỨNG TRẬN HÌNH – SO TRÌNH CHIẾN THUẬTChiến thuật trong Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng được thay đổi liên tục thông qua các hiệu ứng kĩ năng của tướng như tăng tốc, hóa đá, đóng băng, thiêu đốt, x2 sát thương… Các hiệu ứng này sẽ ảnh hưởng mạnh mẽ đến cách chơi và cách bố trận của game thủ sao cho hiệu quả nhất, từ đó phân định đẳng cấp trí tuệ của người chơi.7. HỆ THỐNG PET ĐA DẠNG, BUFF HIỆU ỨNG TĂNG CHỈ SỐ CHO TƯỚNGTiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng là một trong số hiếm các game chiến thuật có sử dụng hệ thống Pet khi xuất trận. Các Pet này khi xuất chiến sẽ cộng chỉ số khá lớn cho tướng trong đội hình bao gồm cả hiệu ứng. Mỗi Pet sẽ có các chỉ số riêng tùy thuộc vào chiến thuật của người chơi mà tùy biến sử dụng loại Pet hợp lý khi xuất trận. Pet cũng là một trong những thứ có thể show hàng thể hiện sự độc đáo, oai phong cho nhân vật.8. BẠN SẼ KHÔNG CÔ ĐƠN KHI CHƠI GAMEMặc dù là game thẻ tướng chiến thuật Tam Quốc, thế nhưng Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng không hề “tự kỉ” khi có rất nhiều tính năng cộng đồng cho phép tương tác giữa người  chơi với nhau. Với hệ thống bang hội đặc sắc, bang chiến khốc liệt, tổ đội tinh anh, vận tiêu bang hội, công thành chiến, phụ bản liên server, voice chat liên server… thì bạn sẽ không thể cảm thấy cô đơn khi tham gia vào game. CÁC TÍNH NĂNG ĐẶC SẮC KHÁC:KHAI PHÁ LÃNH THỔ, CHIẾM ĐOẠT TÀI NGUYÊNTHÍ LUYỆN HỔ TƯỚNG, XƯNG BÁ THIÊN HẠBẾ QUAN TỎA CẢNGTRÙNG LUYỆN TRANG BỊBANG HỘI ĐẠI LOẠN MÔNBOSS THẾ GIỚITHÔNG THIÊN THÁPVIỄN CHINH TAM QUỐCCƯỚP KỶ VẬTPHỤ BẢN EXP, PET, BẠCĐẤU TRƯỜNG 1vs1

“Một trong những sản phẩm game thẻ tướng chiến thuật chất lượng nhất đến từ Studio của Netease – một trong những công ty game lớn nhất thế giới, Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng xứng đáng là trò chơi công phá năm 2018 được game thủ kì vọng nhất.” – Sendor Grimer – BTV Gamek.vn
1. PHÁT HÀNH TOÀN CẦU VỚI NHIỀU NGÔN NGỮ TẠI NHIỀU QUỐC GIA
Phát triển từ một Studio thuộc Tencent, Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng đã được phát hành tại 6 quốc gia thị trường lớn trên thế giới bao gồm: Malaysia, Indonesia, Thái Lan, Hồng Kông, Đài Loan, Macao và bản tiếng Anh toàn cầu. Việt Nam chính là thị trường tiếp theo phát hành trò chơi chiến thuật đang cực kì thành công này.
2. ĐẶC THÙ VÀ DUY NHẤT: BỘ TƯỚNG HỢP KÍCH – XUẤT CHIÊU BÍ TRUYỀN
Trong Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng, mỗi bộ tướng đều có duyên phận, không chỉ kích hoạt các chỉ số đặc biệt khi cùng có mặt trong trận hình, mà còn giúp nhân vật mạnh nhất trong bộ tướng đó thay đổi kĩ năng hoàn toàn mới để xuất tuyệt chiêu hợp kích Bí Truyền. Đây là tính năng chưa một game chiến thuật nào có trên thị trường Việt Nam hiện tại.
3. THỜI TRANG QUYẾT ĐỊNH CHIẾN THUẬT – ĐỔI THỜI TRANG, ĐỔI KĨ NĂNG
Hệ thống thời trang của Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng không chỉ đẹp, “khủng” mà còn đem đến những chỉ số, hiệu ứng thuộc tính và bộ kỹ năng mới đặc thù trên từng bộ thời trang. Vì vậy, khi thay đổi thời trang, nghĩa là người chơi sẽ thay đổi hoàn toàn đặc tính và chiến thuật của trận hình. Đặc biệt, các bộ thời trang này không được cộng dồn thuộc tính, khiến cho trò chơi trở nên trí tuệ hơn nhiều.
5. GIẢI ĐẤU ĐỈNH PHONG – VINH DANH TẠC TƯỢNG LIÊN SERVER
Đây là tính năng PvP thi đấu liên server trong Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng, nơi hội tụ tất cả những game thủ mạnh nhất tại các server, tham gia tranh tài để tìm ra người chiến thắng. Giải đấu được tổ chức như một vòng chung kết WorldCup, thi đấu chia bảng và các vòng đấu cực kỳ hấp dẫn. Ngoài danh hiệu, được tạc tượng liên server, người chơi tham gia giải đấu sẽ nhận thưởng điểm tích lũy dùng để đổi lấy các mảnh tướng Đỏ siêu hiếm. Người chơi khác cũng có thể ủng hộ, bình chọn và cổ vũ những người chơi tham gia giải đấu để nhận thưởng nhiều phần quà giá trị.
6. 37 HIỆU ỨNG – TÙY HỨNG TRẬN HÌNH – SO TRÌNH CHIẾN THUẬT
Chiến thuật trong Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng được thay đổi liên tục thông qua các hiệu ứng kĩ năng của tướng như tăng tốc, hóa đá, đóng băng, thiêu đốt, x2 sát thương… Các hiệu ứng này sẽ ảnh hưởng mạnh mẽ đến cách chơi và cách bố trận của game thủ sao cho hiệu quả nhất, từ đó phân định đẳng cấp trí tuệ của người chơi.
7. HỆ THỐNG PET ĐA DẠNG, BUFF HIỆU ỨNG TĂNG CHỈ SỐ CHO TƯỚNG
Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng là một trong số hiếm các game chiến thuật có sử dụng hệ thống Pet khi xuất trận. Các Pet này khi xuất chiến sẽ cộng chỉ số khá lớn cho tướng trong đội hình bao gồm cả hiệu ứng. Mỗi Pet sẽ có các chỉ số riêng tùy thuộc vào chiến thuật của người chơi mà tùy biến sử dụng loại Pet hợp lý khi xuất trận. Pet cũng là một trong những thứ có thể show hàng thể hiện sự độc đáo, oai phong cho nhân vật.
8. BẠN SẼ KHÔNG CÔ ĐƠN KHI CHƠI GAME
Mặc dù là game thẻ tướng chiến thuật Tam Quốc, thế nhưng Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng không hề “tự kỉ” khi có rất nhiều tính năng cộng đồng cho phép tương tác giữa người chơi với nhau. Với hệ thống bang hội đặc sắc, bang chiến khốc liệt, tổ đội tinh anh, vận tiêu bang hội, công thành chiến, phụ bản liên server, voice chat liên server… thì bạn sẽ không thể cảm thấy cô đơn khi tham gia vào game.

CÁC TÍNH NĂNG ĐẶC SẮC KHÁC:
KHAI PHÁ LÃNH THỔ, CHIẾM ĐOẠT TÀI NGUYÊN
THÍ LUYỆN HỔ TƯỚNG, XƯNG BÁ THIÊN HẠ
BẾ QUAN TỎA CẢNG
TRÙNG LUYỆN TRANG BỊ
BANG HỘI ĐẠI LOẠN MÔN
BOSS THẾ GIỚI
THÔNG THIÊN THÁP
VIỄN CHINH TAM QUỐC
CƯỚP KỶ VẬT
PHỤ BẢN EXP, PET, BẠC

comments: Ive been playing this for a year and a half and i can say this game is NOT a pay to win. Pull rates are pretty much the same as in any other game, and units are tradable 90% of the time so its possible to get units you want even if youre not lucky enough to get them from packs. Platinum units are super helpful and are now much easier to get thanks to golden medals which are pretty easy to get in events. Theres different events, some are for unions, some you play for yourself. Also, a game with most friendly users ive met in games, willing to give a lot of help and advice to new players. All in all, ive played for a long time and i dont see myself stopping any time soon unless theres drastic changes

I love this game. Though they don't explain how to obtain platinum medals or how unions work very well. And I would like it if we could exchange 7s units better. I could list 10 units I'd rather have then idun. I would love to exchange her for a Gilles de rais or a fenrir. But no I have to keep this unit I don't want. Because my idun can't even be sold on the bazaar. Though those are my only problems. I'm addicted to this game.

It's really a good game. I've been playing this for a long time. The reason I didn't give 5 star is because there is a player who start arguing with the other player for no reason and i hope i can report this to the game developer but my friend say it would never work.

I've been encountering some problems with the game in terms of going through a quest. It just suddenly bonked me out of the game everytime i get to the boss. I've tried clearing the cache  and reinstalling it but  to  no avail.  I'm using an oppof1s  and whether I connect through  Wi-Fi or other means. It does the same thing. Would like some help with this

I have two copies of this 7* card that is essential to my deck at the moment. Unfortunately they screech this annoying Yossshh yaattaadaraa!!!!!! EVERY freaking time they launch a special. Then freaking golden apples fill up the screen. Unfortunately they are two of my strongest cards. Thinking of dropping this game.

Been playing for a long time seeing the game develop but as of recently when they switched to parade. Pay to play has been so heavily support worse than other games from the platinum club or vip to basically making it impossible to win or even compete without spending money in events especially when they make event units untradable this has not happened for 2 years the game has been out and now they r just plain greedy this game is committing game suicide and it was such a great game before but now they always have their hands out for money its really disappointing.

comments: I've tried many TD so far still playing this one..every level in every map is unique..  its cool how I can pick and lvl Heroes but then it takes awhile to add a new one when running out of gems (since gems are needed for Heroes) unless u pay to keep playing or just to wait for tournaments... it takes patience lol but I don't mind playing again

A great game with unique map designs and user friendly controls, free to play if you have patience and play strategically, pay to win if you want to advance faster. It is especially a good game for busy people like me who can only spend 10-15 minutes per day but need to stay in the game for a large number of days to be competitive. Don't try to use items and gems on every maps, it is fun and challenging to clear them without shortcuts. *Tip for developers*: Instead of giving purchase options for Sethos and Phoenix they could go with Yan and Narlax, gives chance for new players to compete also developers can milk in additional purchases.

Great TD game with decent difficulty and NPCs progression while still maintining a pattern making you work to figure out various strategies.  Ads have never been an issue I honestly cant remember where they are.  I think they may only be for like "double your rewards for battle" kind of thing.  90% (A) or better in my oppinion.  Mainly cause I want to see more progression.  Note I am only a few levels in so I dont know if theres a pay to get by an immpassable place yet.
*Updated* SCAM! Games slowly bleeds away your gems without mechanics being apparent. (I lost 300 gems in the last 3 days) Good luck unlocking heroes or content without paying $30-40. -2 stars.

Your game is WAY too hard. I am at level 90+ and found the first 3 worlds great fun and balanced but now you have effectively destroyed the enjoyment factor by making the enemies SO strong that you cannot possibly beat them unless you have max level heroes...and the best max level heroes require so much to level up that without paying an absurd amount of real money you may aswell give up.you have broken what could have been the best game on android with selfish Pay 2 win tactics . Uninstalling after months of enjoyment and gameplay.  You need to fix this and make it challenging but not impossible
It's really addicting, a lot of challenges and puzzles for the towers... really loved it! Good job team!   A bit of improvement: maybe an easier way to access the other worlds would be really good!?
description: This is a tower defense challenge that lies in a magical fantasy world. Epic heroes fight in a war to defend the kingdom with top strategy and a rush of inspiration. Battle with Death Knights and fight alongside with knights, dragons, wizard, ice queen, and other ancient gods in the adventure field! The forces of evil amass. Why do they march? Where is their home? No one knows. The prophets' vision is cloudy. The geomancers see little in their maps. Everyone else? They flee. The Allied Kingdoms struggle to survive. Life and all its purpose has no meaning to these fiends. Fields rot. Woods burn. The common folk suffer. Devastation is happening! The Allied Kingdoms have one choice: defend, defend, defend. Are you ready? Realm Defense is a tower defense game that challenges veteran players. Use a huge variety of powers and abilities to vanquish wave after wave of menace for over 100 levels. Travel through lush forests, snow covered mountains, and epic desert as you face off against armies of slimes, goblins, skeletons, and more. Deploy rapid-fire archers! Carve walls on the map with magic beams! Fire roaring cannons! Summon allies! Realm Defense offers variety and challenge. Overcome incredible odds with strategy and wit! Rescue helpless villagers, collect important resources, and recruit legendary heroes with deadly abilities along the way to stop evil in this standout tower defense game.  •	100+ levels with various game play modes•	Multiple worlds to play with 4 different towers each •	Compete in tournament to show off your tower defense skills and win big prize•	Powerful heroes with unique abilities to aid you: Fee the Archer launches a deadly Kill Shot, Lancelot the Knight unleashes the Fist of Justice, Smoulder the Dragon rains down Heat Seeker fireballs and many more•	Face off against epic bosses including a Skeleton Mage that rides a giant slime and zaps your heroes and a bomb tossing, mammoth riding Goblin King•	Huge variety of enemies offer multiple challenges: Burn your enemy, freeze them, and more with 4 spells to cast in battle•	Beautiful landscapes and character animations   PLEASE NOTE! This game is free to play and made by people who love tower defense games. We sincerely hope you enjoy our work!* Save (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE): Used to store additional content of game
